Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Sauga o Yehoba wana abalogugui ni ola hiwe. Galokau ali gewi elulutega wali odam hi ahe, hi tagil hi na hi matamatan tokawakawalolu melutauina ni sikalem yova wana limiya, inoke alona ge yova nihi ahel nihi en tukagil.
Ali toto nimala panuna sisigal ge ali toto nimala panuna henahenapol.
Bolo sisigal wali odam hi ahe, yaa odam ana wewel enuna al nige hi aahe.
Bolo henahenapol odam ana wewel enuna hi holek patuna elal inoke hi noahe ginebi ge wali odam.
Tau wana nem i esowal, yaka galokau gegewel mataliya i kenukenu nabi ge hi kenu.
Bulin nuwana gamagal etega i nem i yoga i ba, ‘Tokawakawalolu melutauina i nenem. Ku nok ku na ku kite.’
Yaka galokau gegewel hi lut ge wali odam hi abubun.
Bolo sisigal hi baek bolo henahenapol elal hi ba, ‘Wewel enuna ku pem, wama odam iyaka i bobolu.’
Analiya hi lahe hi ba, ‘Nigeya. Nige bosowaila komiu ge ama. Ku nok ku na ga sitowaa ge wami odam ana wewel enuna nuku pwamola.’
Yaa sauga hi nanawa wewel pwapwamola kaiwena, yaka tokawakawalolu melutauina i vin. Galokau bolo hi lovivina avaliya hi ulutuk alolon ana hagali elana, inoke nog hi kaus.
Mulaa abwe galokau sisigal hi nem ge hi ba, ‘Babala, babala, nog u pwela naha ulutuk.’
Yaa analiya i lahe i ba, ‘Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, nige ya aatenamiu.’”
Inoke Yeisu i ba, “Nuku matahikagimiu, kaiwena nige ku aatena hauna lan o ebo hauna sauga wami Babala ni nem.”
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Sauga o Yehoba wana abalogugui ni ola hiwe. Tau etega nuwana ni egon ni na labi getoga, yaka wana totuwalali i yogaagil ge wana bugul gegewena i pek elal nihi matahikan.
Silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i pek totuwalali etegana elana, tausan eluwa i pek eluwana elana ge tausan maisena i pek etonina elana. I golugoluwa maisena ge maisena wana aatena ana bwata elana, inoke i pek i ola. I pek eliyalil inoke i egon i na labi getoga.
Tau toto silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i ahe, etimwawa i na i patuwalali inoke tausan nimala panuna al i pwawa.
Ge tau toto tausan eluwa i ahe, i na i ginol ola al inoke tausan eluwa al i pwawa.
Yaa tau toto tausan maisena i ahe i nok i na bilibili i ken ge wana tonowak wana mani i yamwi.
Sauga i yapu abwe wali tonowak i sikalim, inoke wana totuwalali i yogaagil, nuwana ni atena wana mani ga hi patuwalali ola.
Tau toto silba ana gewi tausan nimala panuna i ahe, i nem i pek wana tonowak elana, ginebi ge tausan nimala panuna al. Inoke i ba, ‘Babala, tausan nimala panuna valila u pem. U kite, tausan nimala panuna al ya pwawa.’
Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba, ‘Owa totuwalali waiwaisana ge henahenapona. U ginol bubun. Bugul bolo nige hi gegewi u matahikagil bubunil, inoke na telewa bugul nihi gewi nu matahikagil. U nem alou owa ta yaliyaya pamaisena.’
Tau toto tausan eluwa i ahe, i nem al ge i ba, ‘Babala, tausan eluwa valila u pem. U kite, tausan eluwa al ya pwawa.’
Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba, ‘Owa totuwalali waiwaisana ge henahenapona. U ginol bubun. Bugul bolo nige hi gegewi u matahikagil bubunil, inoke na telewa bugul nihi gewi nu matahikagil. U nem alou owa ta yaliyaya pamaisena.’
Tau toto tausan maisena i ahe, i nem elana ge i ba, ‘Babala, ya atena owa wam logugui i gasisi, kaiwena aanan toto nige u pepel, he u keken ge u papahe wam limiya. He gamagalau getogal hi tuwalali enona i mamasal, inoke owa u bubugulan.
Inoke ya lovakunagiwa, ya na bilibili ya ken ge wam mani ya yamwi. U kite, wam mani te ya pasikal elam e.’
Inoke wana tonowak i baek elana i ba, ‘Owa totuwalali nanakina ge totuwalali pweyapweyatana. U atena ya te aanan toto nige ya pepel ya keken ge ya papahe no limiya. Ge u atena gamagalau getogal hi tuwalali enona i mamasal, inoke nau ya bubugulan.
He binimala nu na no mani nu teli benki elana nihi patuwalali, inoke sauga na sikalim ge na ahe pasikal, ginebi ge ana etulan, toto hi patuwalali ana enona.
‘Mani ku ahek elana ge ku pek tau toto wana mani ana bwata tausan elulutega elana.
Kaiwena henala i gan eliyana, abwe Yehoba ni pek pwabwaya al inoke ni malul. Yaa henala nige i gagan eliyana, bwagana toto kekeisi i minaa eliyana, Yehoba abwe ni ahe yoho.
Totuwalali nanakina ya nuku alitagil-an tola gogou elana, inoke ni kahikahin ge ninina ni alavekilal.’
Sauga Gamagal Natuna ni nem alonau aneloseyau gegewel ge iya ni tabwa kin, inoke ni misiyowa wana abamisiyo wawasana elana ge ni logugui.
Tomipanayawi gegewel nihi migogo matanaa inoke ni asel ni telel boda labui elana, ni ola sipi ana tomatahikan sipi ge goti i asel ge i teli pwamwaumwau-agil.
Sipi ni telel labena awonaa ge goti ni telel gegebanaa.
Yaka kin ni baek bolo hi minek labena awonaa elal ni ba, ‘Komiu bolo Nam i muloluagimiu, ku nem ku ulutuk abalogugui elana, toto Yehoba i lovivina-an kaiwemiu sauga panayawi i ginol.
Kaiwena ya galebu inoke aanan ku pem ya an, ya walem inoke wewel ku pem ya im, ya mibwabwali inoke ku yoga paheyau,
ya bokaboka inoke kaliko ku pem ya galoi, ya kasiyebwa inoke ku matahikagau, ya miminaa dela inoke ku nem ku kiteyau.’
Tosasapol anana nihi lahe nihi ba, ‘Babala, hauna sauga ha kitewa u galebu ge aanan ha pewa u an, o ebo u walem ge wewel ha pewa u im?
Hauna sauga ha kitewa u mibwabwali ge ha yoga pahewa, o ebo u bokaboka ge kaliko ha pewa u galoi?
Hauna sauga ha kitewa u kasiyebwa o ebo u miminaa dela ge ha nowa ha kitewa?’
Inoke analiya kin ni lahe ni ba, ‘Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, hauna gun ebo ku ginola taliwau ya kekeisisi etega elana, he i ola ku ginola eliyau.’
Yaka ni baek bolo hi miminaa gegebanaa elal ni ba, ‘Komiu bolo ami lahi Yehoba iyaka i baunan, ku egonik ku na ginaha mihomihotina elana, toto Yehoba i lovivina-an Seitani alonau ge wana aneloseyau kaiweliya.
Kaiwena ya galebu nige aanan ku pepem, ya walem nige wewel ku pepem,
ya mibwabwali nige ku yoyoga paheyau, ya bokaboka nige kaliko ku pepem, ya kasiyebwa ge ya miminaa dela nige ku mamatahikagau.’
Heliya al anana nihi lahe nihi ba, ‘Babala, hauna sauga ha kitewa u galebu o ebo u walem, u mibwabwali o ebo u bokaboka, u kasiyebwa o ebo u miminaa dela, ge nige ha lalabewa?’
Analiya ni lahe ni ba, ‘Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, hauna gun ebo nige ku giginola bolo ya kekeisisi etega elana, he i ola nige ku giginola eliyau.’
Inoke nihi na lahi mihomihotina elana, yaa tosasapol nihi na yawal mihomihotina elana.”
Sauga Yeisu baaba ya gegewena i baunan haba, inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba,
“Ku atena ya te lan labui ya i mina abwe Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga, inoke Gamagal Natuna nihi lib ge nihi talamwan nihi lokolosan.”
Sauga o topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogo topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa, alana Kaiyapa wana limiya,
inoke hi nuwatu loyaloya ga nihi ola ge Yeisu nihi lib sume ge nihi lopaaliga.
Hi ba, “Bahi ta giginola hagali ana sauga elana, eba abwe boda ta pahugal ge nihi lohaveyan.”
Yeisu iyoho Bedani Saimon tolepelo wana limiya,
inoke yova etega i nem elana patuna ana awa waiwaisana i noahe, gamwanaa, enonu bwalena waiwaisana ge molana bwabwatana. Inoke sauga Yeisu i misiyo ge i anan, enonu i holek Yeisu kokowanaa.
Tohago hi kite inoke ateliya i elolol ge hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena enonu ya i apapanak-an bwabwage?
Binimala ta palian yaka mani bwabwatana ta ahe ge ta pek togulagula elal.”
Yeisu wali baaba i atena inoke i baek elal i ba, “Hauna kaiwena ge yova ya ku anagebigebi-an? Ginol waiwaisana hot te i ginol eliyau e.
Togulagula alomiyau ya sauga gegewena, yaa nau nige sauga gegewena alomiu i oola.
Sauga kekeisi abwe na aliga. Yova ya enonu bwalena waiwaisana i holek tuwawa, inoke i ola tuwau iyaka i abubun haba o teliteli kaiwena.
Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, panayawi mamanana elana, hauna labi elana ebo wasa waiwaisana ya nihi papaatena-an, bugul toto yova ya i ginol nihi liwanan, iya ana abanuwahikan.”
Inoke tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa etegana alana Yudasa Isikaliyota, i nok i na topowon bwabwatal elal
ge i ba, “Hauna gun nuku pem ebo Yeisu na wasaan eliyamiu ge nuku lib?” Inoke mani silba ana gewi teti hi vasili ge abwe nihi pek elana.
Sauga o Yudasa i telipuna Yeisu wana nawanawa i gagayawa-an, kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni teli nimaliyaa ge nihi lib.
Pwalawa toto Nige alona Yis Hi Vivikuhiya Hagalena ana lan telipuna elana, tohago hi nem Yeisu elana ge hi neli hi ba, “Hauna labena elana nuwam aanan naha lovivina-an kaiwem, inoke ta anan ni ola Nopalegi Hagalena ana logugui?”
Yaka analiya i lahe i ba, “Nuku nok nuku na Yelusalema, tau etega elana, ge nuku baek elana nuku ba, ‘Topankite i ba: No sauga iyaka i kelaubwa. Alowau no tohago Nopalegi Hagalena enona naha ginola wam limiya.’”
Inoke tohago hi ginol i ola Yeisu wana baaba elal ge aanan hi lovivina-an Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena.
Sauga bulin i gan, Yeisu alonau wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa hi misiyo hi anan.
Hi aanan ee, yaka i baek elal i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, gamwamiwa etega nasi abwe ni wasaagau.”
Ateliya i lomwan nabi inoke maisena ge maisena i nelnel Yeisu elana i ba, “Babala, nau nige i oola age?”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Gamagal etega iya alou nimama i lau mwaha maisena gamwanaa, nasi abwe ni wasaagau.
Gamagal Natuna nau na aliga ni ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba, yaa gamagal toto ni wasaagau nuwau i nakan, kaiwena bwaliga ana lahi ni bwaya. Binimala valila tau o bahi hinana ni aab, inoke lahi bwabwatana nige ni pwapwawa.”
Inoke Yudasa, toto abwe Yeisu ni wasaan, i ba, “Topankite, nau nige i oola age?” Yaka Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Nigeya, he owa.”
Sauga hi aanan, Yeisu beleid i ahe, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana yaka i pigebagebal-an i pek wana tohago elal ge i ba, “Ku ahe ku an. Toto ya iya tuwau.”
Inoke oine ana kom i ahe, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana inoke i pek elal ge i ba, “Gegewemiu nuku im.
Toto ya saliyau, iya bateli vavaluna i patunahot. Saliyau ni lau inoke gamagalau nihi gewi wali gegi Yehoba ni yakil yoho.
Na baewa eliyamiu, oine toto ya nige al na iim, ana siga alowau komiu abwe oine vavaluna ta im Nam wana abalogugui elana.”
Yaka wona etega hi wonaan ge hi tagil hi na Oya Olibe.
Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba, “Bulin ebe nasi abwe gegewemiu nuku lou luwagau, kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba, ‘Sipi ali tomatahikan na lol inoke sipi nihi tatawaliwali tomaha ge tomaha nihi nonoek.’
Yaa no lut al enaa, na houwa na na Galili, yaka mulaa abwe nuku nem.”
Inoke Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Bwagana ebo alowau gegewel nihi lou, yaa nau nige na lolou luwagiwa.”
Yeisu i baek Pita elana i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyam, bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin, inoke nu alahagau paeton.”
Yaa Pita i baek elana i ba, “Nige na aalahagiwa, bwagana ebo alou owa ta yaomal.” Yaka tohago gegewel hi baaba hi ola al Pita wana baaba.
Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi nok hi na labi toto alana Getesemani, inoke i baek elal i ba, “Ku minaa te, na na ga na awanun huwo.”
Pita ge Sebedi natunau labui i ahel alonau hi nok, inoke sauga o atena i lomwan nabi.
Yaka i baek elal i ba, “Ateu i lomwan nabi, lomwan o kelaubwa ni paaligau. Ku miminaa te ge alowau komiu ta silawa.”
I peliluwagil nige ana bwaga i gagan, inoke i talpo bilibiliya ge i awanun i ba, “Nam, ebo bosowaina, inoke lomwan ana kom ya bahi ni nenem eliyau. Yaa bahi nau no nuwatu, owa ya wam nuwatu.”
Inoke i sikal tohago eton elal ge i kitel hi kenukenu. I baek Pita elana i ba, “Ga i ola ge nige bosowaimiu auwa maisena ya alowau komiu ta silawa?
Nuku silawa ge nuku awanun, inoke bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu. Yayaluwamiu nuwana waisi ni ginol, yaa tuwamiu i pweyata.”
I nok palabuina al i na i awanun i ba, “Nam, ebo wam nuwatu i ola lomwan ana kom ya na im haba ge nige bosowaina nu ahe yoho, inoke ni ola ya wam nuwatu.”
Sauga i sikal, i kitel al hi kenukenu, kaiwena mataliya i aliga nabi.
Inoke i tataluwagil, i nok al i na i awanun paetonina, wana baaba maisena ya.
Yaka i sikal al tohago elal ge i ba, “Age komiu iyahe ya ku kenukenu? Ku kite, sauga iyaka i vin ge Gamagal Natuna nihi talamwan gamagalau nanakil nimaliyaa.
Ku lut ta noewa elal. Tau toto i tatalamwagau, sauga ya iyaka i vin!”
Sauga Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba inoke Yudasa i vin, iya Yeisu wana tohago bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega. Alonau ge boda bwabwatana, bolo topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi patunal. He elohaveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina hi noahe.
Yeisu ana towasa etotohi etega iyaka i baunanik haba boda elal i ba, “Tau toto na nalo heiya te nuku lib ge nuku yowan.”
Inoke sauga Yudasa i vin i nopasapu i na Yeisu elana i ba “Ateu owa topankite,” yaka i nalo.
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Heliyam, bugul toto kaiwena ge u nem, u ginol.” Inoke gamagalau hi noha Yeisu elana ge hi lib.
Bolo avaliya Yeisu, etegana wana elohaveyan kilepana i momol tagilanem abanaa, inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali etega tanana i goyoho.
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Wam elohaveyan kilepana u teli pasikal abanaa, kaiwena henala ebo kilepa elana ni lohaveyan, kilepa elana al nihi loliya.
Age nige ku aatena bosowaiu na yoga Nam elana labe kaiwena, inoke sauga o aneloseyau ali boda bwabwatana ni patunal nihi nem nihi lohaveyan kaiweu?
Yaa ebo na ginol ola, nige bosowaina Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ni tabwa tunahot, toto i ba tage ni masal ni ola te sauga e.”
Sauga o Yeisu i baek boda elal i ba, “Age nau toawatautau ge topihigelgel inoke haveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina ku noahe ge ku nem tage nuku libau! Lan gegewena ya miminaa Limi Bwabwalena elana ya panpankiti inoke nige ku lilibau.
Bugul gegewena toto ya i masal inoke Buki Bwabwalena toto palopitau hi lelelian ni tabwa tunahot.” Inoke sauga o wana tohago gegewel hi lou luwai.
Bolo Yeisu hi lib hi pwatanik Kaiyapa, topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa, wana limiya, Logugui ana topankite ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogowa to.
Pita Yeisu i noulil ana bwaga i gan ana siga hi vin topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana bakubakuwa. Pita i tuk bakubaku gamwanaa inoke alonau ge totuwalali hi misiyo, nuwana ni kite hauna nihi ginol Yeisu elana.
Topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel, Yeisu ana woliwoli kakawi hi loyaan ge bosowaina nihi ba ni aliga.
Yaa nige etegana hi pwapwawa, bwagana gamagalau hi gewi hi nem ge wali ba kakakawi hi baunan. Yaka mulaa abwe gamagalau labui hi nem
ge hi ba, “Tau ya i ba, ‘Nau bosowaiu Yehoba wana Limi Bwabwalena na pasamwalekaleka inoke lan eton gamwanaa na tal al.’”
Yaka topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i lut ge i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Ga i ola ge nige analiya u lalahe? Baaba toto hi baunan kaiwem, ana sapu ga i ola?”
Yaa Yeisu i mikekei. Inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i baek elana i ba, “Yabowaine yawalina gaganina alana elana nu baaba tunahot, ge wama wasa nu pem ebo owa Mesaiya Yehoba Natuna, o nigeya.”
Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba, “I ola te wam baaba ei. He na baewa eliyamiu, bwaliga abwe nau Gamagal Natuna nuku kiteyau na misiyowa Yehoba Togasisi labena awonaa ge na neem yaluyalu pwatanaa.”
Yaka topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa i huga, inoke totona ana kaliko i kukuleli ge i ba, “Tau ya totona i ba heyan ge Yehoba alana i teli lowan. He besena to. Nige al ta loloya tage gamagalau nihi nem ge nihi baaba tau ya kaiwena. Iyaka ku hago i ba likalika.
Ga ku nuwatu ola?” Anana hi lahe hi ba, “I bosowaina hot ni aliga.”
Inoke maninina hi kuluve ge nimaliya elana hi nibinibihan. Enuna hi taganepanepal-an
ge hi ba, “Age owa Mesaiya? He u baem eliyama henala ge i nibihiwa.”
Pita i misiyowa bakubakuwa, inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali galokau avaliya etega i nem elana ge i ba, “He owa al ge Yeisu gagama Galili alona etega.”
Gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa inoke i alaha i ba, “Nige ya aatena te hauna gun u babaunan ei.”
Yaka i na i tagil abauluulutuk elana, inoke galok etega al Pita i kite ge i baek gamagalau bolo hi minamina o elal i ba, “Tau ya iya Yeisu gagama Nasaleta alona etega.”
Inoke Pita i alaha palabuina, i papasila ge i ba, “Tau o nige ya aatena.”
Sauga nige i yayapu, yaka gamagalau bolo hi taltalmilil o hi nem Pita elana hi ba, “Tunahot owa Yeisu wana boda avaliya etega, kaiwena anam ana gun i pamasaliwa owa gagama Galili.”
Inoke Pita i papasila i ba, “Ya baaba tunahot, tau o nige ya aatena. Binimala nige na babaa tunahot, Yehoba ni laheyau.” Sauga o kamkam melutauina i kahin,
inoke Pita Yeisu wana baaba i nuwatuan toto i ba: “Kamkam melutauina nige ga ni kakahin inoke nu alahagau paeton.” Yaka i na i tagil tola ge i kahin nabi.
Mweluluga kekeisi topowon bwabwatal gegewel avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tohouwa Yeisu ana logugui hi ginol ge nihi lopaaliga.
Inoke hi yowan ge hi en hi na hi teli Pilato, Loma wali gavana nimanaa.
Yudasa, Yeisu ana towasa, sauga i kite Yudiya hi ba Yeisu ni aliga, i nuwaleyan inoke mani silba ana gewi teti i pasikal topowon bwabwatal ge tohouwa elal.
I ba, “Ya gegi hot, kaiwena Yeisu nige wana nak i gagan inoke ya wasaan eliyamiu ge abwe nuku lopaaliga.” Hi baek elana hi ba, “Wama hauna ei! Totom am pulowan tei.”
Inoke Yudasa mani i yoho teli Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa ge i egon i na i gadisowa.
Topowon bwabwatal mani hi ahe ge hi ba, “Mani toto ya i saliya, inoke Logugui nige i tatalam ta ahe ge ta teli Limi Bwabwalena ana mani ana pwahin elana.”
Yaka mani o ana logugui hi ginol ge hi ahe bilibili etega hi pwamolaa tomibwabwali ali salai. Hi pwamolaa gamagal etega elana iya ulun ana toabab.
Heiya te kaiwena ana siga lan ebe bilibili o alana hi tun Panasasaliya.
Yaka palopita Yelemaiya wana baaba i tabwa tunahot toto i ba, “Mani toto Isileli gamagaliliyau hi talamwan ge tau o nihi pwamolaya, ana bwaya silba ana gewi teti, hi ahe
ge ulun ana toabab wana bilibili hi pwamolaya, i ola Yehoba wana baaba eliyau.”
Yeisu i talmilil Pilato matanaa, iya Loma wali gavana, inoke i neli i ba, “Owa Yudiya wali kin?” Yeisu i ba, “He i ola te wam baaba ei.”
Topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa Yeisu hi wole, yaa bwagana nige wana nak i gagan, nige etega analiya i lalahe.
Inoke Pilato i baek elana i ba, “Tab u hago bugul ehila kaiwena ge hi wolewa?”
Yaa Yeisu nige kekeisi etega analiya i lalahe, inoke Pilato nuwana i ahe.
Baliman maisena ge maisena, Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana, toulutuk dela toto ebo Yudiya nihi hile, Pilato ni sokal ge ni tagil.
He sauga o elana tau etega i miminaa dela, alana Balabas, iya wana pagan nanakina kaiwena inoke wasana i bwaya.
Inoke sauga boda hi nogogo, Pilato i nelil i ba, “Henala nuwamiu na sokal kaiwemiu, Balabas o ebo Yeisu toto hi ba Mesaiya?”
I ba ola o, kaiwena i atena bubun Yeisu hi lamwa pulowanan te hi ahe ge hi teli nimanaa.
Pilato iyoho abakot elana inoke lagona baaba i patuna eliyana i ba, “Tau ei nige wana gegi, bahi bugul etega nu giginol elana. Bulin ya kenonou iya kaiwena ge ya lovakun nabi.”
Yaa topowon bwabwatal ge Yudiya wali tohouwa boda ali pel hi teli ge nihi ba Pilato Balabas ni sokal ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga.
Yaka Pilato gamagalau i nelil i ba, “Ali toto eluwa ya, henala nuwamiu na sokal?” Hi ba, “Balabas.”
Inoke i nelil al i ba, “Hauna gun na ginol Yeisu toto hi ba Mesaiya kaiwena?” Gegewel hi ba, “U lokolosan!”
Yaka Pilato i nelil i ba, “Hauna kaiwena ge na lokolosan? Hauna nak i ginol?” Abwe hi yoga balbalgig hot hi ba, “U lokolosan!”
Pilato i atena nige al bosowaina kamwasa etega ni ginol, ge boda kelaubwa haveyan nihi ginol. Inoke wewel i ahe nimana i ul yoho boda mataliyaa ge i ba, “Tau ya wana yaomal bahi ana woliwoli etega ni nenem eliyau. Ana logugui i minewa eliyamiu.”
Gamagalau gegewel hi ba, “Wana yaomal ana woliwoli ni nem ama eliyama ge natumeyau elal.”
Inoke Balabas i sokal kaiweliya, ge i ba tolohaveyan hihiu eloelolina hi ahe Yeisu hi nibinibihan, yaka i teli tolohaveyan nimaliyaa nihi lokolosan.
Pilato wana tolohaveyan Yeisu hi en pwatanik logugui ana limi bwabwatana gamwanaa, inoke hi ba tolohaveyan bwalibwaligel hi nogogo ge Yeisu hi mipainan.
Ana kaliko hi leke yoho inoke kaliko yayapona matana pepol i ola kin ali kaliko, hi ahe ge hi pagaloi.
Pepesala hi ahe hi ginol ana hanahana ge hi teli kokowanaa. Suki etega hi ahe hi teli nimana awonaa i ola kin wali pagan, inoke hi loepwakoku matanaa ge hi talatalawasi-an hi ba, “Atema owa, Yudiya wali kin!”
Tuwana hi lokukuluvi-an ge suki hi ahe kokowana hi lololi.
Sauga hi talatalawasi-an i mowasi, inoke kaliko yayapona hi leke yoho ge totona ana kaliko hi pagaloi. Inoke hi en tagilan ge nihi na nihi lokolosan.
Sauga Yeisu hi en hi nanawa lokolos kaiwena, tau etega hi pwawa gagama Sailini, alana Saimon, inoke hi palawakik ge Yeisu ana kolos ni kalivai.
Hi vin panuwa etega alana Goligota. (Goligota ana sapu heiya “Pana Babaloma.”)
Inoke oine alona ge valam etega amnana hohogana hi vikuhiya ge hi pek elana, yaa sauga i im bose, i towani nige nuwana ni im.
Sauga hi lokolosan i mowasi, inoke tolohaveyan ana kaliko hi wali, yaka pat hi ahe galavenu etega hi galavenu-an, inoke eliyana kaliko ana pwahin tomaha tomaha hi guyauan elal.
Inoke hi misiyowa to ge hi matahikan.
Ana woliwoli hi lele inoke hi tagahikana kokowana pwatanaa, i ba, “Yeisu, Yudiya wali Kin.”
Tokaoma labui alonau hi lokolosil. Etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa ge etegana labena gegebanaa.
Gamagalau bolo hi nonopapalegi-an mataliya i nok hi kite, yaka kaunuliya hi loniknikan ge hi lamwa tunatuna-an
hi ba, “Valila u ba tage Limi Bwabwalena nu pasamwalekaleka ge lan eton gamwanaa nu tal al. He sauga ya totom u pwamwaliwa. Ebo owa Yehoba natuna, kolos u loluwan.”
Topowon bwabwatal, avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge Yudiya wali tohouwa, hi lamwa tunatuna-an i ola al to.
Hi ba, “Gamagalau getogal i pwamwalil, yaa nige bosowaina totona ni pwamwal. Tage iya Isileli wali kin! Totona kolos ni loluwan inoke naha abulilek-an.
Yehoba ana mel i teli. Ta kite ga sauga ya tab Yehoba nuwana ni pwamwal, kaiwena i ba, ‘Nau Yehoba Natuna.’”
Ge tokaoma bolo alonau hi lokolosil, heliya Yeisu hi sinalian al i ola to.
Alalati bwagatau, panuwa gegewena i gogou ana siga tili kilok.
Tili kilok ana labi elana, Yeisu analiya elana i yoga nabiyan i ba, “Eloi, eloi, lama sabakitani?” Baaba o ana sapu heiya, “No Yabowaine, no Yabowaine, hauna kaiwena ge u miluwagau?”
Gamagalau enuna bolo hi taltalmilila o, anana hi hago yaka hi ba, “Ilaitiya i yogaan to.”
Sauga o gamagal etega i patalelu i na balou i ahe, i pahun oine manumanunina elana ge i vinum, inoke i teliek suki matanaa ge i paelu heyan Yeisu i im.
Yaka alonau hi ba, “Ta matamatan ga ta kite tab Ilaitiya ni nem ge ni pwamwal.”
Yeisu i yoga nabiyan al, inoke yawalina i talamwan i mowasi.
Kaliko mamanana toto hi pakuki ge Limi Bwabwalena gamwana hi baba tomwaya, sauga o i maleli telipunek natiya i na i lau paiya. Mwaniknik i masal inoke bilibili i lamwalamwaniu ge pat hi mamagebal.
Salai i mwapwela inoke Yehoba wana gamagalau bolo hi aliga houwa, hi gewi hi lutan.
Ali salai hi lut luwan, ge Yeisu wana lut al enaa hi na hi ulutuk Yelusalema ge gamagalau hi gewi eliyalil hi masala.
Tolohaveyan bolo hi miminaa o avaliya wali tohouwa Yeisu hi matahikan, mwaniknik amnana hi anbose ge bugul gegewena toto i gan hi kite, inoke hi lovakun nabi ge hi ba, “Tunahot iya Yehoba Natuna!”
Yowau hi gewi hi talmililek laha ge mataliya i nok Yeisu hi gayawaan. Yowau bolo ya valila Yeisu hi toulil, avaliya hi neem Galili ge hi matahikan.
Gamwaliyaa, Meli Magidala yovana, valihina Meli toto Yemesa ge Yosepa hinaliya, ge etega al Sebedi natunau hinaliya.
Sauga panuwa i kokoyavi, towasawasa etega gagama Alimadiya, alana Yosepa, i nem, iya al Yeisu wana tohago etega.
I nok i na Pilato elana ge i awanun Yeisu tuwana ni ahe, inoke Pilato i ba nihi pek elana.
Yosepa Yeisu tuwana i ahe, kaliko vavaluna elana i osiya,
ge i na i teli totona wana salai vavaluna gamwanaa, toto abwe i ken tukan pat elana. Inoke pat bwabwatana etega i pakul pwatanik ge salai awana i paankaus, yaka i eguluwai.
He Meli, Magidala yovana, alona ge valihina hi misiyowa to, awoliya i nok salaiya.
Sabwata ana lan lovivina i mowasi, lan i gan al, inoke topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi hi nok Pilato elana.
Yaka hi baek elana hi ba, “Tonowak, ha nuwahikan tokakawi toto o, sauga nigeya ga i yayaomal i ba, ‘Lan eton ni mowasi inoke abwe na lut al.’
Inoke nu ba tolohaveyan nihi na salai nihi matahikan ana siga lan etonina ni mowasi. Ebo nige ta giginol ola o, tab wana tohago nihi nok nihi na tuwana nihi ahe ge nihi baek gamagalau elal nihi ba, ‘Iyaka i lut al.’ Inoke lokakawi toto ya nasi ni bwata hot, nige ni oola toto houhouwena.”
Pilato i baek topowon bwabwatal ge Palisi elal i ba, “I waisi, no tolohaveyan enuna nuku ahel nuku na nuku telel salai nihi matahikan. Nuku nok, ge bugul gegewena nuku ginol toto bosowaimiu nuku ginol ge salai ana matahikan ni waisi.”
Inoke hi na hihiu etega hi papi hikan salai bebena elana ge pat elana wali abaeuna, yaka tolohaveyan hi telel salai hi matahikan.
Lan Sabwata i mowasi, yaka wik ana lan houwan elana mweluluga kekeisi hot, Meli Magidala yovana alona ge valihina hi na hi kenan salaiya.
Mwaniknik bwabwatana i masal. Yehoba wana anelose etega i loem labulabumwa i na salaiya, pat i pakul yoho ge i misiyowa pwatanaa.
Maninina i namanamal i ola pinamal ge ana kaliko i yanayana i ola apwapwali.
Tolohaveyan bolo salai hi matamatahikan hi lovakun nabi ge hi ginu, inoke hi sogu bilibiliya, nige hi lamwalamwaniu, hi ola toaliga.
Anelose i baek yowau elal i ba, “Bahi lovakun! Ya atena Yeisu toto hi lokolosan ku loyaan.
He nige i gagan te, iyaka i lut, i ola wana baaba. Ku nem abana ku kite, toto i kenukenuwa.
Yaka etimwawa ku nok ku na wana tohago wali wasa nuku pek nuku ba, ‘Iyaka i lutem yaomala ge ni houwa awomiwa ni na Galili. Abwe nuku kiteya to.’ He wami wasa iyaka ya pewa te.”
Inoke yowau etimwawa salai hi tataluwai, hi lovakun, yaa yaliyaya ateliya i kalaopopwi, inoke hi patalelu hi na wana tohago wali wasa nihi pek.
Hi nanawa kamwasaa yaka Yeisu i pwawal ge i ba, “Atewau komiu.” Hi nem hi loepwakoku, aena hi pihikan ge hi kululu elana.
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Bahi lovakun! Ku na taliwau wali wasa ku pek nihi na Galili, abwe nihi kiteyauek to.”
Yowau hi nanawa kamwasaa, inoke tolohaveyan enuna bolo salai ana tomatahikan hi sikal hi na Yelusalema, ge bugul gegewena toto i masal hi wasaan topowon bwabwatal elal.
Inoke topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Yudiya wali tohouwa hi nogogo ge wali logugui etega hi ginol, inoke mani bwabwatana hi pek tolohaveyan elal.
Yaka hi baek elal hi ba, “Nuku ba gamagalau elal, ‘Ha kenu mati bulina te wana tohago hi nem tuwana hi ahe.’
Ebo wasa ya Pilato ni hago, ama abwe naha ba pasapu eliyana inoke nige nak etega nuku pwapwawa.”
Inoke tolohaveyan mani hi ahe ge hi ginol i ola topowon bwabwatal wali baaba elal. He gamagalau Yudiya wasa hi palelu ana siga lan ebe, tage Yeisu wana tohago hi na tuwana hi ahe.
Tohago ali toto elulutega maisena hi na Galili, oya toto valila Yeisu i baunan eliyalil.
Sauga hi kite, hi kululu elana, yaa enuna hi nuwa lalabui.
Yeisu i pelinok eliyalil inoke i ba, “Logugui ge gasisi gegewena labulabumwa ge panayawiya, iyaka Nam i pem elau.
He ku na gamagalau labi gegewena elal inoke nuku patohago-agil: nuku pababitaiso-agil Tamala alana elana, Natuna ge, Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ge,
i ola al logugui gegewena toto ya baunan eliyamiu nuku pankitel ge nihi toulil. Tunahot nau alomiu sauga gegewena ana siga panayawi ana abapwamowasiya.”
Yeisu Keliso Yehoba Natuna, wasana waiwaisana ana abatelipuna i ola to
palopita Aiseya i lelelian, Yehoba i ba: No elopapatuna na patuna houwa awomwa, iya wam kamwasa ni lovivina-an kaiwem.
Gamagal etega to i yogayoga uleya labi kekevana elana, i ba, “Babala wana kamwasa ku lovivina-an wana kela ku pasapu.”
Inoke Diyon i nem uleya gamagalau i papababitaisol ge i papaatena i ba, “Wami pagan nanakina ana en nuku pek ge nuku babitaiso, inoke Yehoba wami gegi ni nuwayoho.”
Gamagalau hi nem elana, hi neem Yudiya labena gegewena ge Yelusalema. Wali gegi hi wasaan inoke i pababitaisol wewel Yolidani elana.
Diyon ana kaliko heiya kaliko toto kamel pupunona elana hi ginoliya, ge henuwanina ana wasikewa bulumakau kunisina elana hi ginoliya. Aana heiya te sagagai ge luvi toto uleya.
I papaatena i ba ola hiwe, “Toto i nenem ewa, iya alana i bwaya, nau alau nige i bwabwaya. Nau nige no waisi i gagan tage bosowaiu na lokululu ge aena ana os ana hihiu na leke.
Nau ya pababitaisomiu wewel elana, yaa iya abwe ni pababitaisomiu Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana.”
Sauga o elana Yeisu i neem Nasaleta, labi Galili, inoke Diyon Yeisu i pababitaiso wewel Yolidani elana.
Yeisu i gaihem wewela, inoke sauga o i kite labulabum i mwapwela ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena i kite i ola bunibuni i laulau elana.
Yaka anan etega i loem labulabumwa i ba, “Owa natu nunuwanina hot; ya yaliyaya nabiyan kaiwem.”
Sauga o elana Yayaluwa Bwabwalena Yeisu i patuna i na uleya.
Lan poti i miminaa uleya alonau ge bwasumu bekikil, inoke Seitani Yeisu i papalawakik. Abwe aneloseyau hi nem ge Yeisu ana labe hi pek.
Kin Helodi Diyon i teli dela, enaa inoke Yeisu i na Galili ge Yehoba wasana waiwaisana i papaatena-an,
i ba, “Sauga iyaka i vin, Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa. Wami gegi ana en nuku pek ge wasa waiwaisana nuku abulilek-an.”
Yeisu i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa, inoke tologi labui i kitel, Saimon alona ge talina Andulu, wali vineya hi ahe ge hi logilogi hogaa.
Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Ku nem ku toulilau, inoke na paatenamiu komiu nuku tabwa gamagalau ali tologi.”
Etimwawa wali vineya hi eguluwan ge Yeisu hi toulil.
I nawanawa kekeisi al, inoke Yemesa, Sebedi natuna, alona ge talina Diyon i kitel wagaa, wali vineya hi lovilovivina.
Nige i matamatan inoke i yogaagil, yaka tamaliya Sebedi alonau ge wana totuwalali hi eguluwagiliya wagaa ge Yeisu hi toulil.
Hi na Kapeniyama, inoke lan Sabwata elana Yeisu i na limi tapwalolowa ge i panpankiti.
Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe wana panpankiti kaiwena. Nige i panpankiti i oola Logugui ana topankite, i ba bubun ya alona ge wana gasisi.
Sauga o elana tau etega iyoho to yayaluwa bibikena i holaviya elana. Inoke yayaluwa bibikena tau i pabaaba, ge i yoga i ba,
“Yeisu gagama Nasaleta, ga i ola ge u nem eliyama? Age nuwam nu apapanak-agima? Ya atenawa ya, owa Yehoba wana Gamagal Bwabwalena!”
Yeisu i ba lalaan i ba, “U mikekei! U tagil elana!”
Yayaluwa bibikena wana gasisi kaiwena tau tuwana i ginu nabi, inoke yayaluwa bibikena i loi ge i tagil, tau o i eguluwai.
Gamagalau nuwaliya hi ahe inoke hi nelnel avaliyau elal hi ba, “Hauna kaba panpankiti e? I vavaluna ge wana gasisi i gan! Tau ya, bwagana i baaba yayaluwa bibikel elal, anana hi hago.”
Inoke Yeisu wasana etimwawa i lelu Galili ana labi gegewena elana.
Sauga limi tapwalolo hi eguluwai, inoke avaliyau Yemesa ge Diyon hi na Saimon ge talina Andulu wali limiya.
Saimon yawana nevenak i kasiyebwa, tuwana i waiwai, iyoho i kenu wana abakenuwa, inoke Yeisu wana wasa hi pek.
Inoke i na elana, nimanaa i aheya ge i kukupalut. Yaka tuwana waiwaina i mowasi, inoke aanan i ginol i pek Yeisu ge alonau elal.
Kokoyavi o, sabwelu i lobek enaa, inoke gamagalau tokasiyebwa gegewel ge bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi ulutuk elal, hi ahel ge hi pwatanik Yeisu elana.
Panuwa ana tomina gegewel hi nogogo hi na limi o ana bakubaku hi pakalaopop,
inoke bolo ali kasiyebwa tomaha ge tomaha, Yeisu i pwamolol. I ola al yayaluwa bibikel hi gewi i patuna owaowa-agil, yaa nige i tatalam yayaluwa bibikel nihi baaba, kaiwena hi atena te henala iya.
Mweluluga kekeisi hot, nigeya ga i mwamwananal, Yeisu i lut, limi i eguluwai ge i na labi etega toto nige gamagalau hi miminaa, inoke i awanun Tamana elana.
Saimon ge alonau hi na hi loyaan,
ge sauga hi pwawa hi baek elana hi ba, “Gamagalau gegewel hi loyaagiwa.”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Ta nok ta na labena etega al, awan bolo gegelilaa ona, inoke na papaatena al elal. Heiya te kaiwena ge ya nem.”
Yaka Galili labena gegewena i nawaan, i papaatena wali limi tapwalolowa ge yayaluwa bibikel i takel tagilagil gamagalau elal.
Tolepelo etega i nem Yeisu elana i loepwakoku ge i awanun gagasisi elana i ba, “Ebo nuwam, i bosowaina nu abubunau.”
Yeisu alona ge wana atilomwan, nimana i paelu tau o i pihikan inoke i ba, “E, nuwau. Tuwam ni waisi!”
Sauga o elana, ana lepelo i mowasi ge tuwana i waisi.
Yaka Yeisu tau o i ba pagasisi ge i patuna i egon i ba,
“Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nu pepek. U nok u na ga topowon elana ge tuwam ni hile. Bwasumu ni powonan Yehoba elana am abwabubun kaiwena, ni ola Mosese wana Logugui, inoke gamagalau nihi atena tunahot tuwam iyaka i waisi.”
Yaa nige i giginol ola Yeisu wana baaba, i egon ge i telipuna i lowasawasa-an labena gegewena. Bugul o kaiwena inoke nige bosowaina Yeisu ni nomasamasal panuwa etega gamwanaa, eba boda nihi gewi hot, yaa i miminek ya labi bolo nige gamagalau hi miminaa. Yaa bwagana i ola o, gamagalau hi nemnem elana, hi noem labena gegewena.
Lan enuna i mowasi, yaka abwe Yeisu i sikal al i na Kapeniyama. Gamagalau wasa hi hago iyaka i vin,
ge hi gewi hi nowanik hi na elana. Inoke limi gamwana i kalaopop nige abamina etega al i gagan, i ola al limi ana nog tolinaa al ge. Yaka Yeisu i papaatena eliyalil.
Bolau esopali hi nem toelolol etega hi kalivai pwatanim.
Nuwaliya nihi pwatanik Yeisu elana, yaa nige bosowailiya kaiwena gamagalau hi gewi hot. Limi pwatana i abwab, inoke hi kalivai hi na hi ha limi pwatanaa ge limi pwatana hi pwelaa labi toto Yeisu i miminaa. Yaka toelolol ginebi wana abakenu hi pakuki lowan Yeisu manininaa.
Yeisu wali abulilek i kite, inoke i baek toelolol elana i ba, “Natu, wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho.”
Logugui ana topankite enuna heliya iyoho to avaliyau hi misiyo, yaka totoliya hi nuwanuwatu hi ola,
“Hauna kaiwena tau ya i ba ola o? Iya i ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba i hewa likaan! Nige gamagal etega bosowaina gegi ni nuwayoho, Yehoba maisena ya te bosowaina.”
Yeisu etimwawa i atena hauna hi nuwanuwatu-an ateliyaa, yaka i baek elal i ba, “Hauna kaiwena bugul ya ku nuwanuwatu-agil?
I mweyaha te ebo na ba, ‘Wam gegi Yehoba matanaa iyaka ya nuwayoho.’ Yaa i pulowan te ebo na ba, ‘U lut, wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa.’
He toto pupulowanina na baunan ge na ginol, inoke nuku atena al te Gamagal Natuna wana gasisi i gan panayawiya gegi ni nuwayoho.” Inoke i ba toelolol elana i ba,
“Na baewa elam, u lut wam abakenu u ahe ge u sikal wam limiya.”
Inoke tau i lut, wana abakenu i ahe ge i notagil gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa. Gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe ge Yehoba hi tobalan hi ba, “Nige sauga etega bugul ololana ya ha kikite.”
Yeisu i na al i nawanawa Hoga Galili bebenaa. Gamagalau boda bwabwatana hot hi na elana ge i panpankiti elal.
Yaka abwe i nawanawa al, inoke takis ana toahi etega alana Libai, iya Alipiyos natuna, i kite i misiyowa wana abatuwalaliya. Inoke i baek elana i ba, “U toulilau.” Yaka Libai i lut ge i toulil.
Yaka abwe i na Libai wana limiya. He takis ana toahi ge togegi hi gewi Yeisu hi toulil, inoke enuna hi nok avaliyau Yeisu ge wana tohago hi anan toyawa.
Logugui ana topankite enuna, heliya Palisi, hi kite Yeisu alonau togegi ge takis ana toahi hi anan, inoke hi nel wana tohago elal hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena alonau gamagalau bolo ololal o hi anan toyawa?”
Yeisu wali baaba i hago inoke i baek elal i ba, “Tomolu nige nuwaliya tosawasawal, tokasiyebwa ya te nuwaliya. Ya nem nige tage bolo hi ba ‘Ama tosasapol’ ge na yogaagil, yaa ya nem togegi te na yogaagil.”
Lan etegana Diyon Tobabitaiso wana tohago ge Palisi galebu hi palahikan tapwalolo kaiwena. Inoke gamagalau enuna hi nem Yeisu elana hi neli hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena Diyon wana tohago ge Palisi wali tohago galebu hi palahikan awanun kaiwena, yaa owa wam tohago nigeya?”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Ebo alolon ana hagali nihi ginol, tab toalolon melutauina wana heliyamwau galebu nihi palahikan, sauga ebo iya iyoho avaliya? Nigeya! Ebo toalolon melutauina iyoho avaliya, nige bosowaina nihi ginol ola.
Yaa ana sauga abwe ni vin, inoke topihigelgel toalolon melutauina ni ahek gamwaliyaa, yaka lan o elana abwe galebu nihi palahikan.
Kaliko vavaluna nige ta aahe ge holahola bebeyaunana mwahawanina ta bwabwaliniya, kaiwena ebo kaliko vavaluna ni kin pahipahi inoke mwahawan o ni pwabwata.
I ola al, nige oine vavaluna ta hoholek ana patuna bebeyaunana gamwanaa toto goti kunisina hi ginoliya. Ebo ta ginol ola o, he oine ana gasisi kaiwena goti kunisina ni maleli, inoke ni nak ge oine ni maligin. He oine vavaluna ta holek te ana patuna vavaluna gamwanaa toto goti kunisina hi ginoliya.”
Sabwata etega Yeisu i nosola witi ana eyowa etega gamwanaa. Wana tohago hi nawanawa yaka witi enona hi lokibwaan ge hi an.
Palisi hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba, “U kite, hauna kaiwena wam tohago Sabwata ana logugui hi leke?”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Age Deibid liwanina nige ku vavasili ga, ga i ginol ola sauga alonau ge alonau hi galebu ge nuwaliya aanan etega nihi an?
He saugena o Abaiyada i topowon bwabwatana, inoke Deibid i na i ulutuk Yehoba wana limiya, yaka beleid bwabwalena toto hi teliya Yehoba manininaa, topowon i ahe i pek Deibid i an. Yaa logugui i ba tage bahi gamagal etega beleid o ni aan, topowon ya te nihi an. Ge enuna al i pek alonau elal hi an.”
Yaka i baek al elal i ba, “Yehoba Sabwata i ginol gamagal kaiweliya, nige i oola tage gamagal i ginolil Sabwata kaiwena.
Inoke nau Gamagal Natuna, nau Sabwata al ana Babala.”
Sauga etega Yeisu i na i ulutuk limi tapwalolowa, tau etega iyoho to, nimana labi etega i aliga.
Gamagalau enuna nuwaliya Yeisu ana woliwoli nihi ginol, inoke mataliya hi lihikan elana ebo tau o ni pwamolu Sabwataa.
Yeisu i baek tau toto nimana alialigana elana i ba, “U lut, u nem u talmilil gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa.”
Inoke Yeisu gamagalau i nelil i ba, “Logugui ga i ba ola Sabwata kaiwena? Pagan waiwaisana ta ginol o ebo pagan nanakina? Gamagal yawalina ta pwamolu o ebo ta apanak?” Yaa gamagalau hi mikekei, nige anana hi lalahe.
Yeisu alona ge wana huga matana i lipwapwati elal, ge nuwana i nak kaiwena ateliya i gasisi, inoke i baek tau o elana i ba, “Nimwam u paelu.” Inoke nimana i paelu, ge nimana iyaka i waisi.
Yaka Palisi hi tagil hi na avaliyau ge gamagalau enuna bolo nunuwaliya Helodi wana logugui hi migogo, ge hi liwaliwan ga nihi ginol ola ge Yeisu nihi lopaaliga.
Yeisu alonau wana tohago panuwa hi eguluwan hi na Hoga Galili papaelinaa, ge gamagalau Galili boda bwabwatana hi nouliulil.
I ola al, Yeisu wana ginol wasana gamagalau hi hago, inoke hi gewi hi neem Yudiya, Yelusalema, labi Idumiya, wewel Yolidani labena leunati, ge labena Taya ge Saidoni elal.
Kaiwena boda i bwata hot, inoke i baek wana tohago elal waga etega nihi lovivina-an nonowe ge ni heya, inoke gamagalau bahi nihi mimipapahe.
He gamagalau hi gewi valila i pwamolol, inoke bolo hi kasiyebwa hi logasisi nuwaliya Yeisu tuwana nihi pihikan ge nihi molu.
Sauga ebo gamagalau bolo yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elal Yeisu nihi kite, yaka nihi sogu manininaa ge nihi yoga nihi ba, “Owa Yehoba Natuna.”
Yaa Yeisu yayaluwa bibikel i lolopwalil bahi nihi wawasaan te henala iya.
Yeisu i na i ha oyaa, inoke bolau bolo nuwana i yogaagil hi nem elana.
Inoke ali toto elulutega eluwa i hilel ge ali boda alana i tun apostolo. I baek elal i ba, “Iyaka ya hilemiu alowau komiu, inoke abwe na patunamiu nuku tagil wasa waiwaisana nuku papaatena-an,
ge wami gasisi ni gan yayaluwa bibikel nuku patuna owaowa-agil.”
Bolo i hilel ali toto elulutega eluwa alaliya i ola hiwe: Saimon (alana al i tun Pita);
Yemesa ge talina Diyon, Sebedi natunau (alaliya al Yeisu i tun Bowaneges, ana sapu heiya Gulumwawa Natunau);
Andulu, Pilipi, Batolomiu, Mataiyo, Tomas, Yemesa toto Alipiyos natuna, Tadiyas, Saimon toto i neem boda Seloti elal,
ge Yudasa Isikaliyota, iya Yeisu i wasaan.
Yeisu i na i tuk limi etega elana, yaka boda bwabwatana hi nogogo al hi na elana. He iya alonau wana tohago nige wali sauga i gagan ge tage nihi anan.
Sauga tutunau wasa hi hago tage nige i aanan, inoke hi nok nuwaliya nihi en, kaiwena hi ba, “Iyaka i kokona.”
Logugui ana topankite bolo hi neem Yelusalema hi ba, “He Tamudulele i ulutuk elana tei. Ge yayaluwa bibikel wali tohouwa wana gasisi elana te yayaluwa bibikel i papatuna owaowa-agil.”
Yaka Yeisu i yogaagil ge i liwan gohalibe elal i ba, “Tab Seitani bosowaina wana boda bolo yayaluwa bibikel ni patuna owaowa-agil?
Ebo abalogugui etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan, abalogugui o nasi nige ni gagasisi.
O ebo un etega boda ni palabui ge totoliya nihi lohaveyan, nasi nige ni gagasisi.
He i ola te Seitani wana abalogugui. Ebo boda nihi palabui ge nihi lohaveyan wali boda elana, nasi nige ni gagasisi, inoke wana abalogugui ni mowasi.
“Nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni ulutuk asiyala wana limiya ge wana gogomwau ni bugulan. Ebo nuwana, inoke ni yowan hikan ga, abwe wana limi bugubugulina ni bugul egonan.
“Na baewa eliyamiu, henala ebo pagan nanakina ni ginol ge ebo ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yehoba ni awatautau-an, he bosowaina ya gegi toto o Yehoba ni nuwayoho.
Yaa henala ni ba bwagabwaga ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni awatautau-an, he gegi toto o Yehoba nige ni nunuwayoho, kaiwena iya gegi mihomihotina i ginol.”
Yeisu i ba ola o, kaiwena Logugui ana topankite hi baaba hi ba, “Yayaluwa bibikena iyaka i ulutuk elana.”
Yaka Yeisu hinana ge talinau hi vin ge hi talmilil noleleya, inoke gamagal etega hi patuna i na i tuk tage ni yogaan.
Yaa boda heliya iyoho Yeisu hi mipainan, inoke abwe wana wasa hi pek hi ba, “Hinam ge talimwau heliya huwo noleleya o hi loyaagiwa.”
Yeisu i nel i ba, “Henala nain ge henalau taliwau?”
Inoke matana i lipwapwati gamagalau bolo hi mipainan elal ge i ba, “Nain ge taliwau heliya hiwe!
Henala ebo Yehoba wana nuwatu ni ginol iya te taliu, nu ge nain.”
Lan etega Yeisu i panpankiti Hoga Galili bebenaa. Boda bwabwatana hot hi nogogo ge hi mipainan, inoke i gaiha waga etega elana, i ota tagil noleleya ge i misiyo, yaa gamagalau hi minaa datuwa.
Wana panpankiti elana i liwan gohalibe inoke bugul i gewi i baunan eliyalil. I ba,
“Ku laegan! Tau etega i nok eyowaa, witi pwatumwina i yohi.
Sauga pwatum i yohi, enuna hi talek kamwasaa inoke bwasumu hi you tal ge hi anil.
Enuna hi talek manapatpata, ali bilibili waiwaisana nige i bwabwata. Etimwawa hi siun, kaiwena ali bilibili nige i babalu.
Yaa sauga sabwelu i ha, witi siunina i tonil yaka hi yakiwa, kaiwena ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun.
Pwatum enuna hi talek mwawin pepesala gamwaliyaa, yaka mwawin pepesala hi siun gagasisi inoke witi hi gig paaligal, inoke nige hi eenon.
Pwatum enuna hi talek bilibili waiwaisana elana inoke hi siun, hi bwata ge hi enon, tomaha ona enoliya. Enuna enoliya teti, enuna sikisti, ge enuna al wan handeled.”
Yaka Yeisu i ba, “Ebo tanamiu i gan, he no baaba nuku hago.”
Sauga Yeisu i mimwaumwau, inoke tohago bolo ali toto elulutega eluwa, avaliyau ge enuna al bolo avaliya Yeisu hi nawanawa, hi nem elana ge hi nel ba gohalibe ona ali sapu kaiwena.
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Yehoba wana abalogugui ana nuwatu misusumena iyaka i pamasal eliyamiu, yaa bolo tola ba gohalibe elana ya te ya liwaliwan elal.
Ya ginol ola o, inoke nihi mimi gagayawa, yaa nige nihi kikite, nihi mimi lalaegan, yaa nige nihi hahago ge nihi aatena. Binimala nihi atena, inoke nihi nuwasikal Yehoba elana ge wali gegi ni nuwayoho.”
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Age ba gohalibe ya ana sapu nige ku aatena? Ebo nige ku aatena, abwe ga nuku ola ge enuna al ali sapu nuku atena?
Tau toto i na eyowaa ge pwatum i yohi, iya i ola wasa waiwaisana ana toyohi.
Gamagalau enuna, heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek kamwasaa. Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago, inoke Seitani ni nem ge hauna toto toyohi i luwan ateliyaa ni kaluoe.
Enuna, heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek manapatpata. Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago, inoke etimwawa hi ahe hi teliek ateliyaa ginebi ge wali yaliyaya.
Yaa bugul maisena, wasa waiwaisana nige hi nuwanuwatu-an bubun ateliyaa, ewahililiya nige i lalau bubun, inoke wali sauga nige i yayapu. Sauga ebo pulowan hi pwawa o ebo gamagalau hi palomwanagil wasa waiwaisana kaiwena, etimwawa yayaluwaliya hi pil ge hi towani.
Enuna al, heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek mwawin nanakil pepesala gamwaliyaa. Heliya wasa waiwaisana hi hago,
yaa abwe panayawi yawalina ana nuwanuwatu, gogomwau ana nunuwana ge tuwan ana payaliyaya ana nuwatu i tuk elal. Inoke bugul bolo ya wasa waiwaisana hi gig paaliga ge nige enona i gagan.
Yaa gamagalau enuna, heliya hi ola pwatum bolo hi talek bilibili waiwaisana elana. Sauga wasa waiwaisana hi hago, inoke hi ahe ge hi teliek ateliyaa, inoke hi enon, enuna enoliya teti, enuna sikisti ge enuna al wan handeled.”
Yeisu i baek al elal i ba, “Ebo gamagal etega odam ni ton ge ni pwatanim ga ni teliya? Ulun ni ahe ni pom lowan? Age ni teliek bwana toto abakenu gabulanaa? Nigeya, nasi ni teliya teibol pwatanaa.
He bugul misusumel abwe nihi masal, ge bugul bolo gamagalau hi pahabobu abwe nihi masal mwananala.
Ebo tanamiu i gan, inoke no baaba nuku hago.”
Yeisu i ba al, “Baaba toto ku hago nuku nuwanuwatu-an bubun. Ebo nuku nuwanuwatu-an bubun heiya te nuku atena bubun. He luvi toto ku ginol ge ku pek alomiyau elal, heiya te abwe nuku ahe, ge ana etulan enuna al nuku ahe.
Henala wana aatena i gan, abwe Yehoba ni paetulan. Henala Yehoba ana aatena nige i gagan eliyana, hauna valila wana aatena kekeisi, Yehoba ni ahek yoho.”
Yeisu i ba al, “Yehoba wana abalogugui i ola hiwe. Tau etega witi pwatumwina i yohi wana eyowaa.
Bulina ni kenu ge lana ni lut, pwatum iyoho hi siusiun ge hi bwatabwata, yaa nige i aatena te ga hi siun ola.
Pwatum totona i siun bilibiliya ge abwe i enon: houwan nuwana i gan, abwe lanina i gan inoke enona i tagil.
Sauga enona i matuwa, yaka wana kilepa i ahe i na witi i tomwatomwa, kaiwena iyaka pahi ana sauga.”
Yeisu i ba al, “Hauna elana binimala Yehoba wana abalogugui ta papatini-aniya, o age hauna ba gohalibe elana ta pwamwananaliya?
He i ola ebwakil toto alana masted pwatumwina, iya pwatum gegewel bolo ta luluwan eyowaa wali tokekeisi hot.
Sauga ta luwan ge i siun, inoke bugul gegewel bolo hi siun eyowaa i bwata lakel, lalana i lobwata inoke bwasumu bolo hi youyou hawawala ali vata hi ginola ligumwina elana.”
Ba gohalibe ololana o hi gewi al Yeisu i baunan, inoke eliyana i papaatena gamagalau elal, i golugoluwa wali aatena elana.
Ba gohalibe eliyana ya te i baaba gamagalau elal, yaa ebo heliya ya alonau ge wana tohago, inoke bugul gegewena i pwapwamwananal elal.
Lan toto o kokoyavi hot elana, Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba, “Ta egon! Ta alupanet ta na labena etega al.”
Inoke tohago gamagalau hi eguluwagil ge hi na hi gaiha waga toto Yeisu i minaa ge i papaatena, yaka avaliya hi kuki, ge avaliyau waga enuna al hi lilitoyawa.
Mana gasigasisena i towa hogaa, inoke bagol i hol likalika wagaa, kelaubwa waga ni kalaopop ge ni lobek.
Yeisu iyoho i kenu aipunaa, kokowana i teliya kebeyalu pwatanaa. Yaka tohago hi na Yeisu hi palut ge hi baek elana hi ba, “Topankite, ga i ola ge nige u nuwanuwatu kaiwema? Kelaubwa naha yaomal te.”
Inoke Yeisu i lut i talmilil, yaka i baek mana elana i ba, “U mwatomwa,” ge i baek al bagol elana i ba, “U bakuhu.” Yaka mana i mwatomwa ge hoga i laumwal hot.
Yaka i baek wana tohago elal i ba, “Hauna kaiwena ku lovakun? Age nigeya ga wami abulilek i gagan?”
Tohago hi lovakun nabi yaka hi penelnel-agil hi ba, “Henala tau ya? Bwagana mana ge bagol, anana hi hago.”
Hoga hi alupanet-an hi na hi tan Gelasa wali labiya.
Sauga Yeisu i gailoem wagaa, yaka tau etega yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana, i neem salaiya i na Yeisu elana.
Tau ya i miminaa salaiya, ge nige bosowaina gamagalau nihi yowan hikan, bwagana ebo sen hi ahe hi yowaniya.
Sauga i gewi sen elana nimana ge aena hi yowaniya, yaa sen i kukutomwatomwa-agil, ge aiyan toto aena hi tagahikaniya i tatagagebagebal-an. Nige gamagal etega bosowaina ni pabakuhu.
Lan ge bulin i nononawanawa salaiya ge bwateti elal, i nonoyogayoga ge nibuka i aahe totona tuwana i lolokakaini-an.
Sauga tau o Yeisu i kitek laha, inoke i patalelu i na i loepwakoku awonaa.
I yoga anana i bwata hot i ba, “Yeisu, owa Yehoba Mihahaina Hot Natuna, nasi ga nu ginol ola-agau? Nu papasila Yehoba alana elana nige nu lalaheyau!”
He i yoga ola o, kaiwena Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba tau o elana i ba, “Yayaluwa bibikena, u tagil tau ya elana!”
Inoke Yeisu i neli i ba, “Alamwek?” Yaka yayaluwa bibikel tau hi pabaaba, ge i ba, “Alau Boda, kaiwena ha gewi.”
Ge i awanun hikahikani Yeisu elana i ba, “Bahi nu papatuna owaowa-agima labi ya elana.”
Bobu ali yawi bwabwatana hi anana to labilabiya, nige ali bwaga i yayapu elal.
Inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi awanun Yeisu elana hi ba, “U patunama naha na bobu elal, ge nu talam naha ulutuk elal.”
Yeisu i talam inoke yayaluwa bibikel hi tagil tau o elana ge hi na hi ulutuk bobu eliyalil. Bobu ali yawi o gamwanaa ali gewi tabam tu tausan, gegewel hi patalelu loek labilabiya, hi na hi lau hogaa, inoke hi unun.
Bolo bobu hi matahikagil etimwawa hi patalelu hi na panuwa bwabwatana ge awan kekeisi ona elal, inoke bugul ya wasana hi wasaan. Yaka gamagalau hi nok ge nihi kite hauna gun i gan.
Sauga hi na Yeisu elana, inoke tau toto valila yayaluwa bibikel ali boda hi holaviya elana, hi kite i misiyo kaliko i galoi ge wana nuwatu iyaka i sapu, inoke gamagalau hi lovakun.
Bugul o ana topekiti gamagalau wali wasa hi pek hauna i gan tau toto yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana, ge hauna i masal bobu elal.
Inoke gamagalau hi telipuna hi awanun gagasisi Yeisu elana tage wali labi ni eguluwan.
Sauga Yeisu i gaigaiha wagaa, inoke tau toto valila yayaluwa bibikel hi holaviya elana, i awanun Yeisu elana i ba, “Nuwau na nowa alou owa.”
Yeisu nige i tatalam, yaa i ba, “U sikal u na wam panuwaa, inoke tutumwau wali wasa nu pek hauna Yehoba i ginol kaiwem, ge wana mulolu eliyam ana bwata nu wasaan elal.”
Yaka tau o i egon ge bugul toto Yeisu i ginol elana i lowasawasa-an labi Dekapolis gamwanaa. Inoke gamagalau gegewel nuwaliya hi ahe.
Yeisu Hoga Galili i alupanet-an i sikal al i na i tan, inoke boda bwabwatana hi nogogo elana. Iya iyoho hoga bebenaa,
inoke Yudiya wali limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa etega, alana Yailo, i nem. Sauga Yeisu i kite, inoke i loepwakoku aenaa,
ge i awanun gagasisi i ba, “Natu meluyovana i kasiyebwa nabi, kelaubwa ni aliga. U nem u na nimwam u teli tuwanaa, inoke ni molu.”
Inoke Yeisu alona hi nok. Gamagalau boda bwabwatana hot hi nouliulil, enuna hi nawaa awonaa ge luluna labi labui.
Yova etegana iyoho avaliya, iya kasiyebwa welolo i ahe, baliman ana gewi elulutega eluwa saliyana i laulau.
Tosawasawal hi gewi hi sawasawal, ge wana mani gegewena iyaka i pwamowasiya elal, yaa nige kekeisi etega i momolu, ana kasiyebwa abwe i nak hot.
Sauga Yeisu wasana i hago, inoke i na boda gamwaliyaa, i noheem Yeisu enaa ge ana kaliko buhuna i pihikan,
kaiwena totona i nuwatu i ba, “Ebo ana kaliko ya te na pihikan, inoke na molu.”
Sauga yova Yeisu ana kaliko i pihikan, inoke sauga o saliyana i bakuhu nige al i lalau, ge amnana i anbose ana kasiyebwa iyaka i mowasi.
Yeisu etimwawa i atena gasisi iyaka i tagil elana, inoke i tagena sikal boda elal ge i nel i ba, “Henala o kaliko i pihikan?”
Wana tohago anana hi lahe hi ba, “U kite gamagalau ha gewi nabi te ha nopahipahi-agiwa ee, yaka u neli u ba, ‘Henala i pihikagau?’”
Yaa Yeisu iyoho ya matana i lililipwapwati, nuwana ni kite henala ana kaliko i pihikan.
Yova o i atena hauna i masal elana, inoke alona wana lovakun ge wana ginu i nem i loepwakoku Yeisu awonaa. Inoke hauna gun i gan elana ge hauna i ginol, gegewena i wasaan bubun Yeisu elana.
Inoke Yeisu i baek yova elana i ba, “Natu, wam abulilek i pwamolowa. U egon alom ge wam yaliyaya, kasiyebwa ya nige al ni sisikal elam.”
Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba, inoke gamagalau enuna hi noem limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa, Yailo, wana limiya, ge hi baek elana hi ba, “Natum iyaka i aliga. Topankite wana sauga bahi nu aapapanak-an al.”
Yeisu gamagalau wali baaba i hago, yaa nige i gogoluek elal, inoke i baek limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa elana i ba, “Bahi lovakun! Iyai te nu abulilek.”
Yeisu nige i tatalam tage gamagal etega alonau nihi nok, iyai te Pita, ge Yemesa alona ge talina Diyon.
Sauga hi vin limi tapwalolo ana tohouwa wana limiya, Yeisu gamagalau i kitel ge i hago analiya i gewi, hi lolokahin ge hi kahikahin lopili, analiya i bwaya.
Inoke i na i ulutuk limi gamwanaa, yaka i ba, “Ga i ola ge anamiu i gewi ge ku lolokahin? Wawaya nige i aaliga, i kenu ya.”
Yaa wana baaba gamagalau hi nivali. Yeisu i ba gamagalau hi tagilan, inoke wawaya tamana ge hinana, avaliyau tohago bolo alonau, i ahel ge hi na hi tuk lum toto wawaya i kenuwa.
Nimana i ahe ge i baek elana, “Talita koum!” Baaba ya ana sapu heiya “Galok, na baewa elam, u lut!”
Inoke sauga o i lut talmilil ge i nonawanawa. He wana baliman elulutega eluwa. Inoke bolo alonau hi tuk, nuwaliya hi ahe ginol o kaiwena.
Inoke Yeisu i ba pagasisel bugul o bahi nihi wawasaan gamagal etega elana, ge i ba aanan etega nihi ahe nihi pek wawaya ni an.
Yeisu panuwa o i tataluwai, inoke alonau wana tohago hi sikal hi na totona wana awana.
Lan Sabwata elana i na i panpankiti wali limi tapwalolowa. Gamagalau hi gewi wana panpankiti hi hago inoke ateliya i you, ge hi ba, “Wana aatena ga i aheya? Wana siba ga i noem ge ginol yawiyawi i ginolil?
Iya kapenta tei, Meli natuna, ge iya Yemesa, Yosepa, Yudasa ge Saimon taliliya. He nunau heliya iyahe te avalau e.” Inoke ateliya i elolol ge Yeisu hi pihigelgel-an.
Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Gamagalau gegewel palopita hi awatauwan, yaa tutunau ge wana panuwa gamagaliliyau ya te nige hi aawatauwan.”
Yaka nige bosowaina ginol yawiyawi ni ginola to, iyai te nimana i teli tokasiyebwa ehila ya tuwaliyaa ge i pwamolol.
Inoke Yeisu atena i you kaiwena nige wali abulilek i gagan. Yaka Yeisu i nopain awan maisena ge maisena i panpankiti gamagalau elal.
Inoke wana tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa i yogaagil hi nok elana, ge gasisi i pek elal yayaluwa bibikel nihi patuna owaowa-agil, yaka eluwa eluwa i patunal nihi tagil.
Ali logugui i pek elal i ba, “Bahi bugul etega nuku aahe wami nawanawa kaiwena, suki ya te nuku ahe. Bahi aanan o ebo kaliko ana nabwa nuku nonoahe, ge bahi mani nuku uusan ami belet ana pwaos elana.
Aemiu ana os nuku pahe, yaa ami holahola bahi ni eeluwa.
Ebo nuku ulutuk panuwa etega elana ge gamagal etega ni yoga pahemiu, inoke nuku minaa wana limiya ana siga panuwa o nuku eguluwai.
Ebo panuwa etega nige nihi yayaliyaya kaiwemiu ge nige wami baaba nihi hahago, inoke panuwa o nuku eguluwan ge aemiu papakovana nuku hapul yoho. Nuku ginol ola, inoke nihi atena abwe ali lahi nihi pwawa.”
Inoke hi tagil ge hi na hi papaatena hi ba, “Wami gegi ana en nuku pek.”
I ola al, yayaluwa bibikel hi gewi hi patuna owaowa-agil, ge tokasiyebwa hi gewi tuwaliya hi paenonu inoke hi pwamolol.
Kin Helodi Yeisu wana tuwalali wasana i hago, kaiwena Yeisu alana wasana iyaka i lelu. Gamagalau enuna hi ba, “Diyon Tobabitaiso iyaka i lutem yaomala. Heiya te kaiwena wana gasisi i gan ge ginol yawiyawi i awaawaginol.”
Yaa enuna hi ba, “Iya Ilaitiya.” Ge enuna al hi ba, “Iya palopita etega, i ola palopitau bolo houhouwel.”
Yaa Helodi, sauga Yeisu wasana i hago, inoke i ba, “He Diyon to! Valila ya ba mwamwalina hi gotomwa, yaa abwe i lutem yaomala.”
He valila Helodi Helodiyas i oe alona hi alolon, Helodiyas iya Helodi talina Pilipi, lagona. Diyon i mimi baaba Helodi elana i ba i ola, “Nige bosowaina talim lagona nu alolonan.” Baena, inoke Helodi wana totuwalali i patunal hi na Diyon hi lib, inoke hi yowan ge hi teliya dela.
<range>
Inoke Helodiyas Diyon i hugaan nuwana ni lol. Yaa nige i bosowaina,
kaiwena Helodi Diyon i lovakunan, i atena iya tau sasapona ge totuwalali bwabwalena, inoke i matahikan ya. Bwagana Diyon wana baaba nuwana i gewagewa-an, yaa nuwana te sauga gegewena wana baaba ni laeganan.
Sauga etega abwe Helodiyas wana sauga waiwaisana i pwawa ge Diyon ni lol, lan toto Helodi wana lan ab ana nuwahikan i ginol. Lan o elana aanan bwabwatana i ginol gamaman ana totuwalali bwabwatal avaliyau tolohaveyan wali tohouwa ge Galili wali tonowakau bwabwatal kaiweliya.
Helodiyas natuna meluyovana i na i tuk i saga, inoke Helodi alonau ge bolo hi ulutuk pati o elana, wana sagasaga kaiwena hi yaliyaya nabi. Inoke kin Helodi i baek galok o elana i ba, “Hauna gun ebo nuwam nu awanuni, inoke na pewa.”
Inoke i papasila i ba, “O sila nam, hauna gun ebo nu awanuni, bwagana ebo no abalogugui awalehina, nasi na talamwan elam.”
Inoke galok i tagil i na hinana elana i nel i ba, “Hauna gun na awanuni kin elana?” Hinana i ba, “Diyon Tobabitaiso balomana.”
Sauga o galok etimwawa i sikal i na i tuk kin elana ge wana awanun i baunan i ba, “Nuwau sauga ya Diyon Tobabitaiso mwamwalina nu gotomwa, balomana nu loke mwaha elana, nu pwatanim ge nu pem eliyau na kite.”
Yaka kin nuwana i nak nabi, yaa nige tage galok wana awanun ni towani, kaiwena iyaka i papasila bolo hi na pati o elana mataliyaa.
Inoke sauga o, kin i baek wana tolohaveyan etega elana ni na Diyon mwamwalina ni gotomwa ge balomana ni pwatanik elana. Yaka tau o i nok i na dela, Diyon mwamwalina i gotomwa,
ge i loke mwaha gamwanaa, inoke i pwatanik i na i pek galok elana, yaka abwe galok i na i pek hinana elana.
Sauga Diyon wana tohago wasa hi hago, inoke hi nok hi na tuwana hi ahe ge hi na hi teli salaiya.
Inoke apostolowau hi sikal hi na Yeisu elana, ge tuwalali bolo hi ginolil ge toto hi panpankiti-an, gegewena hi wasaan elana.
He gamagalau hi gewi hi nem nowa, Yeisu alonau wana tohago nige wali sauga waiwaisana i gagan ge tage nihi anan. Inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba, “Komiu awawamiu, alowau komiu ta na papaeliya, inoke nuku veyaho kekeisi ga.”
Yaka heliya ya awawal, hi heya wagaa hi nana papaeliya.
Yaa gamagalau hi gewi hi kitel hi kuki tagil, ge hi atena te Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago heliya to. Inoke hi noem panuwa tomaha ona, ge aeliyaa hi patalelu hi na hi vin houwa labi toto Yeisu ge wana tohago hi nonoek.
Sauga Yeisu i gailau, boda bwabwatana i kitel, inoke atena i lomwanagil kaiwena heliya hi ola sipi nige ali tomatahikan. Inoke i telipuna bugul hi gewi i panpankiti-an elal.
Yaka panuwa i kokoyavi, inoke wana tohago hi nem elana hi ba, “Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan ge kelaubwa bulin ni gan.
Gamagalau u patunal nihi egon nihi na awan bwabwatal ge awan kekeisi ona elal bolo kelaubwaa, ge aliya nihi pwapwamola.”
Yaa Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Komiu aanan etegana nuku pek nihi an.” Tohago hi baek elana hi ba, “Age nuwam mani silba ana gewi tu handeled naha ahe naha na beleid naha pwamola ge naha pek nihi an?”
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Beleid ehila eliyamiu? Ku na ga ku kite.” Sauga hi na hi kite, inoke hi ba, “Nimala panuna ya, ge moti eluwa.”
Inoke Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal gamagalau ali pwahin ona nihi ginolil, ge nihi ba nihi misiyoan mwawin pwatanaa.
Yaka gamagalau hi misiyo ali pwahin tomaha tomaha, pwahin enuna ali gewi wan handeled ge enuna ali gewi pipti.
Inoke Yeisu beleid nimala panuna ge moti eluwa i ahe, matana i lihin labulabumwa ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana. Inoke beleid i pigebagebal-an, i pek wana tohago elal ge heliya abwe hi guyauan gamagalau elal. Moti eluwa al i pigebagebal-an, i pek wana tohago elal ge hi guyauan gamagalau elal.
Gamagalau gegewel hi anan tineliya i kiya,
inoke wali an teli tohago hi abubun, beleid ge moti ali egowa elulutega eluwa.
Bolo hi anan, bolau ali gewi paib tausan.
Sauga o, Yeisu i ba wana tohago hi gaiha wagaa nihi houwa nihi alupanet nihi na Betesaida, ge iya gamagalau ni patunal nihi egonan.
Wana tohago hi kuki enaa, inoke iya i na i ha oyaa ge i awanun.
Panuwa iyaka i kokoyavi, waga iyoho ya hoga Galili nuwanaa, ge Yeisu maisena ya iyoho panuwaa.
I kite tohago hi leva alaliga, kaiwena mana i yu pahanal. Inoke mweluluga kekeisi tili kilok ge sikis kilok ali hawawala, Yeisu i nem eliyalil i nawaa hoga pwatanaa. Kelaubwa ni nopalegel,
yaka hi kite i nawanawa hoga pwatanaa inoke hi nuwatu tage iya gagayumwa. Inoke hi loi,
kaiwena gegewel hi kite ge hi lovakun. Yaa etimwawa Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Atemiu ni matuwa! Nau te. Bahi lovakun!”
Yaka i gaiha wagaa, inoke mana i mwatomwa. Tohago nuwaliya hi ahe hoti,
kaiwena bwagana hi kite beleid nimala panuna ya i ahe boda i paanil, yaa Yeisu wana gasisi nige hi aatena bubun, kaiwena wali aatena i pulowan.
Hoga hi alupanet-an hi na hi tan panuwa Genesaleta, inoke waga ana anka hi alipalo.
Sauga hi gailoem wagaa, gamagalau Yeisu hi kite ge hi atena iya to.
Yaka gamagalau hi patalelu hi na panuwa tomaha ona labi o elana, inoke tokasiyebwa hi ahel ge ginebi wali abakenu hi kalivail, inoke ebo Yeisu wasana ga hi hagoek, yaka tokasiyebwa hi pwatanik elana.
Hauna labi i nonoek, ebo panuwa bwabwatal o ebo awan kekeisi bolo hi minaa uleya, gamagalau tokasiyebwa hi pwatanik ge hi teleliya abamaket elana. Hi awanun elana tokasiyebwa Yeisu ana kaliko buhuna ya nihi pibose, inoke bolo hi pibose, gegewel hi molu.
Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite enuna hi neem Yelusalema hi na Yeisu hi mipainan.
Hi kite Yeisu wana tohago enuna hi anan, inoke hi nuwatu tage nimaliya i biki, kaiwena nimaliya nige hi uul i oola wali tapwalolo ana logugui, toto Palisi hi panpankiti-an.
He Palisi ge Yudiya gegewel nige nihi aanan ga ana siga nimaliya nihi ul ni ola wali tapwalolo ana logugui, toto i neem tubuliyau elal.
Ebo nihi neem abamaket elana, nigeya ga nihi aanan ana siga nihi highig. I ola al logugui hi gewi i neem tubuliyau elal hi toulil, ololana kom, ulun ge mwaha ali ulul.
Inoke Palisi ge Logugui ana topankite Yeisu hi neli hi ba, “Ga i ola ge wam tohago logugui toto i neem tubulau elal nige hi totoulil, yaa nimaliya nige hi uul yaka hi anan?”
Analiya i lahe i ba, “Tokakakawi komiu! Palopita Aiseya i ba bubun ya, kaiwemiu valila i lelelian i ola hiwe: Yehoba i ba, ‘Gamagalau ya hohopeliyaa hi awatauwagau, yaa ateliya ana bwaga i yapu elau.
Wali tapwalolo eliyau i ola bugul bwagabwaga, gamagalau wali nuwatu hi panpankiti-an tage Yehoba wana logugui.’
Komiu Yehoba wana logugui ku towani, ge logugui bolo gamagalau hi ginolil ku kukuhikan.”
Inoke i ba vevehe al i ba, “Age komiu ku siba te Yehoba wana logugui ku towani, inoke totomiu wami logugui ku pagasisi!
He Yehoba wana logugui Mosese i baunan i ba, ‘Tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil,’ ge i ba, ‘Henala ebo tamana ge hinana ni ba panakil nihi tagapaaliga.’
Yaa komiu ku ba ola hiwe: Ebo bugul enuna i gan gamagal etega elana tage tamana ge hinana ali labe kaiwena, he i waisi ya ebo nige ni pepek elal ge nige ni lalabel. Komiu ku ba i bosowaina ya ni baek elal ni ba, ‘Bugul bolo tage ya pepewa iyaka ya ba pwatanek Yehoba elana, he yaka nige na pepewa.’
<range>
Ku ba ola o, he yaka Yehoba wana logugui ku hewa likaan to, ge ku golugoluwa totomiu wami panpankiti elana toto i noem tubumiyau elal. Ge i ola al, bugul ololana o hi gewi ku ginolil.”
Yeisu boda i yogaagil al hi na elana ge i ba, “Gegewemiu ku laegan elau, ge bugul ya nuwamiu ni sapuan.
Toto i tuka awalaa nige i papabikela, yaa toto i tagilem gamagalau elala heiya te i pabikela.
Ebo tanamiu i gan, inoke no baaba nuku hago.”
Yeisu boda i eguluwagil i na i tuk limi gamwanaa, inoke wana tohago hi na hi neli ba gohalibe o ana sapu kaiwena.
Yeisu i ba, “Age nigeya ga nuwamiu i sasapu? Age nige ku aatena toto i neem tola ge i tuka awalaa nige i papabikela?
Kaiwena nige i loloek atelaa, i loek tinelaa ge i nopasapu i noek wana kamwasaa.” (I ba ola o, inoke i ba aanan gegewel i bosowaina ta anan ya, nige nihi papabikela.)
Inoke i ba vevehe al i ba, “Toto i tagilem gamagalau elala heiya te i pabikela.
Kaiwena nuwatu nanakina i neem awaa atelaa: loneganega, kaoma, taulol, ganawal,
tomemek, pihigelgel paganina, kakawi, neganega pagapaganina, matamomoni, loloba, hanaha ge sigasiga.
Nak bolo ya gegewel hi neem atelaa, ge heliya te i papabikela!”
Yeisu awan o i eguluwan i na labena Taya. I na i tuk limi etega elana, nige nuwana gamagalau nihi atena te iya iyoho, yaa nige bosowaina ni mibunsumi.
Yova etegana natuna meluyovana yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana, Yeisu wasana i hago inoke i na i loepwakoku Yeisu aenaa,
ge i awanun elana yayaluwa bibikena ni patuna owaowani natuna elana. He yova ya nige Yudiya yovana i oola, hi aba labena Ponisiya, Siliya gamwanaa.
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Tabam nige i sasapu ebo na labewa. Wawayau nihi anan houwan ga. Nige bosowaina wawayau aliya ta ahe ge ta alihinek wanuka elal.”
Yova o Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Ibwe, Babala. Yaa wanuka bolo teibol gabulanaa wawayau wali an pwamumum hi aan, inoke bosowaina ya nu labeyau.”
Inoke Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Wam baaba o kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena natum iyaka i eguluwan, inoke nu sikal ga wam limiya.”
Yova i sikal wana limiya, inoke natuna i kite i kenuwa wana abakenuwa, ge yayaluwa bibikena iyaka i eguluwai.
Yeisu Taya ana labi i eguluwai, i nosolaa Saidoni, i na i lau Hoga Galili, ge i na labena Dekapolis elana.
Labena o elana gamagalau enuna tau etega hi pwatanik Yeisu elana, tau o tanana i tui ge baaba i ba hapuhapul-an. Inoke hi awanun Yeisu elana nimana ni teli tau o elana ge ni pwamolu.
Yeisu tau o i ahe boda hi eguluwagil hi na hi mimwaumwau, inoke nimana i teli tananaa, iya nimana i kuluve, ge tau o memena i pihikan.
Yeisu matana i lihin labulabumwa, i yana yoho ge i baek tau elana i ba, “Epata,” ana sapu heiya, “U mwapwela!”
Sauga o elana, tau tanana i mwapwela, memena i palamwalamwaniu ge i baaba bubun.
Yeisu i ba lopwalil bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nihi pepek. Yaa bwagana i lolopwal, yaka abwe wana ginol wasana hi papalelu.
Bolo wasa hi hago nuwaliya hi ahe hoti, yaka hi ba, “Bugul gegewena i ginol bubunil! Totanatui tanaliya i pwela baaba hi hago, ge bolo analiya i nak hi baaba.”
Sauga etega al boda bwabwatana hi nogogo Yeisu elana, aliya i mowasi, inoke Yeisu wana tohago i yogaagil hi nem elana ge i ba,
“Gamagalau ya nuwau i nakagil, kaiwena lan eton avalau ta mina, yaka nige aliya i gagan.
Ebo galegalebol ya na patunal nihi sikal wali awana, nasi nihi wesal kamwasaa, kaiwena enuna hi neem labena yayapona elal.”
Wana tohago hi baek elana hi ba, “Panuwa ya ana bwaga i gan, aanan ga ta aheya ge gamagalau ta paanil?”
Inoke Yeisu i nelil i ba, “Beleid ehila eliyamiu?” Hi ba, “Nimala panuna eluwa ya.”
Yaka i ba boda hi misiyoan bilibiliya, inoke beleid seben i ahel ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana, i pigebagebal-an inoke i pek wana tohago nihi guyauan gamagalau elal, inoke hi ginol ola.
Moti kekeisi enuna i gan al, inoke Yeisu i ahel, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana kaiweliya, ge i ba wana tohago hi guyauan al.
Gamagalau hi anan tineliya i kiya, inoke abwe wali an teli tohago hi abubun ge ana egowa nimala panuna eluwa hi ahe.
Bolo hi anan, bolau ali gewi tabam po tausan. Sauga i patunal hi egonan,
iya i gaiha wagaa, inoke alonau wana tohago hi kuki hi na labena Dalmanuta.
Palisi enuna hi nem avaliya Yeisu hi awabalgig. Nuwaliya nihi labose inoke hi ba, “Ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol, inoke naha atena tunahot wam gasisi i neem Yehoba elana.”
Yeisu yayaluwana i pulowan inoke i yana yoho nabiyan ge i ba, “Hauna kaiwena komiu heyan ya nuwamiu abapankite na ginol eliyamiu? Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, nige abapankite etega na giginol nuku kikite.”
Inoke i eguluwagil, i sikal i na i ha wagaa, ge alonau wana tohago hi kuki hi alupanet hi na labi etega al.
Tohago hi nuluwan nige beleid etega hi aahe, beleid maisena ya te i miminaa wagaa.
Yeisu wana tohago i ba pagasisel i ba, “Matamiu ni mwaun ge nuku matahikagimiu Palisi wali yis ge Helodi wana yis kaiwena.”
Tohago hi peawaawota-agil hi ola, “I ba ola o kaiwena nige beleid etega ta pwapwatanim.”
Tohago wali peawaawota Yeisu i atena, inoke i baek elal i ba, “Ga i ola ge ku peawaawota-agimiu beleid kaiwena? Age nige nuwamiu i sasapu ge ku aatena ga? Age wami abulilek i pulowan!
Age matamiu i gan, yaa nige ku kikite, tanamiu i gan, yaa nige ku hahago! Ge nige ku nunuwahikan?
Tab ku nuwahikan sauga beleid nimala panuna ya pigebagebal-an ge gamagalau paib tausan hi an, sauga o an teli ana egowa ehila ku ahe?” Tohago hi ba, “Elulutega eluwa.”
Yaka i ba, “Ge sauga al beleid nimala panuna eluwa ya pigebagebal-an, gamagalau ali gewi po tausan kaiweliya, sauga o an teli ana egowa ehila al ku ahe?” Tohago hi ba, “Nimala panuna eluwa.”
Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “He, age nigeya ga nuwamiu i sasapu?”
Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi tan Betesaida, inoke gamagalau enuna tomatakai etega hi en pwatanim ge hi awanun Yeisu nimana ni teli elana.
Yeisu tomatakai nimana i ahe ge i en hi tagil hi na panuwa bebenaa. Yaka Yeisu tomatakai matana i kuluve ge nimana i teli elana, inoke i neli i ba, “Tab bugul etega u kite?”
Tomatakai matana i lihin yaka i ba, “E, gamagalau ya kitel, yaa ali awa i ola ebwakil hi nononawanawa.”
Yeisu nimana i teli al tomatakai matanaa, inoke matana i mwapwela, nige al i kakai, ge bugul gegewena i kite bubun.
Yeisu tau o i patuna i egon i ba, “Bahi nu tutuk sikal panuwa ya elana, yaa nu egon nu na wam awana.”
Inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi egon hi na Sisaliya Pilipai awanina ona elal. Hi nawanawa kamwasaa inoke i nelil i ba, “Gamagalau hi ba tage henala nau?”
Anana hi lahe hi ba, “Enuna hi ba owa Diyon Tobabitaiso, enuna hi ba owa Ilaitiya, ge enuna al hi ba owa palopitau ona etega.”
Inoke i ba, “Yaa komiu, ku ba tage henala nau?” Pita anana i lahe i ba, “Owa Mesaiya.”
Inoke Yeisu wana tohago i ba pagasisel bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nihi pepek iya henala.
Yaka Yeisu i telipuna i pamasal wana tohago elal i ba, “Gamagal Natuna abwe palopalomwan gegewena ni pwawa, inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa, topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite abwe nihi towani ge nihi lopaaliga, inoke lan eton ni mowasi abwe ni lut al.”
Baaba ya i pwamwananal bubun elal. Inoke Pita Yeisu i ahe hi na hi mihuwala, ge i telipuna i lopwali baaba o bahi ni babaunan.
Yaka Yeisu i tagena sikal, matana i nok wana tohago elal, ge Pita i yana lalaan i ba, “Seitani, u miegon eliyau! Wam nuwatu nige i nonoek Yehoba wana kamwasaa, i noek gamagalau wali nuwatu elana.”
Inoke Yeisu boda avaliyau ge wana tohago i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba, “Ebo etega nuwana ni toulilau, totona wana waisi ni towani, ana kolos ni ahe ni kalivai, ge ni toulilau.
Kaiwena henala ebo nuwana totona yawalina ni pwamwal, nasi ni payaomal, yaa henala ebo yawalina ni payaomal nau kaiweu ge wasa waiwaisana kaiwena, he nasi yawalina ni pwamwal.
Hauna ana waisi ebo gamagal etega panayawi gegewena ni ahe ni logugui-an, yaa yawalina ni payaomal?
He nige bugul etega bosowaina ni ahe ge yawalina ni pwamola pasikal.
Ebo gamagal etega ni puluwawi-agau ge no baaba ni puluwawi-an heyan golu gegetogal ge sisigal ya gamwaliyaa, he nau Gamagal Natuna na puluwawi-an, sauga ebo na sikalim alou Nam wana wasawasa ge alowau aneloseyau bwabwalel.”
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, gamagalau enuna heliya iyahe te Yehoba wana abalogugui nihi kite ga ni nem alona ge wana gasisi, mulaa abwe nihi yaomal.”
Lan esiwa (6) i mowasi, inoke Yeisu tohago eton i ahel, Pita, Yemesa ge Diyon, alonau hi na hi ha oya mihahaina etega elana, hi na heliya ya hi mimwaumwau. Inoke ana awa gegetogana i masal mataliyaa.
Ana kaliko i wawakeki hot ge i namanamal, kaliko bolo gamagalau panayawi hi ulil nige etega wana wawakeki i oola.
Inoke tohago eton hi kite Ilaitiya ge Mosese hi masal, avaliya Yeisu hi liwaliwan.
Yaka Pita i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Topankite, i waisi te kila iyahe ee. Inoke gonu eton naha ginolil, etegana owa, etegana Mosese, ge etegana Ilaitiya.”
He Pita alonau ge alonau hi lovakun, inoke nuwana i gewagewa ge i baaba ya.
Inoke yaluyalu i nem i pahabobol, ge anan etega i neem yaluyaluwa i ba, “Toto ya natu nunuwanina hot. Nuku laegan elana.”
Sauga o tohago mataliya hi lipwapwati, yaa nige gamagal etega al hi kikite, Yeisu maisena ya.
Sauga hi laulau oyaa, inoke Yeisu i baek tohago elal i ba, “Bahi gamagal etega wana wasa nuku pepek bugul toto ku kikite kaiwena, ana siga Gamagal Natuna ni lutem yaomala.”
Hi ginol ola Yeisu wana baaba, yaa totoliya ya hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba, “Ana sapu ga i ola ge lutem yaomala bana i baaba?”
Inoke hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena Logugui ana topankite hi ba tage Ilaitiya ni nem houwa, mulaa abwe Mesaiya ni nem?”
Yeisu tohago analiya i lahe i ba, “Tunahot Ilaitiya ni nem houwa, inoke bugul gegewena ni abubun. Yaa hauna kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba Gamagal Natuna lomwan ni pwawa ge nihi pihigelgel-an?
Yaa na ba eliyamiu, Ilaitiya iyaka i nem haba ge gamagalau bugul bolo hi nuwatuan hi ginol ya eliyana, i ola to Buki Bwabwalena i baunan iya kaiwena.”
Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago ali toto eton hi sikal hi na avaliyau elal, inoke hi kite boda bwabwatana tohago hi mipainan-agil, ge avaliyau Logugui ana topankite hi awaawabalgig.
Sauga gamagalau gegewel Yeisu hi kite, ateliya i you ge hi patalelu hi na elana avaliya hi mulolu.
Yeisu i nelil i ba, “Alomiyau Logugui ana topankite hauna gun ku awabalgigi?”
Tau etega iyoho boda gamwanaa, Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Topankite, natu ya pwatanim eliyam, kaiwena yayaluwa bibikena i ulutuk elana ge nige bosowaina ni baaba.
Sauga ebo yayaluwa bibikena wana gasisi ni lut elana, ni gaisogu bilibiliya, polu ni tagil awanaa, ni alavekilal ge ni toelolol. Ya baek wam tohago elal tage yayaluwa nihi patuna owaowani, yaa nige bosowailiya.”
Yaka Yeisu i ba, “Ee komiu, nige wami abulilek i gagan! Iyaka sauga i yapu te alowau komiu ta miminaa e! Paehila na palahikan kaiwemiu? Geman ya ku pwatanim elau.”
Yaka geman hi pwatanim elana. Sauga yayaluwa bibikena Yeisu i kite, yaka geman i pakikiuha al, inoke i gaisogu bilibiliya, i kul nawanawa ge polu i tagil awanaa.
Yeisu i nel geman tamana elana i ba, “Hauna sauga kasiyebwa ya i telipuna elana?” Tamana i ba, “Vetiga kekeisina te kasiyebwa ya i masal.
Sauga hi gewi ni tagapasoguek ginahaa o ebo wewela, ge tage ni aliga. Ebo bosowaim, inoke nu atilomwan-agima ge nu labema.”
Yeisu i ba, “Ga i ola ge u ba, ‘Ebo bosowaim?’ Henala ebo ni abulilek, Yehoba i bosowaina bugul gegewena ni ginol elana.”
Etimwawa geman tamana i ba masal, “Ya abulilek. Yaa nige no abulilek i bwabwata, inoke nu labeyau ge ni bwata.”
Sauga Yeisu i kite boda iyoho hi nenemnem elal, inoke i baek yayaluwa bibikena elana i ba, “Yayaluwa toto gamagalau tanaliya u papatui ge nige bosowailiya nihi baaba, na baewa elam, u ulutagil geman elana, ge bahi nu tutuk sikal al elana!”
Yaka yayaluwa bibikena i loi ge geman i pakikiuha nabiyan, inoke i ulutagil elana. He geman ana awa i ola hot toaliga ali awa, inoke gamagalau hi ba, “Iyaka i aliga.”
Yaa Yeisu i aheya nimanaa ge i kukupalut, inoke i talmilil.
Sauga Yeisu i na i tuk limi gamwanaa, inoke wana tohago, heliya ya, hi neli hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena ama nige bosowaima naha ba ge yayaluwa bibikena ni tagil?”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Yayaluwa bibikena ololana o nige bosowaina ta ba ni tagil, iyai te ebo ta awaawanun.”
Panuwa o hi eguluwai ge hi nosolaa labi Galili gamwanaa. Yeisu nige nuwana gamagalau nihi atena te alonau ge wana tohago ga hi noek,
kaiwena iya nuwana ni panpankiti wana tohago elal. I baek elal i ba, “Gamagal Natuna kelaubwa abwe nihi talamwan gamagalau nimaliyaa, inoke nihi lopaaliga ge lan etonina elana abwe ni lut al.”
He tohago nige nuwaliya i sasapu Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena, yaa hi puluwawi yaka nige hi neneli elana.
Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na hi vin Kapeniyama. Sauga hi na hi tuk limiya, yaka wana tohago i nelil i ba, “Hauna ku awabalgigi kamwasaa?”
Hi mikekei nige analiya i gagan, kaiwena kamwasa elana hi peawaawabalgig te henala eba gamwaliyaa alana i bwata.
Yeisu i misiyo, yaka wana tohago elulutega eluwa i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba, “Henala ebo nuwana ni tabwa tohouwa, totona ni teli lowan ni mimula hot, ge ni tabwa totuwalali alonau gegewel elal.”
Inoke Yeisu wawaya kekeisi etega i ahe i patalmilil gamwaliyaa ge nimana i latapainan wawaya henuwaninaa. Inoke i baek elal i ba,
“Henala ebo alau elana wawaya kekeisi etegana ololana ya ni yoga pahe, he iya i yoga paheyau; ge henala ebo ni yoga paheyau, nige tage nau ya te i yoga paheyau, yaa i yoga pahe al toto i patunau.”
Diyon i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Topankite, tau etega ha kite alam elana yayaluwa bibikena i patuna owaowa-agil, inoke ha lopwali bahi ni giginol al, kaiwena iya nige avala etega i oola.”
Yeisu i ba, “Bahi nuku lolopwali. Nige bosowaina gamagal etega alau elana ginol yawiyawi ni ginol ge sauga o baaba nanakina al ni baunan kaiweu.
Kaiwena henala ebo nige i pipihigelgel elala, he iya avala.
Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, henala ebo wewel ni wage ni pewa nuku im kaiwena komiu Keliso wana tohago, he molana nige ni kakala abwe ni ahe.
“Ebo pat pupulowanina ta gimwan gamagal mwamwalinaa ge ta alipalo hogaa, he lahi o nige i bwabwata hot. Yaa Yehoba lahi bwabwatana hot ni pek gamagal elana, henala ebo tokekeisi etegana toto i abulilem elau ni pagegi ge ni sogu, tokekeisi ololana wawaya ya.
Ebo nimwam etega ni pagegewa, nu gotomwa yoho. I waisi te nimwam etega nige ni gagan ge yawal hot nu pwawa, bahi nimwam labui nu uulutuk Gehena elana, ginaha toto nige sauga etega ni totobolu.

Ge ebo aem etega ni pagegewa, nu gotomwa yoho. I waisi te aem etega nige ni gagan ge yawal hot nu pwawa, bahi aem labui nihi aalitukagiwa Gehena elana.

Ebo matam etega ni pagegewa, nu bwana yoho. I waisi te matam maisena ge nu ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana. Yaa bahi matam labuina ni miminaa, ebo ni pagegewa ge matam labui nihi alitukagiwa Gehena elana.
He panuwa o elana, kinol bolo gamagalau hi anil nige nihi aaliga, ge ginaha nige ni totobolu.
“He no tohago gegewel labose pupulowanil bolo amnaliya i ola ginaha nihi pwawa, inoke eliyana nihi matuwa.
“Hoga bugul waiwaisana, yaa ebo ana gasisi ge amnana ni so, nige bosowaina ta pahogahoga al. Ebo alan bwabwatana kaiwena nuku awabalgig, inoke komiu ku ola hoga toto hohogana iyaka i so. Bahi nuku oola, yaa alomiyau ge alomiyau nuku mibubun.”
Yeisu panuwa o i eguluwai i na Yudiya wali labi elana ge abwe wewel Yolidani i kalapanet-an i na labena leunati. Yaka boda bwabwatana al hi nok elana ge i panpankiti elal i ola sauga gegewena i giginol.
Palisi enuna hi nok elana tage nihi labose, inoke hi neli hi ba, “Tab wala logugui i talam bosowaina tau lagona ni towani?”
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Mosese logugui i pewa, ga i ba ola?”
Hi ba, “Mosese wana logugui i talam tau towa ana pepa ni ginol ni pek yova elana, inoke abwe ni patuna ge ni egon.”
Yeisu i ba, “Kaiwena atemiu i gasisi ge ami papaatena i esowal hot, heiya te kaiwena Mosese logugui ya i leli kaiwemiu.
Yaa nuku nuwahikan te abatelipuna elana, sauga Yehoba panayawi ge labulabum i ginol, inoke ‘gamagal i ginolil tau ge yova.’
‘Heiya te kaiwena tau tamana ge hinana ni miluwagil ni na alona ge lagona nihi mipamaisena,
inoke ali toto labui nihi ola tuwan maisena.’ Inoke heliya nige al hi oola eluwa, yaa heliya hi ola maisena.
Yehoba iyaka i tubwel toyawel, he bahi gamagal etega ni teteli pwamwaumwau-agil.”
Sauga hi sikal limiya, inoke wana tohago hi neli bugul ya kaiwena.
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Ebo tau etega lagona ni towani ge yova getoga ni alolonan, iya i ganawal.
I ola al, ebo yova etega lagona ni towani ge tau getoga ni alolonan, yova o i ganawal.”
Gamagalau enuna wawayau hi pwatanik Yeisu elana tage nimana ni teli tuwaliyaa ge ni awanun kaiweliya, yaa wana tohago gamagalau hi haveyanagil.
Sauga Yeisu i kitel, inoke i huga ge i baek elal i ba, “Wawayau ku talamwagil nihi nem elau, bahi nuku lolopwalil, kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui i minaa ololana o eliyalil.
Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, ebo gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui nige ni yayaliyaya-an ge ni aahe ni oola wawayau kekeisi wali ahe, he iya nige ni uulutuk elana.”
Yaka Yeisu wawayau i ahel, i telel aenaa, nimana i teli tuwaliyaa ge i awanun Yehoba ni muloluagil.
Sauga Yeisu i telipuna i nawanawa, inoke tau etega i patalelu nok elana i loepwakoku awonaa ge i neli i ba, “Topankite waiwaisana, hauna na ginol ge yawal mihomihotina na pwawa?”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Hauna kaiwena u awa wawaisi-agau? Nige towaisi etega i gagan, Yehoba maisena ya te towaisi.
He u atena ya te logugui i ba, ‘Bahi taulol, bahi ganawal, bahi kaoma, bahi woliwoli kakawi, bahi nuwa govigovi, tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil.’”
Yaka tau o i ba, “Topankite, no sauga wawaya ana siga sauga ya, logugui bolo ya gegewel iyaka ya paolaolaek.”
Yeisu matana i lihikan tau elana alona ge wana nunuwana, yaka i ba, “Bugul maisena ya te nige u giginol. U na wam gogomwau gegewel u paliagil, manina nu pek togulagula elal, inoke abwe nu gogomwau labulabumwa. He u nem u toulilau.”
Baaba o kaiwena tau ana awa i ul, inoke i egon alona ge wana nuwanak, kaiwena iya togogomwau.
Yeisu matana i lipwapwati wana tohago elal ge i ba, “Togogomwau wali ulutuk i pulowan nabi Yehoba wana abalogugui elana!”
Tohago ateliya i you Yeisu wana baaba kaiwena. Yaka i ba vevehe al i ba, “Natuwau, Yehoba wana abalogugui ana uluulutuk i pulowan!
