Bolau labui nihi tuwatuwalali eyowaa, etegana nihi ahe egonan, etegana ni mina.”
Yaka tohago hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba, “Babala, hauna labi elana ge bugul bolo ya nihi masala?” Analiya i lahe i ba, “Ebo bweyan ga i minaa, inoke okok nihi na ge nihi tagul pwehik.”
Yaka Yeisu ba gohalibe etega i liwanan wana tohago elal, inoke ni pankitel te sauga gegewena nihi awaawanun ge bahi nihi veveyaho.
I ba, “Toyatala etega i miminaa panuwa etega elana, iya nige Yehoba i aawatauwan ge nige i nuwanuwatu gamagalau kaiweliya.
He abuabul etega i miminaa al to panuwa maisena o elana, ge i mimi noknok toyatala elana ge i babaa, ‘Alou ge o topihigelgel ama iyoho ha kotkot. He nu labeyau ge logugui nu pasapu bubun kaiweu.’
Sauga i yapu toyatala i towa, nige nuwana i oola ni labe. Mulaa abwe totona i ba, ‘Bwagana nige Yehoba ya aawatauwan, ge nige ya nuwanuwatu gamagalau kaiweliya,
yaa kaiwena abuabul ya o pulowan i awaawaginol, he na labe ge logugui na pasapu bubun kaiwena. Ebo nigeya, he nasi ni mimi nemnem ya, inoke abwe tuwau ni esai.’”
Inoke Babala i ba, “Ku hago toyatala nanakina wana baaba.
He Yehoba wana hilihili gamagaliliyau bolo lan ge bulin hi yogayoga ha eliyana, age nige ni lalabel ge ali logugui ni papasapu? O age nasi ni esowal ge ni baek elal ni ba, ‘Ni ola ga!’? He nige i oola.
Na baewa eliyamiu, wana gamagalau ni label logugui ni pasapu bubun kaiweliya, ge etimwawa ni ginol ola. Yaa bugul maisena, sauga Gamagal Natuna ni nem, nasi gamagalau panayawiya ni pwawal wali abulilek i gan o ebo nigeya?”
Gamagalau enuna bolo totoliya hi awa sapusapu-agil ge avaliyau gegewel al hi kite lowagil, Yeisu i liwan gohalibe elal i ba,
“Sauga etega bolau labui hi na Limi Bwabwalena elana nihi awanun, etegana Palisi ge etegana takis ana toahi.
Palisi i talmilil yaka totona bana i awanun i ba, ‘Yehoba, ya ba mulolu eliyam te nau nige ya oola gamagalau gegewel al, bolo hi kaoma, bolo wali pagan i nak ge bolo hi gaganawal, ge nige ya oola takis ana toahi toto ya.
Wik maisena gamwanaa lan labui tapwalolo kaiwena galebu ya palahikan. Ge bugul gegewena toto ya pwawa ya wali awalehina ali gewi elulutega, yaka awalehina maisena ya muloluan eliyam.’
“Yaa takis ana toahi i talmililek laha. Nige matana i liliheyanek labulabumwa, yaa babagalina i tagabub ge i ba, ‘Yehoba, nau togegi nu atilomwan-agau.’”
Yeisu i ba, “Na ba eliyamiu, sauga tau ya i sikal wana limiya, iya i sapu Yehoba matanaa, yaa Palisi nigeya. Kaiwena gamagalau gegewel bolo totoliya hi teli heyagil, Yehoba ni teli lowagil, ge bolo totoliya hi teli lowagil, Yehoba ni teli heyagil.”
Gamagalau enuna wawayau kekeisisil hi pwatanik Yeisu elana tage nimana ni teli tuwaliyaa ge ni awanun kaiweliya. Sauga tohago hi kitel, inoke hi haveyanagil.
Yaa Yeisu wawayau i yogaagil hi nok elana ge i ba, “Wawayau ku talamwagil nihi nem eliyau, bahi nuku lolopwalil, kaiwena Yehoba wana abalogugui i minaa ololana o eliyalil.
Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, ebo gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui nige ni yayaliyaya-an ge ni aahe ni oola wawayau kekeisi wali ahe, he iya nige ni uulutuk elana.”
Tologugui etegana i nel Yeisu elana i ba, “Topankite waiwaisana, hauna na ginol ge yawal mihomihotina na pwawa?”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Hauna kaiwena u awa wawaisi-agau? Nige towaisi etega i gagan, Yehoba maisena ya te towaisi.
He u atena ya te logugui i ba, ‘Bahi ganawal, bahi taulol, bahi kaoma, bahi woliwoli kakawi, tamwam ge hinam nu awatauwagil.’”
Tau o i ba, “No sauga wawaya ana siga sauga ya, logugui bolo ya gegewel iyaka ya paolaolaek.”
Yeisu baaba o i hago inoke i baek elana i ba, “Bugul maisena iyoho nigeya ga u giginol. U na wam gogomwau gegewel u paliagil, manina nu pek togulagula elal, inoke abwe nu gogomwau labulabumwa. He u nem u toulilau.”
Sauga tau baaba o i hago, inoke nuwana i nak nabi, kaiwena iya togogomwau hot.
Yeisu tau o i gagayawa-an inoke i ba, “Togogomwau wali ulutuk i pulowan nabi Yehoba wana abalogugui elana.
He i pulowan te bwasumu toto kamel ni ulusola evaneya golinaa, i ola al i pulowan hot tologogomwau wali ulutuk Yehoba wana abalogugui elana.”
Bolo wana baaba hi hago hi nel elana hi ba, “Ebo i ola o, he henala ge bosowaina ni mwal?”
Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Bugul toto gamagalau nige bosowailiya, he Yehoba iya bosowaina ya.”
Inoke Pita i baek elana i ba, “Yaa ga i ola ama? Wama bugul gegewena iyaka ha eguluwagil, inoke ha nem ge ha touliliwa.”
Yeisu i baek eliyalil i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, henala ebo wana limi, ebo lagona, ebo talinau, ebo hinana ge tamana, o ebo natunau ni eguluwagil Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena,
he sauga ya elana ni ahe pwabwaya al pwatanaa. Ge sauga mulaa yawalina mihomihotina ni pwawa.”
Yeisu tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa i ahel hi na hi mimwaumwau, inoke i baek elal i ba, “Iyaka ta nanawa Yelusalema kaiwena, inoke abwe bugul gegewena toto palopitau hi lelelian Gamagal Natuna kaiwena ni tabwa tunahot.
Nihi teli bolo nige Yudiya i oola nimaliyaa. Inoke heliya nihi lamwa tunatuna-an, nihi talatalawasi-an, nihi lokukuluvi-an,
nihi nibinibihan, ge nihi lopaaliga. Lan etonina elana abwe ni lutem yaomala.”
Tohago nige nuwaliya i sasapu Yeisu wana baaba o kaiwena. Wana baaba ana sapu nige etega hi aatena, ge nige hi aatena te hauna bana ge i baaba.
Yeisu i pulivin panuwa Yeliko gegelinaa, he tomatakai etega i misiyowa to kamwasa bebenaa ge i loloawaawanun gamagalau elal.
Sauga i hago boda hi nopalegi, inoke i nel gamagalau elal i ba, “Hauna gun hi giginol o?”
Anana hi lahe hi ba, “Yeisu gagama Nasaleta to i nanawa o.”
Inoke i yoga i ba, “Yeisu, Deibid Tubuna, nu atilomwan-agau!”
Gamagalau bolo hi nohouwa hi ba lalaan ge hi baek elana tage ni mikekei, yaa abwe i yoga balbalgig i ba, “Deibid Tubuna, nu atilomwan-agau!”
Yeisu i notalmilil, yaka i baek gamagalau elal tomatakai nihi pwatanik elana. Sauga i na Yeisu gegelinaa, yaka Yeisu i nel elana i ba,
“Hauna gun nuwam na ginol kaiwem?” Anana i lahe i ba, “Babala, nuwau matau ni waisi.”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Matam ni waisi. Wam abulilek iyaka i pwamolowa.”
Sauga o elana matana i waisi, inoke Yeisu i toulil ge i nonotobatobal Yehoba elana. Sauga gamagalau ginol o hi kite, yaka heliya al ge hi tobatobal Yehoba elana.
Yeisu i na i ulutuk panuwa Yeliko ge ni nosolaa gamwanaa.
Tau etega iyoho to alana Sakiusa, iya takis ana toahi wali tohouwa etega, ge iya togogomwau.
I labose nuwana Yeisu ni kite iya hauna kaba tau, yaa nige bosowaina, kaiwena i kaubwa ge boda i bwata.
Inoke i patalelu houwa boda awoliyaa i na ebwakil alana sikamole i pane ge Yeisu ni kite, kaiwena nasi ni neem to.
Sauga Yeisu i pulivin labi o elana, inoke matana i lihin ge i baek elana i ba, “Sakiusa, etimwawa u lau, kaiwena lan ebe na minaa wam limiya.”
Inoke sauga o i pani lau, yaka Sakiusa ginebi ge wana yaliyaya Yeisu i ahe hi na wana limiya.
Gamagalau gegewel hi kite inoke hi baaba Yeisu kaiwena hi ba, “Tau ya iyaka i na i minaa togegi etega wana limiya.”
Yaa Sakiusa i talmilil, yaka i baek Babala elana i ba, “Tonowak, no gogomwau na wali inoke nasi awalehina na pek togulagula elal. Ge ebo valila gamagal etega ya kakawe ge wana mani ya ahe likaan, he nasi paesopali na pwamola pasikal.”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Lan ebe Yehoba limi ya ana heniheni i pwamwalil. He tau ya iya al ge Abalahama tubutubunina etega.
He Gamagal Natuna i nem totatayaomal ni loyaagil ge ni pwamwalil.”
Gamagalau heliya iyoho Yeisu wana baaba o hi lalaegan. Yaka i ba vevehe al ge ba gohalibe etega i liwanan elal, kaiwena iyaka Yelusalema i nopakelakelaubwa ge gamagalau hi nuwatu te Yehoba wana abalogugui sauga kekeisi ya abwe ni masal.
I ba, “Towasawasa etega i nana panuwa yayapona elana ge nihi teli iya wana labi ana kin, yaka abwe ni sikalim al.
Wana totuwalali ali toto elulutega i yogaagil, yaka maisena ge maisena mani silba handeled maisena ona i pek elal, ge i baek elal i ba, ‘Mani ya nuku patuwalali ana siga na sikalim.’ I ginol ola o, yaka abwe i egon.
Yaa wana panuwa gamagaliliyau hi pihigelgel-an, inoke elopapatuna hi patunal hi na panuwa toto i nonoek ge hi ba, ‘Nige nuwama tau ya ni tabwa wama kin.’
He towasawasa o hi teli iya wana labi ana kin ge i sikal i na wana panuwaa. Sauga i sikal, inoke i ba, ‘Totuwalali bolo valila mani ya pek elal nuku yogaagil nihi nem elau. Nuwau na atena mani ga hi patuwalali ola, ge ana etulan ehila al hi pwawa.’
Totuwalali houwan i nok i ba, ‘Tonowak, valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem, he ya patuwalali ge ana etulan handeled paelulutega al ya pwawa.’
Anana i lahe i ba, ‘Owa totuwalali waiwaisana, u ginol bubun. Kaiwena bugul bolo nige ali nuwatu i bwabwata u matahikagil bubunil, he na telewa panuwa ali gewi elulutega nu matahikagil.’
Totuwalali eluwana i nok elana i ba, ‘Tonowak, valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem, he ya patuwalali ge ana etulan handeled panimala panuna al ya pwawa.’
Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba, ‘Na telewa panuwa ali gewi nimala panuna nu matahikagil.’
Yaka totuwalali etegana al i nok elana i ba, ‘Tonowak, valila mani silba handeled maisena u pem, he iya hiwe. Kaliko malelena kekeisi ya ahe ya os ge ya teli hikan.
Ya lovakunagiwa, kaiwena wam logugui i gasisi. Bugul toto gamagalau getogal hi teli tukan, he u aahe tagilan, ge aanan toto nige u pepel, he u keken ge u papahe wam limiya.’
Wana tonowak i baek elana i ba, ‘Owa totuwalali nanakina, he totom wam baaba ni sikal eliyam ge ni taliwa. U atena ya te no logugui i gasisi ge bugul toto gamagalau getogal hi teli tukan, ya aahe tagilan, ge aanan toto nige ya pepel, ya keken ge ya papahe no limiya.
He binimala nu na no mani nu teli benki elana ge nihi patuwalali, inoke sauga na sikalim ge na ahe pasikal, alona ge ana etulan, toto hi patuwalali ana enona.’
Inoke i baek bolo hi talmilila gegelinaa elal i ba, ‘Mani ku ahe eliyana, ge ku pek tau toto wana mani ana bwata silba handeled paelulutega elana.’
Hi baek elana hi ba, ‘Tonowak, iya iyaka silba handeled paelulutega i ahe.’
Analiya i lahe i ba, ‘Na baewa eliyamiu, henala i gan eliyana, abwe Yehoba ni pek pwabwaya al. Yaa henala nige i gagan eliyana, bwagana toto kekeisi i minaa eliyana, Yehoba abwe ni ahe yoho.
He bolo hi pihigelgel eliyau ge nige nuwaliya na tabwa wali kin, ku na ku ahel ge ku pwatanim hiwe, inoke nuku tagapaaligal matawa.’”
Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i liwanan haba, inoke i novevehe al ni nok ni na Yelusalema.
Sauga i vin Betepage ge Bedani Oya Olibe awanina labeliyaa, inoke wana tohago eluwa i patunal nihi houwa. I baek elal i ba,
“Nuku nok nuku na awan toto maninilaa, ge sauga nuku ulutuk, donki natuna etega iyahe tei nuku kite hi am hikan, nige sauga etega gamagal etega i heheya pwatanaa. Nuku leke inoke nuku pwatanim te.
Ebo gamagal etega ni nelimiu ni ba, ‘Hauna kaiwena donki natuna ku leleke ei?’ nuku baek elana nuku ba, ‘Babala nuwana.’”
He bolo i patunal hi nok ge hi pwawa i ola ya te Yeisu i baunan elal.
Sauga donki natuna ana sisiu hi lekaleka, yaka tondonki hi nel elal hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena donki natuna ku leleke ei?”
Analiya hi lahe hi ba, “Babala nuwana.”
Inoke donki natuna hi ahe ge hi pwatanik Yeisu elana, yaka ali kaliko hi yao eputetenaa, ge Yeisu hi pamisiyo pwatanaa.
I nawanawa ee, yaka gamagalau ali kaliko hi yao kamwasaa.
Sauga i na i vin Oya Olibe ana kela laulau gegelinaa, inoke wana tohago boda bwabwatana nuwaliya i waisi nabi. Ginol yawiyawi gegewena bolo i ginolil ge hi kite hi nuwatuagil, yaka hi telipuna Yehoba hi tobatobal-an analiya i bwata.
Hi ba, “Yehoba ni ba muloluan, iya kin i nem Babala alana elana! Yehoba labulabumwa ta awa wasawasa-an, iya ge kila i pamibubun-agila!”
Palisi enuna iyoho to boda gamwaliyaa hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba, “Topankite, wam tohago u ba pahenapol nihi mikekei.”
Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Na baewa eliyamiu, ebo nihi mikekei, he nasi pat nihi yogayoga.”
Yeisu Yelusalema i nopakelakelaubwa ge sauga matana i nok i kite, inoke baena i kahin
i ba, “Binimala komiu lan ebe nuku atena te hauna gun bosowaina ni pamibubun-agimiu. Yaa age nige bosowaimiu nuku kite.
Sauga i nenem abwe ami topihigelgel nihi nem nihi lohaveyan eliyamiu, inoke nihi mipainagimiu, yaka wami abaulutuk ge wami abatagil gegewena nihi mikaukaus-an.
Wami panuwa nihi pasamwalekaleka yaka nige al pat etega ni miminaa abanaa, ge ana tomina nihi tagapapaaligal. Bugul bolo ya nihi masal, kaiwena Yehoba i nem nuwana ni pwamwalimiu, yaa nige ku aatena.”
Yeisu i na i ulutuk Limi Bwabwalena elana, inoke bolo hi lolopalipali i takel.
I baek elal i ba, “Buki Bwabwalena elana Yehoba wana baaba hi lelelian i ba, ‘No limi iya tapwalolo limena’ yaa komiu ku ginol i ola tokaoma wali gol.”
Lan maisena ge maisena Yeisu i panpankiti Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa. He topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge panuwa ana tonowakau nuwaliya nihi lol.
Yaa nige kamwasa etega bosowailiya nihi pwawa ge eliyana nihi lopaaliga, kaiwena gamagalau gegewel hi mimi lalaegan-an ge nuwaliya i noek wana baaba eliyana.
Lan etega Yeisu i panpankiti gamagalau elal Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa ge wasa waiwaisana i papaatena-an. Topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Logugui ana topankite ge panuwa ana tonowakau hi na eliyana
ge hi neli hi ba, “Wama wasa ga nu pem. Hauna logugui wana gasisi eliyana ge bugul bolo ya u awaawaginol? Henala wam gasisi i pewa?”
Analiya i lahe i ba, “Nau al ge nel etega na neli ga eliyamiu. He ku ba ga na hago.
Diyon Tobabitaiso gamagalau i pababitaisol. Logugui o ga i neem? Yehoba elana, o ebo gamagalau elal?”
Yaka hi peliwaliwan-agil hi ba, “Ebo ta ba, ‘Logugui o i neem Yehoba elana,’ inoke nasi ni ba, ‘He hauna kaiwena ge Diyon nige ku aabulilek-an?’
Yaa ebo ta ba, ‘Logugui o i neem gamagalau elal,’ he nasi boda nihi loipatagila, kaiwena hi abulilek te Diyon iya palopita.”
Inoke Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba, “Nige ha aatena te logugui o ga i neem.”
Yaka Yeisu i ba, “Ebo nigeya, he nau al ge nige na babaunan te henala wana logugui elana ge bugul bolo ya ya awaawaginol.”
Inoke Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i liwanan gamagalau elal i ba, “Tau etega wana eyowa i ginol ge oine i luwan, inoke abwe i pek gamagalau enuna elal ge nihi patuwalali. Yaka iya i egon i na i minaa panuwa getoga sauga yayapona.
Sauga oine enona i matuwa, inoke toneyowa wana totuwalali etega i patuna i na tomatahikan elal ge oine enona enuna nihi pek elana. Yaa tomatahikan totuwalali o hi nibinibihan ge hi patuna i egon ninimana ya.
Wana totuwalali etega al i patuna elal, yaka tau o hi nibinibihan ge hi tagapanapanak-an, inoke hi patuna i egon ninimana ya.
Inoke wana totuwalali etonina i patuna elal, yaka tuwana hi apapanak-an ge hi alitagil-an eyowa ana gana tolinaa.
Inoke toneyowa i ba, ‘Ga na ginol ola? He natu toto ya nunuwana-an na patuna elal, inoke tabana nasi iya nihi awatauwan!’
Yaa sauga tomatahikan hi kite, inoke hi pebaaba-agil hi ba, ‘He toneyowa natuna te, toto tage abwe eyowa ni ahe tamana wana yaomal enaa. Ta tagapaaliga, inoke eyowa ni minem elala.’
Inoke hi lib ge hi alitagil-an oine ana eyowa tolinaa, yaka hi tagapaaliga.” Yaka abwe Yeisu i nel i ba, “He toneyowa nasi ga ni ginol ola elal?
Iya ni nem tomatahikan ni tagapaaligal, inoke oine ana eyowa ni guyauan gamagalau getogal elal.” Sauga gamagalau baaba o hi hago, inoke hi ba, “Bahi ni mamasal ni oola to!”
Yeisu matana i lihikan elal, yaka i nel i ba, “He baaba hiwe, toto hi lelelian Buki Bwabwalena gamwanaa, ana sapu ga i ola? Toto i ba, ‘Pat toto totaltal hi awa nanakan ge hi towani, Yehoba iyaka i ahe limi ana kokola gasigasisena i ginoliya.’
Gamagalau gegewel bolo nihi soguwa pat ya elana nihi tal mwamwaol, ge ebo pat ya ni soguwa gamagal etega pwatanaa, nasi ni tagamukumuku-an.”
He Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge topowon bwabwatal kamwasa hi loya ge sauga o elana Yeisu nihi lib ge nihi yowan, kaiwena hi atena ba gohalibe ya Yeisu i liwanan, ana nuwatu i noek heliya eliyalil. Yaa hi lovakun gamagalau kaiweliya.
He Logugui ana topankite avaliyau ge topowon bwabwatal Yeisu wana nawanawa ge wana ginol ona hi kite hikan bubun. Yaka gamagalau enuna hi patunal nihi na Yeisu nihi gayawaan sume. Heliya hi kakawi tage nuwaliya hot te Yeisu wana baaba nihi hago. Yaa wali nuwatu hot te ebo Yeisu baaba etega ni ba panak inoke nihi paona, yaka abwe nihi teli Loma wali gavana nimanaa ge ni logugui-an.
Inoke hi neli hi ba, “Topankite, ha atena hauna u baunan ge u panpankiti-an i tunahot. Nige u golugoluek gamagalau alaliya ana bwata elana, yaa wam panpankiti Yehoba wana kamwasa kaiwena i sapu hot.
He Mosese i ba mani naha pek Yehoba elana. I waisi ya takis naha pwamola Sisa elana o age bahiwa?”
Yaa wali kakawi i atena, yaka i baek elal i ba,
“Mani silba etega ku pankiteyau. He henala kakanununa ge henala alana hi leli tuwanaa?”
Anana hi lahe hi ba, “Sisa.” Inoke i baek elal i ba, “He toto Sisa kaiwena nuku pek Sisa elana, ge toto Yehoba kaiwena nuku pek Yehoba elana.”
Inoke sauga iya iyoho boda gamwaliyaa, nige bosowailiya wana baaba eliyana ge nihi paona. Nuwaliya hi ahe wali nel ana lahena kaiwena, yaka hi mikekei.
Yaka Sadiusi enuna hi na Yeisu elana. He Sadiusi nige wali abulilek i oola tage toyaomal nihi lut, inoke Yeisu hi neli hi ba,
“Topankite, Mosese logugui i lelelian kaiwela i ba, ‘Ebo tau etega ni alolon, nige natunau ge ni aliga, inoke abuabulina talina ni alolonan ge ebo natuliyau ni gan, heliya nihi tabwa toto i alaliga natunau.’
Sauga etega tau etega alonau talinau ali gewi seben. Gamaun i alolon nige natuna i gagan, inoke i aliga.
Yaka loena alona ge abuabul hi alolon, inoke iya al i aliga.
Yaka etonina al alona ge abuabul hi alolon, ge iya al i aliga. Pagan maisena o i gan ali toto seben elal: abuabul o hi alolonan nige natuliyau i gagan iyaka hi aliga haba.
Inoke mowamowasena abwe yova al i aliga.
Ebo tunahot toyaomal abwe nihi lut, he lut enaa ali toto seben gamwaliyaa henala ge yova o lagona hot? Kaiwena gegewel hi alolonan ga.”
Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Sauga ya elana bolau ge yowau hi alolon.
Yaa sauga mulaa, gamagalau bolo Yehoba ni ba bosowailiya nihi lut al ge alonau nihi mina, heliya nige nihi aalolon.
He nihi ola aneloseyau ge nige nihi aaliga. Yehoba i palutil yaomal elana, inoke heliya iya natunau.
Mosese wana buki i pankitela te toyaomal nihi lut al. Ginaha i tau ebwakil lamwanaa liwanina, he buki i ba te Yehoba iya Abalahama, Aisake ge Yakobo wali Yabowaine.
Inoke ta atena gamagalau ya yawaliliya nige i yayaomal hot. Yehoba nige toaliga hot wali Yabowaine i oola, yaa bolo yawaliliya gaganina wali Yabowaine. Kaiwena iya eliyana gamagalau gegewel yawaliliya i gan.”
Logugui ana topankite enuna Yeisu wana baaba o hi hago inoke hi ba, “Topankite, iyaka u lahe bubun to.”
Inoke nige al bosowailiya nihi labose ge nel etega nihi neli Yeisu elana.
Inoke Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Ga i ola ge hi ba tage Mesaiya iya Deibid tubuna?
He Buki Same gamwanaa Deibid totona i ba, ‘Yehoba i baek no Babala elana i ba: U misiyowa labeu awowa,
ana siga am topihigelgel na teli lowagil aem gabulanaa.’
He Deibid Mesaiya i awa babala-an, inoke ga i ola ge tage iya Deibid tubuna?”
Gamagalau gegewel iyoho Yeisu wana baaba hi lalaegan, inoke i baek wana tohago elal i ba,
“Nuku matahikagimiu Logugui ana topankite kaiweliya. Heliya nuwaliya kaliko yayapona nihi galoi ge nihi nonawanawa, inoke ebo gamagalau nihi pwawal abamaket elana, nuwaliya te gamagalau ginebi ge wali awatauwan nihi pata ateu owa eliyalil. Limi tapwalolo elana nuwaliya nihi misiyo houwa gamagalau maniniliyaa, ge hagali elana nuwaliya nihi misiyowa yau toto gamagalau bwabwatal wali yau elana.
Abuabulau wali limi ge wali gogomwau hi aahe hi lologugui-an bwabwage, ge i ola al wali awanun hi papayapu-an gamagalau tanaliyaa tage nihi hagol. Wali pagan o kaiwena, inoke nasi ali lahi ni bwata hot.”
Yeisu matana i lihin, yaka togogomwau i kitel hi na wali mulolu hi teliteli mulolu ana abateliteliya Limi Bwabwalena gamwanaa.
I ola al abuabul gugulana etega i kite i na toya eluwa i telel.
Inoke i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, abuabul gugulana ya wana mulolu gamagalau gegewel wali mulolu i bwata lake.
Bolo ya gegewel mani enuna hi teli, yaa wali tupwa i bwata iyoho i mina. Yaa iya, togulagula, wana mani gegewena toto tage wana aanan kaiwena, iyaka i teli haba.”
Tohago enuna hi liwaliwan Limi Bwabwalena ana awa kaiwena hi ba, “Pat ali awa waiwaisal hi taliya ge gamagalau wali mulolu elal hi paiselaya.” Inoke abwe Yeisu i ba,
“Bugul gegewel bolo ku kitel e, he sauga i nenem nige pat etega ni miminaa abanaa, gegewena abwe nihi pasamwalekaleka.”
Inoke hi nel Yeisu elana hi ba, “Topankite, hauna sauga ge abwe bugul bolo baliya u babaunan nihi masal? Ge wali masal ana etotohi ga ni ola?”
Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Nuku matahikagimiu, bahi gamagal etega ni papagegemiu. Kaiwena gamagalau nihi gewi abwe alau elana nihi nem ge nihi ba, ‘Nau Mesaiya!’ ge nihi ba, ‘Sauga mowamowasena iyaka i vin.’ Yaa bahi nuwamiu ni nonoek elal ge nuku totoulilil.
Haveyan ge apwaapwanawa wasaliya nuku hago, yaa bahi nuku lolovakun. Bugul ololana o nihi gan ga, yaa nige tage sauga o elana ge sauga mowamowasena ni nem.”
Inoke i ba vevehe al elal i ba, “Boda ge boda nihi lohaveyan, i ola al abalogugui ge abalogugui nihi lohaveyan.
Mwaniknik, galebu bwabwatana ge kasiyebwa guliguli nihi masal labi tomaha ge tomaha elal. Bugul lolovakunil ge etotohi bwabwatal nihi masalem natiya hawawala.
“Yaa mulaa abwe bugul bolo o nihi masal, inoke gamagalau nihi libimiu ge nihi papalomwan-agimiu. Nihi ahemiu nuku na wali limi tapwalolowa ge nihi payatalamiu inoke nihi telemiu dibulaa. Alau kaiwena nihi ahemiu nihi telemiu kin ge tologugui mataliyaa.
He toto ya kamwasa ni pwela ge wasa waiwaisana nuku wasaan elal.
Bahi nuku nuwanuwatu houwan hauna nuku baunan ge mwal nuku pwawa.
Kaiwena nau baaba toto nuku baunan ge siba na pewa, inoke nasi ami topihigelgel nige bosowailiya wami baaba nihi lahe ge nihi ba pakokovemiu.
Hinamiyau ge tamamiyau, ge i ola al talimiyau, tutumiyau ge wami heliyamwau, nihi wasaagimiu tologugui elal, inoke komiu enuna nihi lopaaligamiu.
Alau kaiwena gamagalau gegewel nihi pihigelgel-agimiu.
Yaa nige tuwamiu etega ni bwebwe, he nige kokowamiu pupunona etega ni yayaomal.
He nuku talmilil gagasisi, inoke yawalimiu hot nuku pwawa.”
“Sauga ebo nuku kite tolohaveyan nihi nem Yelusalema nihi mipainan, yaka nuku atena te sauga kekeisi nihi pasamwalekaleka.
Inoke sauga o elana bolo hi miminaa Yudiya nihi lou nihi na oyaa; bolo hi miminaa Yelusalema panuwa nihi eguluwan, ge bolo hi miminaa tola bahi nihi nana nihi uulutuk gamwanaa.
Kaiwena sauga o Yehoba wana lahi ana sauga, inoke baaba gegewena toto hi lelelian Buki Bwabwalena gamwanaa ni tabwa tunahot.
Sauga o elana nasi ni pulowan hot yowau toliyan ge topapaalahul elal. Nak bwabwatana ni gan panuwa ya elana, ge Yehoba wana huga ni masal gamagalau ya elal.
Enuna elohaveyan kilepana elana nihi gopaaligal, enuna nihi paloloyowan-agil ge nihi ahel nihi na nihi miminaa panayawi labena gegewena elal. Yaka bolo nige Yudiya i oola Yelusalema nihi pulilolowan ana siga wali logugui ana sauga ni mowasi.”
Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba, “Etotohi ona nihi masal sabwelu, weikena, ge putum elal. Ge panayawiya, hoga bagolina ni bini poipoi ge butuliya ni bwata, inoke gamagalau nuwaliya ni gewagewa ge nihi lovakun nabi.
Gamagalau nihi nuwanuwatu hauna i mamasal panayawiya, yaka lovakun kaiwena mataliya ni ananit. Kaiwena togasisi bolo hawawala nihi lamwalamwaniu.
Sauga o elana gamagalau Gamagal Natuna nihi kite i nenem yaluyalu gamwanaa, ginebi wana gasisi ge wana wasawasa bwabwatana.
Sauga bugul bolo o nihi masal telipuna, he komiu nuku mat ge matamiu nuku lihin, kaiwena sauga toto Yehoba ni pwamwalimiu iyaka i kelaubwa.”
Inoke Yeisu ba gohalibe ya i baunanik elal i ba, “Poga ge ebwakil gegewel nuku gayawaagil.
Sauga ebo nuku kitel lamwaliya i titin, inoke ku atena waiwai ana sauga iyaka i kelaubwa.
I ola al, sauga ebo nuku kite bugul gegewel bolo ya liwanagil nihi masal, nuku atena te Yehoba wana abalogugui ana sauga nem iyaka i kelaubwa.
“Tunahot ya ba eliyamiu, heyan bolo sauga ya nige nihi aaliga haba, inoke bugul gegewena bolo ya nihi masal.
Labulabum ge panayawi nihi mowasi, yaa nau no baaba nige ni momowasi.”
Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba, “Nuku matahikagimiu, bahi aanan, loimwim ge panayawi yawalina ali nuwanuwatu yawalimiu ni aanlowan. Ebo nuku ola o, he nasi lan o atemiu ni payou
ni ola kimul, kaiwena lan o ni vina gamagalau gegewel panayawiya elal.
Sauga gegewena nuku silawa ge nuku awaawanun Yehoba elana ni pagasisi-agimiu, inoke sauga bugul gegewena ya nihi masal, nuku mwal ge bosowaimiu nuku talmilil Gamagal Natuna manininaa.”
Lan maisena ge maisena Yeisu i panpankiti gamagalau elal Limi Bwabwalena ana gana gamwanaa, ge sauga bulin i gagan, inoke i nana i kekenuwa limi etega elana oya alana Olibe ana labiya.
Mweluluga kekeisi gamagalau gegewel nihi noknok Limi Bwabwalena elana ge wana papaatena nihi lalaegan.
Pwalawa toto Nige alona Yis Hi Vivikuhiya Hagalena, alana etega al hi ba Nopalegi Hagalena, ana lan iyaka i kelakelaubwa.
He topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge Logugui ana topankite hi lovakun gamagalau kaiweliya, inoke kamwasa hi loya ge eliyana Yeisu nihi lopaaliga.
Yaka Seitani i ulutuk Yudasa toto hi ba Isikaliyota eliyana, iya tohago ali toto elulutega eluwa avaliya etega.
Inoke Yudasa i na topowon bwabwatal avaliyau ge Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau wali tohouwa elal, yaka alonau hi liwaliwan ga ni label ola ge Yeisu nihi lib.
Heliya hi yaliyaya Yudasa wana nuwatu kaiwena, inoke hi ba abwe mani nihi pek elana.
Yudasa wali baaba i talamwi, inoke i telipuna Yeisu wana nawanawa i gagayawa-an, kamwasa i loya ge Yeisu ni teli nimaliyaa ge bahi boda nihi aatena.
Pwalawa toto Nige alona Yis Hi Vivikuhiya Hagalena ana lan i pwawa. He Yudiya wali pagan te lan o eliyana sipi natuna etega nihi lol Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena.
Yeisu Pita ge Diyon i patunal i ba, “Nuku na Nopalegi Hagalena enona nuku lovivina-an ge ta anan.”
Hi nel elana hi ba, “Hauna labena elana nuwam naha noek ge aanan naha lovivina-an?”
Analiya i lahe i ba, “Sauga nuku tuk Yelusalema, tau etega wewel ana ulubwal i kalivai abwe ni pwawamiu. Nuku noulil, nuku na limi toto elana ni ulutuka,
inoke nuku baek tonlimi elana nuku ba, ‘Topankite i ba: Hauna lum u talamwan ge elana alowau no tohago Nopalegi Hagalena enona naha ginola ge naha anan?’
Inoke iya abwe limi gamwana bwabwatana toto natiya ni pankitemiu, teibol ge abamisiyo iyaka hi abubun haba. Inoke nuku na aanan nuku lovivina-an to.”
Inoke tohago hi nok ge bugul gegewena hi pwawa i ola Yeisu wana baaba elal. Inoke Nopalegi Hagalena enona hi lovivina-an.
Aanan ana sauga iyaka i pwawa, inoke Yeisu alonau ge wana apostolowau hi misiyo abaanan elana.
Yaka i baek elal i ba, “Nuwau hot alowau komiu Nopalegi Hagalena toto ya enona ta an, mulaa abwe lomwan na pwawa ge na yaomal.
Kaiwena na baewa eliyamiu, nige al na aan, ana siga Yehoba wana abalogugui ni nem inoke Nopalegi Hagalena ana sapu ni masal hot.”
Inoke oine ana kom etega i ahe, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana ge i baek tohago elal i ba, “Toto ya ku ahe ku im guyauan eliyamiu.
Kaiwena na baewa eliyamiu, oine nige al na iim ana siga sauga toto Yehoba wana abalogugui ni nem.”
Inoke beleid i ahe, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana, yaka i pigebagebal-an i pek elal ge i ba, “Toto ya iya tuwau ya talamwan komiu kaiwemiu. Nuku ginol hikahikani o abanuwahikan.”
I ola al, aanan enaa, oine ana kom i ahe ge i ba, “Oine ya iya bateli vavaluna kaiwena, bateli o saliyau elana ni masala. Saliyau ni lau komiu kaiwemiu.
“He gamagal etega abwe ni wasaagau, iya ge nau ama iyehe te abaanan elana e.
Gamagal Natuna nau na aliga ni ola Yehoba wana nuwatu, yaa gamagal toto ni wasaagau nuwau i nakan, kaiwena bwaliga ana lahi ni bwata.”
Inoke tohago hi penelnel-agil henala gamwaliyaa ge nasi ni ginol ola o.
Tohago totoliya hi peawaawabalgig henala hi nuwatu gamwaliyaa alana i bwata hot.
Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Bolo Yehoba nige hi aabulilek-an, wali kin hi logugui-agil, ge wali tologuguiyau nuwaliya gamagalau nihi ba heyagil nihi ba, ‘Oo, tonuwa gamagal!’
Yaa komiu bahi nuku oola to. Henala alana i bwata gamwamiwa, he ni ola toto alana i kekeisi, ge toto i tohouwa ni tabwa totuwalali.
Henala alana i bwata? Toto i misiyo abaanan elana, o ebo toto i tuwalali aanan i ginol i pwatanik toaanan elana? He toto i misiyo abaanan elana te alana i bwata, age? Yaa nau ya minaa gamwamiwa ya ola totuwalali ya.
“Alowau komiu pulowan ta kalivai toyawe ge nige ku tataluwagau.
Inoke wami gasisi ya pepewa nuku logugui, ni ola Nam no gasisi iyaka i pem ya logugui.
Inoke no abalogugui elana alowau komiu ta anan ge ta imwim abaanan maisena elana, ge tologugui wali abamina nuku ahe Isileli ali un elulutega eluwa nuku logugui-agil.”
Yeisu i ba vevehe al i ba, “Saimon! Saimon! Seitani iyaka Yehoba wana talam i ahe ge ni labosemiu, ni ola toeyowa witi enona i labose ge i ase, yaka musana i ahek yoho.
Yaa nau iyaka ya awanun Yehoba elana kaiwem te bahi wam abulilek ni sosogu. Ge sauga toto nu nuwasikal eliyau, he talimwau nu pagasisi-agil.”
Pita Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Babala, ya talamwagau alou owa ta na dela ge alou owa ta yaomal.”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Pita, na baewa eliyam, bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin, inoke nu alahagau paeton nu ba, ‘Tau ya nige ya aatena.’”
Inoke Yeisu i nel tohago elal i ba, “Sauga toto valila ya patunamiu ku tagil ge nige wami mani abana, o ebo ami kaliko ana nabwa o ebo aemiu aana ku nonoahe, tab bugul etega ku kalaan?” Anana hi lahe hi ba, “Nigeya.”
Yaka i baek elal i ba, “He sauga ya, ebo wami mani abana o ebo ami kaliko ana nabwa i gan, nuku noahe. Ge ebo nige wami elohaveyan kilepana i gagan, he ami holahola tultul kaiwena nuku palian inoke manina nuku ahe ge etegana nuku pwamola.
Kaiwena Buki Bwabwalena i ba, ‘Iya al ge, alonau ge logugui ana toleke,’ ge na baewa eliyamiu, nasi gamagalau nihi ginol eliyau ni ola to. He bugul gegewena toto hi lelelian kaiweu i tatabwa tunahot te.”
Tohago hi baek elana hi ba, “Babala, u kite, elohaveyan kilepana eluwa hiwe eliyama e.” Analiya i lahe i ba, “Besena!”
Inoke Yeisu panuwa bwabwatana i eguluwan i nana Oya Olibe, i ola to sauga gegewena i giginol. He wana tohago alonau hi nok.
Sauga hi na hi vin, inoke i baek elal i ba, “Nuku awanun yaka bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu.”
Inoke i miluwagil ana bwaga ana yapu i ola ebo pat ta alihin ana yapu. Yaka i loepwakoku ge i awanun i ba,
“Nam, ebo wam nuwatu i ola, he lomwan ana kom ya u ahek yoho eliyau. Yaa bahi nau no nuwatu, owa ya wam nuwatu nu ginol.”
Inoke anelose etega i loem labulabumwa i masal elana ge i pagasisi.
Yeisu yayaluwana i pulowan nabi, inoke i awanun gagasisi, ana alutan i ola saliya i sogu i tal bilibiliya.
Sauga i awanun haba, inoke i milil i na tohago elal ge i kitel heliya iyoho hi kenukenu, kaiwena nuwanak tuwaliya i paaliga.
Yaka i nelil i ba, “Ga i ola ge ku kenukenu? Ku lut ge ku awanun inoke bahi lawakik kaiwena ge nuku sosogu.”
Yeisu iyoho ya i baaba tohago elal, inoke boda etega hi vinan. He tohago bolo elulutega eluwa avaliya etega alana Yudasa i nulil. Iya i na Yeisu elana tage i nanalo.
Yaa Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Yudasa, nu nalowau inoke toto o eliyana Gamagal Natuna nu pek ana topihigelgel elal?”
Sauga wana tohago hi kite hauna abwe ni gan, inoke hi ba, “Babala, tab wama elohaveyan kilepana elana naha lolil?”
Avaliya etegana wana elohaveyan kilepana i ahe inoke topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana totuwalali tanana labena awonaa i goyoho.
Yaa Yeisu i baek tohago elal i ba, “Besena!” Yaka nimana i teliya tau o tanana elana ge i waisi al.
Inoke i baek topowon bwabwatal avaliyau Limi Bwabwalena ana pulisimanau wali tohouwa ge tonowakau elal, heliya hi nowanik ge nihi lib, i ba, “Age nau toawatautau ge topihigelgel inoke haveyan kilepana ge ebwakil toguina ku noahe ge ku nem?
Lan gegewena alowau ya komiu Limi Bwabwalena elana, inoke nige ku lilibau. Yaa sauga ya komiu wami sauga te, sauga ya abalogugui gogogouina wana sauga logugui.”
Inoke Yeisu hi lib ge hi en pwatanik topowon bwabwatal wali tohouwa wana limiya. Pita i nouliulil eliyaa ana bwaga i gan.
He ginaha hi ton limi ana bakubaku ana luwaluwala, inoke Pita i na i misiyo alonau gamagalau bolo ginaha hi mipainan.
Galok totuwalali etega i kite Pita i misiyo ginaha mwananalina elana, inoke i gayawaan bubun ge i ba, “Tau ya iya al ge alona etega.”
Yaa Pita i alaha i ba, “Galok, tau ya nige ya aatena.”
Sauga nige i yayapu tau etega Pita i kite yaka i ba, “Owa al ge avaliya etega.” Anana i lahe i ba, “Gan, nau nige i oola.”
Sauga ana yapu i ola auwa maisena i mowasi, abwe tau etega i ba balbalgig i ba, “Tunahot tau ya alona etega, kaiwena iya Galili gamagalina.”
Anana Pita i lahe i ba, “Gan, nige ya aatena hauna gun u babaunan ei.” Pita iyoho ya i baaba inoke sauga o kamkam melutauina i kahin.
Inoke Babala i tagena pil matana i lihikan Pita elana, yaka abwe Pita Babala wana baaba i nuwatuan, toto i ba, “Bulin ebe kamkam melutauina nigeya ga ni kakahin inoke nu alahagau paeton.”
Inoke i na i tagil tola ge i kahin nabi.
Bolo Yeisu hi matahikan, hi talawasi-an ge hi nibinibihan.
Kaliko hi ahe matana hi am kaus ge hi nel elana hi ba, “Ebo owa palopita, inoke u baem eliyama henala ge i nibihiwa?”
Inoke baaba nanakina i gewi al hi baunan eliyana.
Panuwa abwe i mwananal ya, yaka Yudiya wali tonowakau aloliyau topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite hi migogo, inoke Yeisu hi pwatanik tologugui o elal.
Hi baek elana hi ba, “Wama wasa nu pem te ebo owa Mesaiya.” Analiya i lahe i ba, “Ebo wami wasa na pewa, he nige nuku aabulilek-agau,
ge ebo nel etega na neli eliyamiu, nige nuku lalahe.
Yaa sauga ya ge ta nanawa maninilaa, nau Gamagal Natuna na misiyowa Yehoba Togasisi labena awonaa.”
Inoke gegewel hi nel hi ba, “He owa Yehoba Natuna?” Analiya i lahe i ba, “Ku ba ola o he heiya te nau e.”
Inoke hi ba, “Iyaka besena to. Nige al ta loloya tage gamagalau nihi nem ge nihi baaba tau ya kaiwena. Kila totola iyaka wana baaba ta hagoem awanaa.”
Inoke Yudiya wali tologugui gegewel hi lut ge Yeisu hi ahe hi en pwatanik Pilato elana.
Yaka hi telipuna hi wole hi ba, “Tau ya ha pwawa iya wama gamagalau i papankitel panakil. I ba tage bahi takis naha pwapwamola Sisa elana ge totona i ba tage iya Mesaiya ama wama kin.”
Yaka Pilato i nel Yeisu elana i ba, “Owa Yudiya wali kin?” Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba, “He i ola te wam baaba ei.”
Inoke Pilato i baek topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge boda elal i ba, “Tau ya nige ana woliwoli puna etega ya pwapwawa ge tage ana lahi na baunan.”
Yaa heliya hi ba balbalgig hi ba, “Wana panpankiti elana inoke gamagalau i paawaawauli-agil Yudiya wali labi gegewel elal. I telipunaa labi Galili ge iyaka i nem te panuwa ya elana.”
Wali baaba o Pilato i hago, yaka i nel elal i ba, “Age tau ya Galili gamagalina?”
Sauga Pilato i atena te Yeisu i neem Galili, Helodi wana abaloguguiya, inoke i patuna i na Helodi elana. He saugena o Helodi iya iyoho Yelusalema.
Sauga Helodi Yeisu i kite nuwana i waisi hot, kaiwena wasana i hago inoke sauga yayapona nuwana te ni kite. He i nuwatu ginol yawiyawi enuna Yeisu ni ginolil ge ni kite.
Inoke nel i gewi i neli Yeisu elana, yaa nige anana i lalahe.
Topowon bwabwatal ge Logugui ana topankite hi talmilila to, yaka hi wole panapanak-an.
Helodi alonau ge tolohaveyan Yeisu hi talawasi-an ge hi nivali. Yaka kaliko yayapona matana waiwaisana hi ahe hi pagaloi, inoke hi patuna pasikal i na Pilato elana.
He lan o elana, Helodi alona ge Pilato maniniliya hi abubun ge hi heliheliyam al, yaa valila alona ge alona hi pihigelgel.
Pilato topowon bwabwatal aloliyau tologugui ge gamagalau i yoga gogonil,
yaka i baek elal i ba, “Ewasi tau ya ku en pwatanim eliyau ge ku ba tage gamagalau i pankitel panakil nihi pihigelgel gamaman elana. He matamiwa ya neli bubun woliwoli kaiweliya toto eliyana ge ku wole, yaa nige puna etega ya pwapwawa.
Helodi al ge nige woliwoli puna etega i pwapwawa, inoke heiya te kaiwena ge i patuna pasikalim eliyama e. Ku kite, iya nige bugul etega i giginol panak ge tage kaiwena ni yaomal.
He na ba tolohaveyan nihi nibihi, yaka abwe na sokal.”
(Baliman maisena ge maisena, Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana, Pilato toulutuk dela maisena ni sokal ge ni tagil.)
Boda hi yoga pamaisena analiya i bwata hi ba, “Tau ya ni aliga! Balabas u sokal eliyama!”
(He Balabas iya valila haveyan i palut Yelusalema gamwanaa hi pihigelgel Loma wali gamaman elana, ge gamagal etega i tagapaaliga, inoke toto ya kaiwena hi teli tukan dela.)
Pilato nuwana Yeisu ni sokal, inoke i baaba al boda elal.
Yaa heliya hi yogayoga elana hi ba, “U lokolosan! U lokolosan!”
Paetonina Pilato i baaba al elal i ba, “Hauna kaiwena ge na lokolosan? Hauna nak tau ya i ginol? Nige nak puna etega ya pwapwawa eliyana ge tage kaiwena ni yaomal. He na ba tolohaveyan nihi nibihi, yaka abwe na sokal.”
Yaa hi lawakik ge hi yoga balbalgig analiya i bwaya nuwaliya Pilato Yeisu ni lokolos. Yaka wali yoga o Pilato wana ba lolopwal i ehik.
Inoke Pilato wali nuwatu i talamwi.
Tau toto nuwaliya i sokal, toto valila haveyan i palut ge gamagal etega i tagapaaliga. Ge Yeisu i talamwan elal nihi ginol ni ola wali nuwatu.
Tolohaveyan Yeisu hi en egonan hi nanawa lokolos kaiwena, yaka tau etega hi pwawa gagama Sailini, alana Saimon, i neem tola i nana i tutuk Yelusalema. Inoke hi lib ge Yeisu ana kolos hi pakalivai i nawaa enaa.
Gamagalau boda bwabwatana Yeisu hi noulil, gamwaliyaa yowau enuna, heliya hi kahikahin Yeisu baena.
Yeisu i tagena pil i baek elal i ba, “Yelusalema yowauiliyau, bahi baeu nuku kakahin, yaa totomiu baemiu ge natumiyau baeliya te nuku kahin.
Kaiwena sauga i nenem abwe nak bwabwatana ni gan ge gamagalau nihi ba, ‘Yowau bolo hi kobwas heliya hi waisi, kaiwena nige sauga etega natuliyau i gagan ge hi papaalahul.’
Yaka sauga o elana gamagalau nihi baek oya elal nihi ba, ‘Nuku maguli pwatameya,’ ge nihi baek manahinhin elal, ‘Nuku yabomwima.’
Ebwakil kolena ta ton memena nige i gagasisi, yaa ebo i mati ge ta ton, yaka abwe memena i gasisi hot. Inoke i ola al to, sauga ya gamagalau nak bolo ya hi awaginol, yaa sauga mulaa nak bwabwatana hot abwe ni masal.”
Bolau eluwa al, heliya nak ana toginol, tolohaveyan hi enil ge aloliya Yeisu nihi lopaaligal.
Sauga hi na hi vin panuwa alana hi ba Pana Babaloma, inoke Yeisu hi lokolosana to, alonau ge nak ana toginol labui. Etegana ana kolos hi pamilila labena awonaa, ge etegana labena gegebanaa.
Yaka Yeisu i ba, “Nam, wali gegi nu nuwayoho, kaiwena nige hi aatena hauna hi giginol.” Tolohaveyan ana kaliko hi wali, yaka pat hi ahe galavenu etega hi galavenu-an, inoke eliyana kaliko ana pwahin tomaha tomaha hi guyauan elal.
Gamagalau hi talmilil Yeisu hi gayawaan, yaka Yudiya wali tologugui hi lamwa tunatuna-an hi ba, “Gamagalau getogal i pwamwalil. He totona ni pwamwal, ebo iya Mesaiya Yehoba wana hilihili gamagalina.”
Tolohaveyan al ge Yeisu hi talawasi-an. Hi noha gegelinaa ge oine manumanunina hi pek ni im,
yaka hi baek elana hi ba, “Ebo owa Yudiya wali kin, he totom u pwamwaliwa.”
Leleli etega hi leli, inoke hi tagahikan ana kolos elana kokowana pwatanaa, i ba, “Toto ya iya Yudiya wali kin.”
Nak ana toginol eluwa hi kukuki kolos elana, etegana Yeisu i lamwa tunatuna-an i ba, “Age owa Mesaiya? He totom u pwamwaliwa ge ama al nu pwamwalima!”
Yaa etegana alona i ba lalaan i ba, “Age nige Yehoba u lolovakun-an? Lahi maisena toto tau ya i pwawa, owa al ge u pwawa.
Owa ge nau ala lahi i sapu hot, kaiwena toto ta ginol he lahena te. Yaa tau ya nige bugul etega i giginol panak.”
Inoke i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Yeisu, sauga wam abalogugui ni nem ge nu tabwa kin, nu nuwahikagau.”
Anana Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Tunahot ya ba eliyam, lan ebe alou owa ta minaa labulabumwa.”
Alalati bwagatau sabwelu yanana i mowasi ge panuwa gegewena i gogou ana siga tili kilok kokoyavi.
Kaliko mamanana toto hi pakuki Limi Bwabwalena gamwana hi baba tomwaya, i maleli labi eluwa.
Inoke Yeisu i yoga anana i bwaya i ba, “Nam, yayaluwau ya teli nimwam gamwanaa.” Sauga i ba ola o, inoke yawalina i mowasi.
Tolohaveyan wali tohouwa i kite hauna gun i gan, inoke Yehoba i tobalan ge i ba, “Tunahot tau ya iya tosasapona.”
Gamagalau gegewel bolo hi migogo ge hi gagayawa, sauga hi kite hauna gun i gan, nuwaliya i nak inoke babagaliliya hi lol ge hi sikalan hi na wali limiya.
Yaa Yeisu wana heliyamwau ge yowau bolo valila hi toulil avaliya hi neem Galili, gegewel hi talmililek laha ge mataliya i nok bugul bolo ya hi gagayawa-an.
Tau etegana alana Yosepa, i neem Yudiya awanina etega alana Alimadiya, wana pagan i waisi ge i sapu. Iya i matamatan Yehoba wana abalogugui kaiwena. He iya Yudiya wali tologugui avaliya etega, yaa nige i oolak alonau wali nuwatu ge wali ginol elana.
<range>
I nok Pilato elana Yeisu tuwana i patalam ge ni ahe.
Inoke i na i ahe kolos elana, kaliko waiwaisana elana i osiya ge i na i teli salaiya toto hi ken tukan pat elana. Salai o nige toyaomal etega ga hi teteliya.
Lan o Sabwata ana lan lovivina, ge kelaubwa Sabwata ni telipuna.
Yowau bolo valila avaliya Yeisu hi neem Galili, Yosepa hi toulil, inoke salai hi kite, ge hi kite Yeisu tuwana ga hi teli ola.
Yaka abwe hi sikal hi na wali limiya, inoke sawasawal ge enonu bwalena waiwaisana hi lovivina-an Yeisu tuwana kaiwena. Yaa lan Sabwata hi veyaho i ola Logugui ana baaba.
Wik ana lan houwan elana, mweluluga kekeisi hot, yowau enonu bwalena waiwaisana toto iyaka hi lovivina-an hi ahe ge hi na salaiya.
Hi kite pat toto salai awana hi paankausiya iyaka hi pakul yoho,
inoke hi na hi tuk salai gamwanaa, yaa nige Babala Yeisu tuwana hi kikite.
Heliya iyoho hi nuwanuwatu Yeisu tuwana kaiwena, inoke sauga o bolau eluwa ali kaliko i namanamal hi talmilil labeliyaa.
Yowau hi lovakun nabi yaka hi kululu maniniliya i loek bilibiliya. Yaa bolau eluwa hi baek elal hi ba, “Hauna kaiwena ge toto yawalina gaganina ku loyaan toyaomal wali abamina elana?
Nige i gagan te, iyaka i lut! Wana baaba nuku nuwahikan, toto i baunan eliyamiu sauga alomiu ku miminaa labi Galili.
I ba, ‘Gamagal Natuna nihi talamwan gamagalau nanakil nimaliyaa ge nihi lokolos, lan etonina elana inoke ni lutem yaomala.’”
Yaka abwe yowau Yeisu wana baaba o hi nuwatuan.
Sauga hi sikalem salaiya, bugul ya gegewena wasana hi wasaan apostolowau elulutega maisena elal, avaliyau ge tohago gegewel al.
Yowau bolo wasa o hi wasaan apostolowau elal, heliya Meli Magidala yovana, Yowana, Meli toto Yemesa hinana, aloliyau ge yowau bolo avaliyau al.
He apostolowau nige yowau wali wasa hi aabulilek-an, kaiwena hi nuwatu tage wali baaba i ola ba bwagabwaga ya.
Yaa Pita i lut ge i patalelu i na salaiya. I kululu, yaka kaliko awawana ya i kite. Inoke i sikal i na wana limiya ge i nuwanuwatu bugul bolo i gan kaiweliya.
Lan maisena o elana tohago ali toto eluwa hi nanawa awan alana Emius kaiwena. Emius ge Yelusalema ali hawawal ana yapu i ola leben kilomita.
Ali toto eluwa hi nonoliwaliwan bugul gegewena bolo i masal kaiweliya.
Heliya iyoho hi nonoliwaliwan ge hi nelnel bugul o kaiweliya, yaka Yeisu i noha eliyalil ge aloliya hi notoyawa.
Hi kite ya, yaa nige mataliya i mwamwapwela ge nihi atena te henala iya.
Yaka abwe i nelil i ba, “Sauga ku nawanawa, hauna gun bana ge ku pepeliwaliwan-agimiu?” Yaka hi notalmilil, ali awa i nuwaleyan.
Etegana alana Kaliyopas i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Tonawanawa hi gewi iyoho Yelusalema, he tabam owa maisem ya nige u aatena hauna gun i masala o sauga ya elana.”
Yaka i nel elal i ba, “Hauna gun bana?” Anana hi lahe hi ba, “Bugul toto i masal Yeisu gagama Nasaleta elana. Tau ya iya palopita etega, wana baaba ge wana ginol gasigasisena ya, Yehoba matanaa ge gamagalau gegewel mataliyaa.
Topowon bwabwatal aloliyau ge wama tologugui hi teli gavana nimanaa, inoke i talamwan ni yaomal, yaka abwe hi lokolosan.
He ama ha nuwatu te Yehoba tau ya i hile iya boda Isileli ni sokalil. Ge bugul etega al, lan eton iyaka i mowasi ge bugul bolo o hi masal.
He wama boda yowauiliyau enuna atema hi payou. Ewasi mweluluga kekeisi hot hi na salaiya,
yaa nige tuwana hi kikite. Sauga hi sikal, inoke hi baem eliyama tage pankite etega i masal aneloseyau hi kitel ge tage hi baek elal hi ba, ‘Iyaka i lut.’
Inoke alomeyau enuna al hi na salaiya ge hi pwawa i ola ya te yowau wali wasa, yaa iya nige hi kikite.”
Inoke abwe Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Ku sigasiga hot ge atemiu i gasisi, yaka nige etimwawa palopitau wali wasa gegewena ku aabulilek-an.
Age nige ku aatena e Mesaiya lomwan o ni pwawa ga abwe mulaa ni ulutuk wana wasawasa elana?”
Inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba iya kaiwena i pwamwananal elal, i telipunaa Mosese wana buki elal ge palopitau gegewel wali leleli.
Hi nawanawa ee, kelaubwa nihi vin awan toto kaiwena hi nonok, inoke Yeisu i ginol i ola te nuwana ni novevehe al.
Yaa hi awanun nabinabi elana hi ba, “Aloma owa ta mina, kaiwena kelaubwa bulin ni gan ge panuwa ni gogou.” Inoke i na i tuk limiya aloliya nihi mina.
Aanan ana sauga inoke i na alonau hi misiyo abaanan elana. Yaka beleid i ahe ge i ba mulolu Yehoba elana, inoke i pigebagebal-an ge i guyauan elal.
I ginol ola o, yaka abwe mataliya i mwapwela ge hi atena henala iya, yaa i miyaomala mataliyaa.
Ali toto eluwa hi pebaaba-agil hi ba, “Sauga ta nawanawa kamwasaa ge i liwaliwan elala Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i pwamwananal, tunahot atela i waiwai, age?”
He sauga o hi lut ge hi sikal hi na Yelusalema, yaka apostolowau elulutega maisena hi pwawal aloliyau ge aloliyau enuna hi migogo.
Heliya hi baek bolo eluwa elal hi ba, “Tunahot Babala iyaka i lut. He i masala Saimon elana.”
Inoke bolo eluwa avaliyau wali wasa hi pek hauna i gan elal kamwasaa. Ge hi ba, “Sauga beleid i ahe ge i pigebagebal-an, inoke abwe ha atena iya Yeisu.”
Tohago eluwa heliya iyoho ya hi baaba avaliyau elal, yaka Yeisu i masal i talmilila gamwaliyaa ge i baek elal i ba, “Atemiu ni laumwal!”
Ateliya i you ge hi lovakun, hi nuwatu tage gagayumwa hi kite.
Yaka i baek elal i ba, “Ga i ola ge atemiu i bwanabwana ge nuwamiu i eleluwa?
Nimwau ge aeu ku kite. He nau te! Tuwau ku pibose ge nuku atena. Gagayumwa nige bunumwina ge tutuwana i gagan i oola toto ku kiteya nau eliyau.”
Sauga i ba ola o, inoke nimana ge aena i pankitel.
Heliya hi yaliyaya nabi ge nuwaliya hi ahe, yaa nige ga hi aabulilek-an. Inoke i nelil i ba, “Tab aanan etega i gan ge na an?”
Inoke moti totonina awahinena hi pek,
yaka i ahe ge i an mataliyaa.
Inoke i baek elal i ba, “Valila sauga alowau komiu, ya baewa eliyamiu i ola hiwe: bugul gegewena hi lelelian kaiweu Mosese wana logugui elana, palopitau wali leleli elana ge Same elana nihi tabwa tunahot.”
Yaka wali nuwatu i ba pwela ge Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ana sapu nihi atena.
I baek elal i ba, “Buki Bwabwalena i ba ola hiwe. Mesaiya lomwan ni pwawa ge ni yaomal, yaka lan etonina elana ni lutem yaomala.
Inoke iya alana elana nihi papaatena gamagalau labi gegewena elal nihi telipunaa Yelusalema, yaka gamagalau wali gegi ana en nihi pek ge Yehoba wali gegi ni nuwayoho.
He komiu nuku tabwa bugul gegewena o ali towasa.
Nau toto Nam i bateli kaiwemiu ya papatuna i nenem eliyamiu. Yaa nuku minaa ga Yelusalema ana siga gasisi ni loem Yehoba elana nuku kalaopopwi.”
Yeisu tohago i enil Yelusalema hi eguluwan hi na Bedani ana labiya, inoke nimana i latahin ge i ba muloluagil.
Iya iyoho i baaba muloluagil, yaka i tataluwagil ge Yehoba i ahe i ha labulabumwa.
Heliya hi kululu ge hi tapwalolo eliyana, abwe alona wali yaliyaya bwabwatana hi sikal Yelusalema.
Inoke sauga gegewena hi miminaa Limi Bwabwalena elana Yehoba hi tobatobal-an.
Mulaa abwe bugul gegewel hi gan, Baaba iyoho i gan, iya alona Yehoba, ge Baaba iya Yehoba.
Abatelipuna elana iya iyoho alona Yehoba.
Iya eliyana Yehoba bugul gegewena i ginolil. Binimala iya nigeya, bugul bolo hi gan nige nihi gagan, yaa iya eliyana inoke hi masal.
Iya elana yawal i gan, ge yawal o iya gamagalau wala mwananal.
Mwananal i yana gogou gamwanaa, yaa gogou mwananal o nige i aatena.
Tau etega alana Diyon, iya Yehoba i patuna i nem panayawi.
Iya i nem mwananal wasana i wasaan, inoke gamagalau gegewel wasa ya nihi hago ge nihi abulilek.
Iya nige mwananal i oola, yaa i nem mwananal wasana i wasaan.
Mwananal tutunahotina, toto mwananal ni pek gamagalau gegewel elal, iya i nem panayawi.
I nem i minaa panayawi, yaa bwagana iya eliyana Yehoba panayawi i ginol, he panayawi gamagaliliyau nige hi aatena te henala iya.
I nem i minaa totona wana labi elana, yaa wana labi gamagaliliyau nige hi pwapwamwa pahe.
Yaa bolo hi pwamwa heyan ge alana hi abulilek-an, i talam bosowailiya nihi tabwa Yehoba natunau.
Hi tabwa Yehoba natunau nige tage panayawi tamanina wana pamasal elana, o ebo gamagalau wali nuwatu elana, yaa Yehoba i ab pavavaluna-agil.
Baaba i tabwa gamagal, inoke avala ta mina ga sauga kekeisi, mulolu ge baaba tutunahotina i kalaopopwi. Wana wasawasa ha kite, i ola Yehoba Natuna maisena ya wana wasawasa, i neem Tamana elana.
Wasana Diyon Tobabitaiso i wasaan, i yogayoga i ba, “Toto ya heiya te bana ge valila ya ba, ‘Toto i nenem ewa iya i bwata lakeyau, kaiwena iya i gan houwa mulaa abwe ya masal.’”
Iya mulolu i kalaopopwi, inoke gegewela wana mulolu ta pwawa i pem hikahikani.
Yehoba Logugui i pek Mosese elana ge iya i pamasal gamagalau elal, yaa mulolu ge baaba tutunahotina i masalem Yeisu Keliso elana.
Nige sauga etega gamagal etega Yehoba i kikite, yaa Yehoba Natuna maisena ya, iya i ola Yehoba, ge iya alona Tamana hi mitoyawa, iya iyaka Yehoba i pankitela.
Yudiya wali tohouwa bolo Yelusalema, topowon enuna avaliyau ge un Libai enuna al hi patunal hi na Diyon elana hi nel hi ba, “Henala owa?”
Diyon nige i mimikekei, yaa analiya i lahe ge i ba bubun i ba, “Nau nige Mesaiya i oola.”
Yaka hi neli al hi ba, “He binimala henala owa? Owa Ilaitiya?” Diyon i ba, “Nau nige Ilaitiya i oola.” Yudiya hi nel al hi ba, “Age owa palopita bwabwatana toto i nenem?” Analiya i lahe i ba, “Nigeya.”
Yaka Yudiya hi ba, “He henala owa? Ga nu ba ola totom kaiwem? Nu ba pasapu eliyama, inoke naha na bolo hi patunama wali wasa naha pek bubun.”
Diyon Yudiya analiya i lahe palopita Aiseya wana baaba elana i ba, “Nau toto i yogayoga uleya i ba, ‘Babala wana kamwasa ku pasapu.’”
Bolo Yudiya wali tohouwa hi patunal, gamwaliyaa enuna Palisi.
Heliya hi nel Diyon elana hi ba, “He hauna kaiwena ge u papababitaiso, ebo owa nige Mesaiya, o Ilaitiya o ebo palopita toto bwabwatana i oola?”
Diyon analiya i lahe i ba, “Nau wewel elana ya papababitaiso, yaa etega iyoho i talmilila gamwamiwa nige ku aatena.
Iya i nenem ewa, yaa nau nige no waisi i gagan ge tage aena ana os ana hihiu na sokal.”
Bugul gegewena ya i gana Bedani elana, wewel Yolidani labi leunati. He Diyon i papababitaisowa wewel Yolidani elana.
Hi kenu lan i gan, inoke Diyon matana i nok Yeisu i kite i nanawa elana, yaka i ba, “Ku kite! Iya Sipi Natuna toto Yehoba i patunam panayawi gamagaliliyau wali gegi ni ahek yoho!
Iya te bana ge valila ya ba, ‘Tau toto i nenem ewa, iya i bwata lakeyau, kaiwena iya i gan houwa mulaa abwe ya masal.’
Saugena o nau nige ya aatena henala bana ya babaa, yaa ya nem gamagalau ya pababitaisol wewel elana, puna heiya te iya na pamasal Isileli elal.”
Inoke Diyon i wasa al i ba, “Nau valila nige ya aatena henala i nenem, yaa toto i patunau ge wewel elana gamagalau ya pababitaisol i baem elau i ba, ‘Tau toto nu kite Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ni lau ge ni minaa elana, he iya te Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana ni papababitaiso.’ Inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena ya kite i loem labulabumwa i ola bunibuni ge i lau i minaa elana.
<range>
Ya kiteya matawa, heiya te ya ba, ‘Tau ya iya Yehoba Natuna.’”
Lan i gan al, Diyon iyoho i taltalmilil al alonau ge wana tohago eluwa,
ge sauga Diyon Yeisu i kite i nanawa, inoke i ba, “Ku kite! Iya Sipi Natuna toto Yehoba i patunam!”
Sauga tohago ali toto eluwa hi hago Diyon baaba o i baunan, yaka hi tatauliulil Yeisu enaa.
Yeisu i tagena sikal i kitel, yaka i nelil i ba, “Hauna gun nuwamiu?” Tohago hi ba, “Labai, ga u miminaa?” (Vilan “Labai” ana pasikal heiya “topankite.”)
Yeisu analiya i lahe i ba, “Ku nem yaka nuku kite.” Inoke avaliya Yeisu hi na wana abamina hi kite, ge lan o avaliya hi miminaa to. He sauga o iyaka po kilok kokoyavi ana labi elana.
Bolo Diyon wana baaba hi hago ge hi tatauliulil Yeisu enaa, he etegana te Andulu, Saimon Pita talina.
Inoke houwan hot Andulu i na talina Saimon i loyaan ge wana wasa i pek i ba, “Mesaiya iyaka ha pwawa.” (Vilan “Mesaiya” pana Gilik elana hi ba “Keliso.”)
Yaka Andulu Saimon i en pwatanik Yeisu elana. Yeisu matana i nok Saimon i gayawaan, yaka i ba, “Owa Saimon, Diyon natuna, yaa alam ya tun Sipas.” (Alan “Sipas” ana pasikal pana Gilik elana hi ba “Pita,” ana sapu heiya “pat.”)
Lan i gan al, inoke Yeisu i nuwatu ni nok ni na Galili. Pilipi i pwawa ge i baek elana i ba, “U nem u toulilau.”
Pilipi wana panuwa te Betesaida, he panuwa o Andulu ge Pita al wali panuwa.
Pilipi Nataniyel i pwawa, yaka i baek elana i ba, “Tau toto wasana Mosese i lelelian Logugui ana buki elana, ge palopitau al hi lelelian, iyaka ha pwawa, iya Yeisu gagama Nasaleta, Yosepa natuna.”
Yaka Nataniyel i nel i ba, “Age bosowaina ya waisi etega ni neem Nasaleta?” Yaka Pilipi i ba, “He u nem ga ta na u kite.”
Sauga Yeisu Nataniyel i kite i nanawa elana, yaka i ba, “Tau ya iya Isileli tutunahotina etega, ge nige kakawi etega i gagana elana.”
Inoke Nataniyel i nel Yeisu elana i ba, “Ga i ola ge u atenau?” Yeisu i ba, “Ya kitewa u misiyo poga punaa, mulaa abwe Pilipi i yogaagiwa.”
Yaka Nataniyel i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Topankite, owa Yehoba Natuna, ge owa Isileli wali kin!”
Yeisu i ba, “U abulilek kaiwena ya ba, ‘Ya kitewaa poga punaa.’ Toto ya nige i bwabwaya, yaa abwe bugul bwabwayal enuna nu kitel.”
Yaka Yeisu i ba al i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, abwe nuku kite labulabum ni mwapwela ge Yehoba wana aneloseyau nihi haha ge nihi laulau Gamagal Natuna elana.”
Lan eluwa i mowasi, abwe alolon hagalena etega hi ginola Galili awanina Kena elana. Yeisu hinana i nok hagali o elana,
ge Yeisu alonau wana tohago hi awanunil hi nok al alolon o elana.
Sauga oine i mowasi, inoke Yeisu hinana i baek elana i ba, “Iyaka nige wali oine etega al i gagan.”
Inoke Yeisu hinana anana i lahe i ba, “Nevenak, hauna kaiwena baaba ya u baunan elau? No sauga nigeya ga i pwapwawa.”
Yaka Yeisu hinana i baek totuwalali elal i ba, “Ebo hauna gun ni baunan eliyamiu, nuku ginol ola wana baaba.”
Mulaa abwe Yudiya nihi anan, nimaliya ge wali bugubugul nihi ul ni ola wali tapwalolo ana logugui, inoke toto o kaiwena ulubwal pat elana hi ginoliliya ali gewi esiwa (6) iyoho to, maisena ge maisena bosowaina wewel ni minaa gamwanaa ana bwata ni ola 100 lita.
Yaka Yeisu i baek totuwalali elal i ba, “Wewel ku wage ulubwal nuku pakalaopopwil.” Inoke wewel hi wage ge ulubwal hi pakalaopopwil i na ana siga awaliyaa.
Yaka Yeisu i baek totuwalali elal i ba, “Sauga ya enuna ku wage ge ku na ku pek tau toto hagali i kauni elana.” Yaka hi ginol i ola Yeisu wana baaba,
ge tau toto hagali i kauni wewel toto Yeisu i pil ge i tabwa oine i im bose. Nige i aatena te oine o ga i noem, yaa totuwalali bolo wewel hi wage hi atena. Yaka tau toto hagali i kauni toalolon melutauina i yogaan i nok elana,
ge i baek elana i ba, “Sauga gegewena oine amnana waiwaisana ta teli tagilan houwan, ge sauga gamagalau iyaka hi im nabiyan ge amnaliya i pwawa, inoke abwe oine toto nige amnana i wawaisi hot ta teli tagilan. Yaa owa nige u giginol ola. Oine amnana waiwaisana hot u kukuhikan ana siga sauga ya, abwe u teli tagilan.”
Ginol yawiyawi toto ya Yeisu wana ginol yawiyawi houwan hot, i ginola awan Kena elana labi Galili. Ginol o elana wana wasawasa i pamasal, inoke wana tohago hi abulilek-an.
Alolon hagalena enaa, yaka Yeisu alonau hinana, talinau ge wana tohago hi nok hi na Kapeniyama, inoke hi miminaa ga o lan enuna.
Sauga iyaka kelaubwa Yudiya wali Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga, inoke Yeisu i nok i na Yelusalema.
Yeisu i na Limi Bwabwalena ana bakubakuwa, inoke gamagalau enuna i pwawal bulumakau, sipi ge bunibuni hi lolopalipali, ge enuna hi misiyo wali teibol elana ge mani hi lololopatal.
Inoke hihiu enuna i ahe enibinibi i ginol, ge eliyana gamagalau avaliyau wali bulumakau ge sipi i takel tagilagil Limi Bwabwalena tolinaa, ge mani ana tololopatal wali teibol i kukupapagena-an ge wali mani i tagakayakaya-an,
ge i baek bunibuni ali topalipali elal i ba, “Bugul bolo ya ku bugul egonagil! Bahi al Nam wana limi nuku giginol ni oola wami abamaket!”
Yaka tohago Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba hi nuwahikan, toto i ba, “Wam limi ana nunuwana i tau atewa i ola ginaha.”
Yaka Yudiya hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba, “He ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol naha kite, inoke naha atena tunahot Yehoba wam gasisi i pewa te ginol ya u ginol.”
Yeisu Yudiya analiya i lahe i ba, “Ebo Limi Bwabwalena ya nuku pasamwalekaleka, inoke lan eton elana na pamilil al.”
Yudiya Yeisu anana hi lahe hi ba, “Baliman ana gewi poti sikis te limi ya hi taltali, yaa owa u ba, ‘Lan eton elana na pamilil al.’”
Yaa Limi Bwabwalena toto bana ge Yeisu i babaa, he iya tuwana bana.
Inoke sauga i lutem yaomala, wana tohago wana baaba o hi nuwahikan, inoke Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba ge Yeisu wana baaba hi abulilek-an.
Sauga Yeisu iyoho Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena ana sauga elana, gamagalau hi gewi wana ginol yawiyawi i ginolil hi kite, inoke hi abulilek elana.
Yaa Yeisu nige i oolak elal ge i memelteli-agil, kaiwena gamagalau gegewel wali nuwatu i atena.
Nige tage wana aatena i kaubwa ge abwe gamagal etega wana wasa ni pek gamagalau wali nuwatu kaiwena, yaa i atena te hauna iyoho gamagalau ateliyaa.
Tau etega Yudiya wali tohouwa etegana alana Nikodimas, iya boda Palisi gamagalina etega.
Bulin etega i na Yeisu elana ge i ba, “Labai, ha atena owa topankite etega u neem Yehoba elana, kaiwena nige gamagal etega bosowaina ginol yawiyawi ni ginol ni ola owa, ebo Yehoba nige i miminek elana.”
Yeisu Nikodimas anana i lahe i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyam, nige bosowaina gamagal etega Yehoba wana abalogugui ni kite ana siga ebo Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna.”
Yaa Nikodimas i ba, “Ebo gamagal etega iyaka i matuwa, ga nihi ab ola-an? Nige bosowaina ni ulutuk sikal hinana tinenaa ge hinana ni ab paeluwana al.”
Yeisu Nikodimas anana i lahe i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyam, nige bosowaina gamagal etega ni ulutuk Yehoba wana abaloguguiya ana siga ebo Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna wewel ge Yayaluwa Bwabwalena elana.
Gamagal tamana ge hinana tuwana hi ab yawalina i gan, yaa ebo Yayaluwa Bwabwalena gamagal o ni ab pavavaluna, inoke abwe yayaluwana yawalina ni gan.
Bahi atem ni yoyou no baaba kaiwena, toto ya ba, ‘Ebo nuwamiu nuku ulutuk Yehoba wana abaloguguiya, he Yehoba ni ab pavavaluna-agimiu.’
Mana i towa i yu olak labi toto nuwana ni noek. Butuna ta hago, yaa nige ta aatena te ga i yu noem ge ga i totowa noek. He Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana tuwalali i ola ya to gamagalau gegewel bolo i ab pavavaluna-agil eliyalil.”
Yaka Nikodimas i nel al Yeisu elana i ba, “Baaba toto u baunan ga ni masal ola?”
Yeisu i ba, “Owa Isileli wali topankite bwabwatana etega. He ga i ola ge no baaba ana sapu nige u aatena?
Ya ba tunahot eliyam, bugul toto ha atena te ha baunan, ge toto ha kite te ha wasaan, yaa komiu wama baaba nige ku aabulilek-an.
Sauga ebo ya baaba bugul bolo hi masala panayawiya kaiweliya, yaka no baaba nige ku aabulilek-an. He ga abwe nuku abulilek ola ebo na baaba bugul bolo hi masala labulabumwa kaiweliya?
Nige gamagal etega i haha labulabumwa, iyai ya te Gamagal Natuna, iya i loem labulabumwa.
Mosese kopa i ahe mwata kakanununa i ginol ge i teli heyan suki elana uleya, he i ola ya te Gamagal Natuna abwe nihi teli heyan kolos elana,
inoke gamagalau gegewel bolo hi abulilek elana yawaliliya hot nihi ahe.”
He Yehoba panayawi i nunuwana-an nabiyan, yaka Natuna maisena hot i talamwan, inoke henala ebo ni abulilek-an nige ni yayaomal, yawalina hot ni ahe.
Yehoba Natuna i patuna i lau panayawiya, nige tage gamagalau panayawi ni pakotil, yaa ni pwamwalil.
Gamagal toto i abulilek elana nige ana kot i gagan, yaa toto nige i aabulilek, iya ana kot i mowasi ge ana lahi hi baunan haba, kaiwena nige i aabulilek Yehoba Natuna maisena alana elana.
He yatala puna i ola hiwe: mwananal iyaka i nem i tuk panayawi, yaa gamagalau nuwaliya i noek gogou elana, mwananal nige nuwaliya i oola, kaiwena wali pagan i nak.
Bolo ginol nanakina hi awaawaginol, mwananal hi pihigelgel-an ge nige hi nonok mwananala, kaiwena nige nuwaliya i oola wali pagan nanakina mwananal ni pamasal.
Yaa bolo wali ginol i sapu ge i tunahot hi nok mwananala, kaiwena nuwaliya ni mwananal te toto hi ginol hi ginola Yehoba wana gasisi elana.
Yaka sauga etega Yeisu alonau ge wana tohago hi na labi Yudiya, inoke alonau hi miminek ga o, ge gamagalau i papababitaisol.
Diyon Tobabitaiso al ge gamagalau i papababitaisol, iya iyoho Ainon awan Salim gegelinaa, kaiwena labi o elana wewel i bwata. Inoke gamagalau hi noknok elana ni pababitaisol.
He saugena o Diyon nigeya ga hi teteli dela.
Diyon wana tohago enuna avaliya Yudiya etega hi peawabalgigil highig paganina kaiwena, hauna toto nihi toulil ge bosowailiya nihi sapu Yehoba matanaa.
Yaka tohago o hi nok hi na Diyon elana hi ba, “Topankite, tau toto valila alom wewel Yolidani labena leunati ge wasana u wasaan, he iya iyoho sauga e gamagalau i papababitaisol, ge gamagalau gegewel to hi noknok elana o.”
Analiya i lahe i ba, “Nige bosowaina bugul etega ni gan gamagal etega elana iyai te ebo Yehoba ni talamwan elana.
He komiu totomiu valila ku hago ya te ya ba, ‘Nau nige Mesaiya i oola, yaa Yehoba i patunau houwan Mesaiya awonaa.’
Toalolon melutauina iya te toalolon meluyovana i aahe, yaa toalolon melutauina wana heliyam i matamatan toalolon melutauina alona ge toalolon meluyovana nihi vin, inoke iya iyoho i lalaegan. Inoke sauga toalolon melutauina anana i hago, yaka i yaliyaya nabi. He nau no yaliyaya i ola to, ge no yaliyaya iyaka i olaolaek.
Iya alana ni bwatabwata ya, ge nau alau ni lolowa ya.”
Tau toto i neem natiya, iya gamagalau gegewela i bwata lakela. Tau toto i neem panayawiya, iya panayawi gamagalina ge i baaba bugul bolo hi masamasal panayawiya kaiweliya. Yaa tau toto i neem labulabumwa, iya gamagalau gegewela i bwata lakela.
Iya bugul bolo i kitel ge i hagoem labulabumwa wasana i wasaan, yaa wana baaba nige gamagal etega i aabulilek-an.
Yaa henala ebo wana baaba ni abulilek-an, he iya iyaka i patunahot te Yehoba iya tobaaba tunahot.
Toto Yehoba i patuna iya Yehoba anana i baubaunan, kaiwena Yehoba Yayaluwana i pek elana i kalaopopwi.
Tamana Natuna i nunuwana-an ge bugul gegewena i teli nimanaa.
Henala ebo Yehoba Natuna ni abulilek-an, he iya yawalina hot iyaka i pwawa, yaa henala ebo Yehoba Natuna ni towani, yawal o nige ni pwapwawa, yaa Yehoba wana huga i minaa elana.
Palisi wasa hi hago te Yeisu iyaka gamagalau hi gewi i ahel i patohago-agil ge i pababitaisol, inoke wana tohago iyaka Diyon wana tohago hi gewi lakel.
He Yeisu nige totona gamagal etega i papababitaiso, wana tohago ya te hi giginol.
Sauga Yeisu i atena te iya wasana Palisi iyaka hi hago, yaka labi Yudiya i eguluwan ge i sikal al i na labi Galili.
Kamwasa toto Yeisu i noek, labena Sameliya elana te i nosolaa,
inoke i na i vin Sameliya awanina etega alana Saika. Awan o nige ana bwaga i yayapu bilibili toto Yakobo i pek natuna Yosepa elana.
Wewel kenken etega iyoho to valila Yakobo i ken. Nawanawa kaiwena Yeisu tuwana i aliga, inoke i misiyowa wewel kenken awana bebenaa. Sauga o iyaka i ola alalati bwagatau.
Sauga o Yeisu wana tohago iyaka hi na panuwaa aanan nihi pwapwamola, inoke abwe Sameliya yovana etega i nok wewel wagi kaiwena. Yaka Yeisu i baek yova elana i ba, “Tab bosowaina wewel nu wage nu pem na im?”
<range>
Sameliya yovana i baek Yeisu elana i ba, “Owa Yudiya gamagalina ge nau Sameliya yovana. He ga i ola ge u baem elau tage wewel na wage nu im?” Yova baaba o i baunan, kaiwena Yudiya nige avaliyau Sameliya hi heliheliyam.
Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba, “Binimala nu atena hauna toto Yehoba i guyauan, ge binimala nu atena henala nau ge wewel ya awanun elam, inoke nu awanun elau ge wewel yawalina gaganina na pewa.”
Yaka yova i ba, “Tonowak, wewel kenken ya i milau, he nige wam ewagiwagi i gagan ge tage wewel nu wage. Wewel yawalina gaganina ga nu aheya?
Age owa tubuma Yakobo u bwata lake? Iya wewel kenken ya i pem elama, ge iya alonau natunau, avaliyau wali sipi ge wali bulumakau, valila wewel kenken ya hi imwimwa.”
Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba, “Gamagalau gegewel bolo wewel ya hi im, abwe nihi walem al,
yaa henala ebo wewel ni im toto nau na pek elana, he nige ni wawalem al. Wewel toto na pek elana ni tabwa wewel i bwanabwana pitpit ge yawal mihomihotina ni pek.”
Yova i ba, “Tonowak, wewel toto o u pem na im, inoke bahi na wawalem al ge bahi na nenem wewel kenken ya elana wewel na wawagi al.”
Yeisu i ba, “U na ga lagom u yogaan ge alom nuku nem.”
Yova i ba, “Nige lagou i gagan.” Yaka Yeisu yova anana i lahe i ba, “He tunahot te u ba, ‘Nige lagou i gagan.’
Valila u alolon panimala panuna, ge tau toto sauga ya alom ku mina nige lagom i oola. He ewasi u ba tunahot.”
Yova i ba, “Tonowak, he iyaka ya atenawa age owa palopita etega.
Ama Sameliya tubumeyau oya ya elana te hi kukululu Yabowaine elana, yaa komiu Yudiya ku ba tage abatapwalolo iyai ya te Yelusalema.”
Inoke Yeisu i ba, “Yova, no baaba ya nu abulilek-an. Sauga i nenem gamagalau nihi kululu Tamaliya elana, yaa nige oya ya elana i oola o ebo Yelusalema elana.
Komiu Sameliya ku kululuek toto nige ku aatena elana; yaa ama Yudiya ha kululuek Yabowaine toto ha atena elana, kaiwena pwamwal ana aatena iyaka Yehoba i pamasala ama Yudiya eliyama.
Yaa sauga i nenem ge iyaka i vin, inoke Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana gamagalau nihi tapwalolo tunahot Tamaliya elana alona ge wali ginol tutunahotina. He totapwalolo ololal o heliya Tamala i loyaagil.
Yehoba iya yayaluwa, inoke bolo hi kululu elana Yayaluwa Bwabwalena wana gasisi elana te nihi tapwalolo, alona ge wali ginol tutunahotina.”
Yova i ba, “Ya atena te Mesaiya iyoho i nenem, ge sauga ebo ni nem, inoke abwe bugul gegewena ni pwamwananal eliyama.” (He “Mesaiya” pana Gilik elana hi ba “Keliso.”)
Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “He nau te ya baaba elam e.”
Sauga o wana tohago hi sikal elana, ge ateliya i you kaiwena hi kite Yeisu i baaba yova etega elana. Yaa nige etega tage ni nel yova elana ni ba, “Hauna nuwam?” o ebo ni nel Yeisu elana ni ba, “Ga i ola ge u baaba yova elana?”
Yaka yova wana ulubwal i eguluwai ge etimwawa i sikal i na panuwaa. Inoke i baek gamagalau elal i ba,
“Ku nem ga gamagal etega ku kite, iya pagan gegewena bolo ya ginolil i baunan elau. Bi ola ge iya Mesaiya?”
Yaka gamagalau hi gewi panuwa hi eguluwai ge hi nowanik nihi na Yeisu elana.
Sauga yova i egon enaa, inoke tohago hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba, “Topankite, aanan ga etega u an.”
Yaa analiya i lahe i ba, “Au i gan, toto komiu nige ku aatena.”
Yaka tohago hi pebaaba-agil hi ba, “Age gamagal etega aanan i pwatanim elana?”
Inoke Yeisu i ba, “Au heiya te toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol ge wana tuwalali na pwamowasi.
Komiu wami baaba etega ku ba ola hiwe: ‘Waikena esopali iyoho i mina yaka abwe lovetomwa ge pahi ana sauga.’ Yaa na baewa eliyamiu, matamiu ni nok eyowa ku kite! Enona iyaka i matuwa ge bosowaina pahi.
Sauga e topahi molana i ahiahi, eyowa enona i pahipahi yawal mihomihotina kaiwena. Inoke togalauma ge topahi nihi yaliyaya pamaisena.
Baaba toto i ba, ‘Etega i galauma, ge etega al i pahi,’ he iyaka i tunahot i ola hiwe.
Sauga ya na patunamiu nuku nok nuku na eyowa toto valila nige ku tutuwalali-an enona nuku pahi. Gamagalau getogal eyowa hi tuwalali-an, ge komiu wali tuwalali enona ku pwawa.”
Sameliya awanina o elana gamagalau hi gewi Yeisu hi abulilek-an yova wana wasa kaiwena, toto i ba, “No pagan gegewena bolo ya ginolil i baunan elau.”
Inoke sauga hi na Yeisu elana, yaka hi awanun elana avaliya ga nihi minamina, inoke lan labui Yeisu i minaa ga awan o elana,
ge gamagalau hi gewi al hi abulilek Yeisu wana panpankiti kaiwena.
Yaka gamagalau hi baek yova elana hi ba, “Nige tage wam baaba ya kaiwena ge ha abulilek, he iyaka totoma wana baaba ha hago ge ha atena tunahot tau ya iya panayawi ana Topwamwal.”
Lan labui o i mowasi, yaka Yeisu labi Sameliya i eguluwai ge i nok i na labi Galili.
(He Yeisu iyaka i ba haba wana tohago elal i ba, “Palopita etega totona wana panuwa gamagaliliyau nige hi aawatauwan.”)
Sauga i na i vin Galili, yaka Galili gamagaliliyau Yeisu wana vin hi yaliyaya-an, kaiwena valila hi na Yelusalema Nopalegi Hagalena kaiwena ge wana ginol gegewena hi kite bolo i ginolil sauga o elana.
Yeisu i nok al i na Kena, Galili awanina, awan o elana valila wewel i pil ge i tabwa oine. Sauga o elana gamaman ana totuwalali bwabwatana etega natuna melutauina i kasiyebwa Kapeniyama elana.
Sauga tau o Yeisu wasana i hago te iyaka i sikalem Yudiya ge i vin Galili, inoke i nok i na elana, ge i awanun ni nok ni na natuna ni pwamolu, kaiwena wawaya o ana kasiyebwa iyaka i pulowan.
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Ebo nige ginol yawiyawi ge abanuwa ahi nuku kikite, he nige nuku aabulilek.”
Yaka gamaman ana totuwalali i ba, “Tonowak, u nem ga ta na natu u kite abwe mulaa ni aliga.”
Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “U sikal, natum nige ni aaliga.” Tau o Yeisu wana baaba i abulilek-an inoke i egon.
Iya iyoho ya i nawanawa kamwasaa, yaka wana totuwalali i pwawal ge wana wasa hi pek hi ba, “Geman iyaka i molu.”
Inoke i nelil hauna kilok matana elana ge natuna tuwana i heluwan, yaka hi ba, “Nolu kokoyavi wan kilok te tuwana i heluwan ge i tultul.”
Inoke wawaya tamana i nuwatu nolu kilok matana toto o elana te Yeisu i baek elana i ba, “Natum nige ni aaliga.” Yaka tau o alonau ge wana limi ana heniheni gegewel hi abulilek.
He ginol yawiyawi labuina to Yeisu i ginol sauga i sikalem Yudiya ge i na Galili.
Sauga etega al, Yeisu i nok i na Yelusalema Yudiya wali tapwalolo hagalena etega kaiwena.
Yelusalema ana abaulutuk etegana alana hi ba “Sipi ali Nog.” Wewel opop etega iyoho abaulutuk o labenaa, alana pana Hibilu hi ba Betesada. Gonu abaminamina ali gewi nimala panuna hi talil painan.
Gonu o tokasiyebwa hi gewi wali abamina, bolo tomatakai, bolo aeliya i kom, ge bolo nige bosowailiya tuwaliya nihi palamwalamwaniu.
<range>
Tau etega iyoho to i kasiyebwa baliman ana gewi teti eit.
Yeisu tau o i kite i kenukenu, ge i atena sauga yayapona hot i kasiyebwa, yaka i neli i ba, “Tab nuwam nu molu?”
Tokasiyebwa Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Tonowak, sauga wewel i nemunemu, nige o tolabe etega i gagan ge tage ni labeyau ge na gailau wewela. Sauga ebo ya lalabose tage na na na gailau wewela, he gamagal etega iyaka i gailau houwa.”
Yaka Yeisu i baek tau elana i ba, “U lut, wam abakenu u ahe, ge u nawanawa.”
Inoke sauga o i molu, i lut, wana abakenu i ahe, ge i nawanawa. He lan Sabwata te bugul ya i gan.
Inoke Yudiya wali tohouwa hi baek tau toto Yeisu i pwapwamolu elana hi ba, “Lan Sabwata te lan e. Logugui i lopwali te lan Sabwata elana wam abakenu nu kalivai ge nu nawanawa.”
Yaka analiya i lahe i ba, “Tau toto i pwamolowau i ba, ‘Wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa.’”
Yaka Yudiya hi nel hi ba, “Hauna tau i baewa elam ge wam abakenu u ahe ge u nawanawa?”
Tau toto abwe i molu nige i aatena henala ge i baek elana, kaiwena boda i bwata wewel labenaa ge Yeisu iyaka i lelisola gamwaliyaa.
Yeisu abwe tau o i pwawaa Limi Bwabwalena elana, ge i baek elana i ba, “U kite, iyaka u molu al. Wam gegi paganina nu paveyaho, eba abwe bugul nanakina hot etega ni gan al elam.”
Yaka tau i egon i na Yudiya wali tohouwa wali wasa i pek i ba, “Age Yeisu te i pwamolowau.”
Yudiya Yeisu hi pihigelgel-an ge hi papalomwan-an, kaiwena Yeisu gamagalau i pwamolol Sabwata elana.
Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Nam iyoho sauga gegewena i tuwatuwalali, ge nau al ya tuwatuwalali.”
Inoke Yudiya hi logasisi nabi nuwaliya Yeisu nihi lopaaliga. Nige tage Sabwata ana logugui ya te i leke, yaa Yehoba i awa tamani, he i ola te i ba iya alona Yehoba hi olaolaek.
Yaka Yeisu i baek Yudiya elal i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, Yehoba Natuna nige bosowaina bugul etega totona ni ginol, yaa ginol toto i kiteya Tamana elana ya te bosowaina ni ginol. Ginol toto Tamana i giginol, he Natuna al i giginol.
Tamana Natuna i nunuwana-an, ge ginol toto iya i giginol, gegewena i mimi panpankiti Natuna elana. Ginol toto sauga ya nige i bwabwata, yaa Tamana ginol bwabwatal hot ni pankite inoke ni awaawaginol, ge komiu nuwamiu nuku ahe.
Kaiwena Tamana toyaomal i palutil ge yawaliliya i pek, inoke i ola al te Natuna yawal ni pek gamagalau bolo i hihilel elal.
Etega al, Tamana nige gamagal etega i papakot, yaa yatala ana logugui gegewena i pek Natuna elana,
nuwana gamagalau gegewel Natuna nihi awatauwan ni ola Tamana hi awatauwan. Henala ebo Natuna nige i aawatauwan, he Tamana, iya i patuna, nige i aawatauwan.”
Yeisu i ba al, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, henala ebo no baaba ni hago ge toto i patunau ni abulilek-an, iya iyaka yawal hot i pwawa ge nige ni lalahi, he iyaka yaomal i tataluwan ge i na yawal hot elana.
Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, sauga iyoho i nenem—he iyaka i vin—inoke toyaomal Yehoba Natuna anana nihi hago, ge bolo ebo anana nihi hago, yawal hot nihi ahe.
Tamana iya yawal puna, inoke i ola al i talam Natuna iya yawal puna.
Iya Gamagal Natuna, inoke Tamana i teli iya gamagalau gegewel ali toyatala.
“Bahi atemiu ni yoyou baaba ya kaiwena: sauga iyoho i nenem ge toyaomal bolo salaiya anana abwe nihi hago,
inoke nihi lutem ali salaiya. Bolo ginol waiwaisana hi ginol nihi lut yawal hot elana, ge bolo ginol nanakina hi ginol nihi lut lahi nihi pwawa.
Nige bosowaina bugul etega na ginol totou no nuwatu elana, yaa ya papayatala i ola ya te Nam i baem elau. No papakot i sapu ge i olaolaek, kaiwena nige ya lologasisi tage totou no nuwatu na ginol, yaa toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol.”
Yeisu i ba al, “Ebo totou wasau na wasaan, nasi nige ana abulilek ni gagan.
Yaa etega al iyoho wasau i wasawasa-an, ge ya atena baaba bolo i baunan kaiweu i tunahot.
“Valila gamagalau enuna ku patunal hi na Diyon Tobabitaiso elana, ge Diyon wasa tutunahotina i wasaan elal.
Nau nige ya nunuwatu tage gamagal etega ni wasa inoke no wasa ni labe ge ni patunahot, yaa Diyon wana wasa ya gopamasal kaiwena nuwau nuku abulilek ge mwal nuku pwawa.
Diyon iya i ola odam i tau ge i yana, inoke sauga kekeisi ya nuwamiu i noek mwananalina elana ge ku yaliyaya-an.
“Yaa no ginol ona hi wasaagau, ge wasa o Diyon wana wasa i bwata lake. Tuwalali bolo ya ginolil Nam i pem elau inoke ya awaawaginol, ge hi pamasalau te Nam i patunau.
Ge Nam toto i patunau, iya totona wasau i baubaunan. Yaa anana nige sauga etega ku hahago, ge maninina nige ku kikite.
Komiu wana baaba nige ku aahe ge ku aabulilek-an, kaiwena toto i patuna nige ku aabulilek elana.
Komiu Buki Bwabwalena ku vavasili ge ku nuwanuwatu-an, kaiwena ku nuwatu te ana baaba elana yawal hot nuku pwawa. He Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba bolo ya hi baaba nau kaiweu,
yaa komiu ku towaagau, nige ku nenem elau ge yawal hot ku aahe.
“Nige ya nuwanuwatu gamagalau wali tobal kaiwena.
Yaa ya atenamiu; ya atena Yehoba ana nunuwana nige i gagan atemiwa.
Nam alana elana ya nem, yaka komiu ku towaagau, yaa ebo gamagal etega totona alana elana ni nem, he ku yaliyaya-an.
Nuwamiu te alomiyau nihi tobalagimiu, yaa nige ku lologasisi Yabowaine toto maisena hot ni tobalagimiu. He abwe ga nuku abulilek ola?
“Bahi nuku nunuwatu tage nau na wolemiu Nam elana. Mosese heiya te abwe ni wolemiu, yaa komiu ku nuwatu tage iya ami tolabe.
Binimala Mosese wana baaba nuku abulilek-an, inoke nau al nuku abulilek-agau, kaiwena wasau i lelelian.
Yaa kaiwena wana leleli nige ku aabulilek-an, he no baaba abwe ga nuku abulilek-an ola?”
Yaka abwe sauga etega Yeisu Hoga Galili (o ebo ta ba Hoga Taibeliyas) i alupanet-an i na labena etega.
Inoke boda bwabwatana hi nodatu Yeisu hi noulil, kaiwena wana ginol yawiyawi toto tokasiyebwa hi gewi i pwamolol hi kite.
Yeisu i na i ha oyaa ge alonau wana tohago hi misiyo.
Sauga o, Yudiya wali Nopalegi Hagalena iyaka i kelaubwa.
Yeisu matana i nok boda bwabwatana i kitel hi nenem elana, yaka i baek Pilipi elana i ba, “Nasi aanan ga ta pwamolaa ge gamagalau ya nihi an?”
Yeisu i ba ola o, nuwana Pilipi ni labose, kaiwena iya iyaka i atena te hauna nasi i giginol.
Pilipi Yeisu anana i lahe i ba, “Binimala ebo mani silba ali gewi tu handeled ta ahe ge beleid ta pwamolaya, he bwagana ta gotomwatomwa-an pakekeisi ge ta guyauan, yaa nasi nige bosowaina gegewel nihi pwawa.”
Yeisu wana tohago etega alana Andulu, iya Saimon Pita talina, i ba masal i ba,
“Geman etega hiwe, ana beleid toto bali hi ginoliya, ali gewi nimala panuna, ge ana moti kekeisi eluwa. Yaa gamagalau gegewel ya nasi nige bosowailiya!”
Yaka Yeisu i ba wana tohago elal i ba, “Ku ba gamagalau nihi misiyoan.” He labena o elana mwawin i siun bubun, inoke gamagalau gegewel hi misiyoan mwawin pwatanaa, gamwaliyaa bolau ali gewi tabam paib tausan.
Inoke Yeisu beleid i ahel i ba mulolu Yehoba elana, yaka abwe i pek wana tohago elal ge hi guyauan gamagalau bolo hi misiyoan elal. Moti i ahel ge i ginol al i ola to. Inoke gamagalau hi anan ana siga ali luvi i pwawa.
Sauga hi anan ge gegewel tineliya i kiya, yaka Yeisu i baek wana tohago elal i ba, “An teli gegewena ku bugul papahe, bahi etega ni nanak bwagabwaga.”
Inoke an teli hi bugul papahe ge ana egowa elulutega eluwa hi usan pakalaopopwil, an teli o i neem beleid toto bali hi ahe hi ginoliya ali gewi nimala panuna elal.
Inoke gamagalau bolo Yeisu wana ginol yawiyawi ya hi kite hi ba, “Tunahot iya palopita toto abwe i nenem panayawi.”
Yeisu iyaka i atena te gamagalau nuwaliya nihi nok elana ge nihi palawakik ni tabwa wali kin, yaka maisena ya i egon i na i ha al oyaa.
Sauga i kokoyavi, Yeisu wana tohago hi na hi lau hoga Galili,
hi gaiha wagaa, ge hi kuki nihi alupanet Kapeniyama. Sauga bulin i gan, Yeisu nige ga i sisikal elal.
Mana gasigasisena i towa ge hoga i bagol.
Yaka hi levaleva ee ali bwaga ana yapu i ola paib o ebo sikis kilomita, abwe Yeisu hi kite i nawaa hoga pwatanaa i nenem wagaa, inoke hi lovakun.
Yaa Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Bahi lovakun, nau te.”
Inoke alona wali yaliyaya Yeisu hi ahe i gaiha wagaa, yaka etimwawa waga i tuk labi toto nuwaliya nihi noek elana.
Lan i gan al, inoke boda bolo hi eguluwagil hi minaa Hoga Galili labena etega, hi atena nolu waga maisena ya te i gan. Hi atena Yeisu nige alonau ge wana tohago hi gagaiha waga o elana, yaa tohago heliya ya hi kuki ge hi egon.
He waga enuna hi neem awan Taibeliyas hi tuk hi tana labi o gegelinaa, labi toto elana ge Babala beleid i ahe, i ba mulolu Yehoba elana, ge i pek boda hi an.
Sauga boda hi kite Yeisu nige i gagan to labi o elana, ge wana tohago al nige hi gagan, inoke hi gaiha waga elal ge hi lelipanet hi na Kapeniyama Yeisu ana loya kaiwena.
Sauga boda bolo o Hoga Galili hi alupanet-an hi na Kapeniyama, inoke Yeisu hi pwawaa to. Yaka hi baek elana hi ba, “Topankite, hauna sauga u nem labi ya elana?”
Analiya Yeisu i lahe i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, nige tage ginol yawiyawi bolo ya ginolil ku kite ge kaiwena ku loyaagau, yaa beleid ya pewa ku an ge tinemiu i kiya kaiwena te ku loyaagau.
Bahi nuku lologasisi aanan toto abwe ni nak kaiwena. Yaa nuku logasisi aanan toto i mimihot ge ana abapwamowasi yawal mihomihotina, aanan o Gamagal Natuna ni pewa eliyamiu. He Tamana Yehoba iyaka i pamasal te iya i awa wawaisi-an.”
Yaka boda hi baek Yeisu elana hi ba, “Ga naha ginol ola ge tuwalali bolo Yehoba nuwana naha ginolil?”
Analiya i lahe i ba, “Tuwalali toto Yehoba nuwana i ola hiwe: toto iya i patuna nuku abulilek-an.”
Yaka gamagalau hi baek elana hi ba, “Ginol yawiyawi etega u ginol, inoke naha kite ge naha abulilek-agiwa. Tubumeyau valila aanan toto manna hi an uleya, i ola Buki Bwabwalena ana baaba i ba: ‘Aanan i loem labulabumwa i pek hi an.’ He hauna gun owa nasi nu ginol?”
<range>
Yaka Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “Ya ba tunahot eliyamiu, nige tage Mosese aanan i loem labulabumwa iyaka i pewa, yaa Nam aanan i loem labulabumwa tutunahotina sauga ya i pewa eliyamiu.
He aanan toto Yehoba i pewa i loem labulabumwa ge yawal hot i pek gamagalau panayawi elal.”
Yaka hi ba, “Tonowak, aanan ya sauga gegewena nu pem naha anan.”
Yeisu i baek elal i ba, “He nau aanan toto yawalimiu ni pewa. Toto ebo ni nem elau nige ni gagalebu, ge toto ebo ni abulilek-agau nige sauga etega ni wawalem al.
Yaa i ola te ya ba haba eliyamiu: iyaka ku kiteyau, yaa nige ku aabulilek-agau.
Gamagalau bolo Nam ni pem eliyau, gegewel nihi nem elau, ge sauga nihi nem, nige etegana na papatuna owaowani.
Kaiwena nau ya loem labulabumwa ge toto i patunau wana nuwatu na ginol, nige nau totou no nuwatu i oola.
